word.kjv: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
word.thailand: หนังสือลำดับพงศ์พันธุ์ของพระเยซูคริสต์ ผู้เป็นเชื้อสายของดาวิด ผู้สืบตระกูลเนื่องมาจากอับราฮัม
word.spanish1909: LIBRO de la generación de Jesucristo, hijo de David, hijo de Abraham.
word.latinvulgate: Liber generationis Jesu Christi filii David, filii Abraham.
word.italian1927: Genealogia di Gesù Cristo figliuolo di Davide, figliuolo d’Abramo.
word.german1912: Dies ist das Buch von der Geburt Jesu Christi, der da ist ein Sohn Davids, des Sohnes Abrahams.
word.french1910: Généalogie de Jésus-Christ, fils de David, fils d'Abraham.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌基督的家譜（路3:23~38。參得4:18~22；代上3:10~17）大衛的子孫，亞伯拉罕的後裔，耶穌基督的家譜：
word.korean: 아브라함과 다윗의 자손 예수 그리스도의 세계라
word.tagalog: Ang aklat ng lahi ni Jesucristo, na anak ni David, na anak ni Abraham.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te pukapuka o te whakapapa o Ihu Karaiti, tama a Rawiri, tama a Aperahama.
word.cebuano: Ang basahon sa kagikanan ni Jesucristo, anak ni David, anak ni Abraham.
word.hebrewmodern: ספר תולדת ישוע המשיח בן דוד בן אברהם׃
word.textusreceptus: βιβλος γενεσεως ιησου χριστου υιου δαβιδ υιου αβρααμ

word.kjv: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
word.thailand: ยาโคบให้กำเนิดบุตรชื่อโยเซฟ สามีของนางมารีย์ พระเยซูที่เรียกว่าพระคริสต์ก็ทรงบังเกิดมาจากนางมารีย์
word.spanish1909: Y Jacob engendró á José, marido de María, de la cual nació Jesús, el cual es llamado el Cristo.
word.latinvulgate: Jacob autem genuit Joseph virum Mariæ, de qua natus est Jesus, qui vocatur Christus.
word.italian1927: Giacobbe generò Giuseppe, il marito di Maria, dalla quale nacque Gesù, che è chiamato Cristo.
word.german1912: Jakob zeugte Joseph, den Mann Marias, von welcher ist geboren Jesus, der da heißt Christus.
word.french1910: Jacob engendra Joseph, l'époux de Marie, de laquelle est né Jésus, qui est appelé Christ.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 雅各生約瑟，就是馬利亞的丈夫；那稱為基督的耶穌，是馬利亞所生的。
word.korean: 야곱은 마리아의 남편 요셉을 낳았으니 마리아에게서 그리스도라 칭하는 예수가 나시니라
word.tagalog: At naging anak ni Jacob si Jose asawa ni Maria, na siyang nanganak kay Jesus, na siyang tinatawag na Cristo.
word.maori: Ta Hakopa ko Hohepa, ko te tahu a Meri; whanau ake ta Meri ko Ihu, e kiia nei ko te Karaiti.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jacob nanganak kang Jose, bana ni Maria, kang kinsa natawo si Jesus, ang ginganlan si Cristo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויעקב הוליד את יוסף בעל מרים אשר ממנה נולד ישוע הנקרא משיח׃
word.textusreceptus: ιακωβ δε εγεννησεν τον ιωσηφ τον ανδρα μαριας εξ ης εγεννηθη ιησους ο λεγομενος χριστος

word.kjv: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
word.thailand: เรื่องพระกำเนิดของพระเยซูคริสต์เป็นดังนี้ คือมารีย์ผู้เป็นมารดาของพระเยซูนั้น เดิมโยเซฟได้สู่ขอหมั้นกันไว้แล้ว ก่อนที่จะได้อยู่กินด้วยกันก็ปรากฏว่า มารีย์มีครรภ์แล้วด้วยเดชพระวิญญาณบริสุทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Y el nacimiento de Jesucristo fué así: Que siendo María su madre desposada con José, antes que se juntasen, se halló haber concebido del Espíritu Santo.
word.latinvulgate: Christi autem generatio sic erat : cum esset desponsata mater ejus Maria Joseph, antequam convenirent inventa est in utero habens de Spiritu Sancto.
word.italian1927: Or la nascita di Gesù Cristo avvenne in questo modo. Maria, sua madre, era stata promessa sposa a Giuseppe; e prima che fossero venuti a stare insieme, si trovò incinta per virtù dello Spirito Santo.
word.german1912: Die Geburt Christi war aber also getan. Als Maria, seine Mutter, dem Joseph vertraut war, fand sich's ehe er sie heimholte, daß sie schwanger war von dem heiligen Geist.
word.french1910: Voici de quelle manière arriva la naissance de Jésus-Christ. Marie, sa mère, ayant été fiancée à Joseph, se trouva enceinte, par la vertu du Saint-Esprit, avant qu'ils eussent habité ensemble.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌基督的降生（路2:1~7）耶穌基督的降生是這樣的：耶穌的母親馬利亞許配了約瑟，他們還沒有成親，馬利亞就從聖靈懷了孕。
word.korean: 예수 그리스도의 나심은 이러하니라 그 모친 마리아가 요셉과 정혼하고 동거하기 전에 성령으로 잉태된 것이 나타났더니
word.tagalog: Ang pagkapanganak nga kay Jesucristo ay ganito: Nang si Maria na kaniyang ina ay magaasawa kay Jose, bago sila magsama ay nasumpungang siya'y nagdadalang-tao sa pamamagitan ng Espiritu Santo.
word.maori: ¶ Na ko te whanautanga tenei o Ihu Karaiti: he mea taumau a Meri, tona whaea, ma Hohepa, a i te mea kiano raua i tata noa ki a raua, ka kitea kua hapu ia i te Wairua Tapu.
word.cebuano: Karon ang pagkatawo ni Jesucristo ingon niini: Sa kaslonon pa ang iyang inahan nga si Maria kang Jose, sa wala pa sila managkatiayon, hingkaplagan siya nga nanamkon tungod sa Espiritu Santo.
word.hebrewmodern: והלדת ישוע המשיח כה היתה מרים אמו ארשה ליוסף ובטרם יבא אליה נמצאת הרה לרוח הקדש׃
word.textusreceptus: του δε ιησου χριστου η γεννησις ουτως ην μνηστευθεισης γαρ της μητρος αυτου μαριας τω ιωσηφ πριν η συνελθειν αυτους ευρεθη εν γαστρι εχουσα εκ πνευματος αγιου

word.kjv: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king, behold, there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem,
word.thailand: ครั้นพระเยซูได้ทรงบังเกิดที่บ้านเบธเลเฮมแคว้นยูเดียในรัชกาลของกษัตริย์เฮโรด ดูเถิด มีพวกนักปราชญ์จากทิศตะวันออกมายังกรุงเยรูซาเล็ม
word.spanish1909: Y COMO fué nacido Jesús en Bethlehem de Judea en días del rey Herodes, he aquí unos magos vinieron del oriente á Jerusalem,
word.latinvulgate: Cum ergo natus esset Jesus in Bethlehem Juda in diebus Herodis regis, ecce magi ab oriente venerunt Jerosolymam,
word.italian1927: Or essendo Gesù nato in Betleem di Giudea, ai dì del re Erode, ecco dei magi d’Oriente arrivarono in Gerusalemme, dicendo:
word.german1912: Da Jesus geboren war zu Bethlehem im jüdischen Lande, zur Zeit des Königs Herodes, siehe, da kamen die Weisen vom Morgenland nach Jerusalem und sprachen:
word.french1910: Jésus étant né à Bethléhem en Judée, au temps du roi Hérode, voici des mages d'Orient arrivèrent à Jérusalem,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 占星家朝拜耶穌希律王執政的時候，耶穌生在猶太的伯利恆。那時，有幾個占星家從東方來到耶路撒冷，
word.korean: 헤롯왕 때에 예수께서 유대 베들레헴에서 나시매 동방으로부터 박사들이 예루살렘에 이르러 말하되
word.tagalog: Nang ipanganak nga si Jesus sa Bet-lehem ng Judea sa mga kaarawan ng haring si Herodes, narito, ang mga Pantas na lalake ay nagsidating sa Jerusalem mula sa silanganan, na nagsisipagsabi,
word.maori: ¶ Na, i te mea kua whanau nei a Ihu ki Peterehema o Huria, i nga ra o Kingi Herora, na, ka haere mai etahi Maki i te rawhiti ki Hiruharama,
word.cebuano: Ug sa natawo si Jesus sa Betlehem sa Judea, sa mga adlaw ni Herodes nga hari, ania karon, miabut sa Jerusalem mga mago gikan sa Sidlakan nga nagaingon:
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי כאשר נולד ישוע בבית לחם יהודה בימי הורדוס המלך ויבאו מגושים מארץ מזרח ירושלימה לאמר׃
word.textusreceptus: του δε ιησου γεννηθεντος εν βηθλεεμ της ιουδαιας εν ημεραις ηρωδου του βασιλεως ιδου μαγοι απο ανατολων παρεγενοντο εις ιεροσολυμα

word.kjv: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.
word.thailand: แล้วพระเยซูเสด็จจากแคว้นกาลิลีมาหายอห์นที่แม่น้ำจอร์แดน เพื่อจะรับบัพติศมาจากท่าน
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús vino de Galilea á Juan al Jordán, para ser bautizado de él.
word.latinvulgate: Tunc venit Jesus a Galilæa in Jordanem ad Joannem, ut baptizaretur ab eo.
word.italian1927: Allora Gesù dalla Galilea si recò al Giordano da Giovanni per esser da lui battezzato.
word.german1912: Zu der Zeit kam Jesus aus Galiläa an den Jordan zu Johannes, daß er sich von ihm taufen ließe.
word.french1910: Alors Jésus vint de la Galilée au Jourdain vers Jean, pour être baptisé par lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌受洗（可1:9~11；路3:21~22）那時，耶穌從加利利來到約旦河約翰那裡，要受他的洗。
word.korean: 이 때에 예수께서 갈릴리로서 요단강에 이르러 요한에게 세례를 받으려 하신대
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y naparoon si Jesus mula sa Galilea at lumapit kay Juan sa ilog ng Jordan, upang siya'y bautismuhan niya.
word.maori: ¶ I reira ka haere a Ihu i Kariri ki Horano, ki a Hoani, kia iriiria e ia.
word.cebuano: Unya miadto si Jesus kang Juan ngadto sa Jordan gikan sa Galilea aron siya pagabautismohan niya.
word.hebrewmodern: ויבא ישוע מן הגליל הירדנה אל יוחנן להטבל על ידו׃
word.textusreceptus: τοτε παραγινεται ο ιησους απο της γαλιλαιας επι τον ιορδανην προς τον ιωαννην του βαπτισθηναι υπ αυτου

word.kjv: And Jesus answering said unto him, Suffer it to be so now: for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness. Then he suffered him.
word.thailand: และพระเยซูตรัสตอบยอห์นว่า "บัดนี้จงยอมเถิด เพราะสมควรที่เราทั้งหลายจะกระทำตามสิ่งชอบธรรมทุกประการ" แล้วท่านก็ยอมทำตามพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Empero respondiendo Jesús le dijo: Deja ahora; porque así nos conviene cumplir toda justicia. Entonces le dejó.
word.latinvulgate: Respondens autem Jesus, dixit ei : Sine modo : sic enim decet nos implere omnem justitiam. Tunc dimisit eum.
word.italian1927: Ma Gesù gli rispose: Lascia fare per ora; poiché conviene che noi adempiamo così ogni giustizia. Allora Giovanni lo lasciò fare.
word.german1912: Jesus aber antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Laß es jetzt also sein! also gebührt es uns, alle Gerechtigkeit zu erfüllen. Da ließ er's ihm zu.
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Laisse faire maintenant, car il est convenable que nous accomplissions ainsi tout ce qui est juste. Et Jean ne lui résista plus.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“暫且這樣作吧。我們理當這樣履行全部的義。”於是約翰答應了他。
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 이제 허락하라 우리가 이와 같이 하여 모든 의를 이루는 것이 합당하니라 하신대 이에 요한이 허락하는지라
word.tagalog: Nguni't pagsagot ni Jesus ay sinabi sa kaniya, Payagan mo ngayon: sapagka't ganyan ang nararapat sa atin, ang pagganap ng buong katuwiran. Nang magkagayo'y pinayagan niya siya.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, Tukua ra aianei; ko te tikanga hoki tenei ma taua kia whakarite i nga mea tika katoa. Na tukua ana ia e ia.
word.cebuano: Apan sa mitubag si Jesus, miingon kaniya: Pasagdi una karon, kay mao kini ang angay kanato aron sa pagtuman nga hingpit sa tibook nga pagkamatarung, Unya gipasagdan siya.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליו הניחה לי כי כן נאוה לנו למלא כל הצדקה וינח לו׃
word.textusreceptus: αποκριθεις δε ο ιησους ειπεν προς αυτον αφες αρτι ουτως γαρ πρεπον εστιν ημιν πληρωσαι πασαν δικαιοσυνην τοτε αφιησιν αυτον

word.kjv: And Jesus, when he was baptized, went up straightway out of the water: and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and lighting upon him:
word.thailand: และพระเยซูเมื่อพระองค์ทรงรับบัพติศมาแล้ว ในทันใดนั้นก็เสด็จขึ้นจากน้ำ และดูเถิด ท้องฟ้าก็แหวกออก และพระองค์ได้ทอดพระเนตรเห็นพระวิญญาณของพระเจ้าเสด็จลงมาดุจนกเขาและสถิตอยู่บนพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús, después que fué bautizado, subió luego del agua; y he aquí los cielos le fueron abiertos, y vió al Espíritu de Dios que descendía como paloma, y venía sobre él.
word.latinvulgate: Baptizatus autem Jesus, confestim ascendit de aqua, et ecce aperti sunt ei cæli : et vidit Spiritum Dei descendentem sicut columbam, et venientem super se.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, tosto che fu battezzato, salì fuor dell’acqua; ed ecco i cieli s’apersero, ed egli vide lo Spirito di Dio scendere come una colomba e venir sopra lui.
word.german1912: Und da Jesus getauft war, stieg er alsbald herauf aus dem Wasser; und siehe, da tat sich der Himmel auf Über ihm. Und er sah den Geist Gottes gleich als eine Taube herabfahren und über ihn kommen.
word.french1910: Dès que Jésus eut été baptisé, il sortit de l'eau. Et voici, les cieux s'ouvrirent, et il vit l'Esprit de Dieu descendre comme une colombe et venir sur lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌受了洗，立刻從水中上來；忽然，天為他開了，他看見　神的靈，好像鴿子降下來，落在他身上；
word.korean: 예수께서 세례를 받으시고 곧 물에서 올라오실새 하늘이 열리고 하나님의 성령이 비둘기같이 내려 자기 위에 임하심을 보시더니
word.tagalog: At nang mabautismuhan si Jesus, pagdaka'y umahon sa tubig: at narito, nangabuksan sa kaniya ang mga langit, at nakita niya ang Espiritu ng Dios na bumababang tulad sa isang kalapati, at lumalapag sa kaniya;
word.maori: A, no ka oti a Ihu te iriiri, tika tonu ake ia i te wai: na ko te rangi ka tuwhera ki a ia, a ka kite ia i te Wairua o te Atua e heke iho ana me he kukupa, a tau ana ki runga ki a ia:
word.cebuano: Ug sa nabautismohan na si Jesus gilayon mihaw-as siya sa tubig. Ug ania karon, naukban kaniya ang mga langit, ug iyang nakita ang Espiritu sa Dios, nga mikunsad ingon sa salampati, ug mianha sa ibabaw niya.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי כאשר נטבל ישוע וימהר לעלות מן המים והנה נפתחו לו השמים וירא את רוח אלהים יורדת כיונה ונחה עליו׃
word.textusreceptus: και βαπτισθεις ο ιησους ανεβη ευθυς απο του υδατος και ιδου ανεωχθησαν αυτω οι ουρανοι και ειδεν το πνευμα του θεου καταβαινον ωσει περιστεραν και ερχομενον επ αυτον

word.kjv: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.
word.thailand: ครั้งนั้นพระวิญญาณทรงนำพระเยซูเข้าไปในถิ่นทุรกันดาร เพื่อพญามารจะได้มาทดลอง
word.spanish1909: ENTONCES Jesús fué llevado del Espíritu al desierto, para ser tentado del diablo.
word.latinvulgate: Tunc Jesus ductus est in desertum a Spiritu, ut tentaretur a diabolo.
word.italian1927: Allora Gesù fu condotto dallo Spirito su nel deserto, per esser tentato dal diavolo.
word.german1912: Da ward Jesus vom Geist in die Wüste geführt, auf daß er von dem Teufel versucht würde.
word.french1910: Alors Jésus fut emmené par l'Esprit dans le désert, pour être tenté par le diable.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌受試探（可1:12~13；路4:1~13）隨後，耶穌被聖靈帶到曠野，受魔鬼的試探。
word.korean: 그 때에 예수께서 성령에게 이끌리어 마귀에게 시험을 받으러 광야로 가사
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y inihatid ng Espiritu Santo si Jesus sa ilang upang siya'y tuksuhin ng diablo.
word.maori: ¶ Me i reira ka arahina a Ihu e te Wairua ki te koraha, kia whakamatautauria e te rewera.
word.cebuano: Unya si Jesus gihatud sa Espiritu sa kamingawan aron pagatintalon sa yawa.
word.hebrewmodern: אז נשא הרוח את ישוע המדברה למען ינסהו השטן׃
word.textusreceptus: τοτε ο ιησους ανηχθη εις την ερημον υπο του πνευματος πειρασθηναι υπο του διαβολου

word.kjv: Jesus said unto him, It is written again, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสตอบมันว่า "พระคัมภีร์มีเขียนไว้อีกว่า `อย่าทดลององค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าผู้เป็นพระเจ้าของท่าน'"
word.spanish1909: Jesús le dijo: Escrito está además: No tentarás al Señor tu Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Ait illi Jesus : Rursum scriptum est : Non tentabis Dominum Deum tuum.
word.italian1927: Gesù gli disse: Egli è altresì scritto: Non tentare il Signore Iddio tuo.
word.german1912: Da sprach Jesus zu ihm: Wiederum steht auch geschrieben: "Du sollst Gott, deinen HERRN, nicht versuchen."
word.french1910: Jésus lui dit: Il est aussi écrit: Tu ne tenteras point le Seigneur, ton Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他說：“經上又記著：‘不可試探主你的　神。’”
word.korean: 예수께서 이르시되 또 기록되었으되 주 너의 하나님을 시험치 말라 하였느니라 하신대
word.tagalog: Sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, Nasusulat din naman, Huwag mong tutuksuhin ang Panginoon mong Dios.
word.maori: Mea atu ana a Ihu ki a ia, Ka oti ano hoki te tuhituhi, Kaua e whakamatautau ki te Ariki ki tou Atua.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus miingon kaniya: Nahisulat na usab: Dili mo pagtintalon ang Ginoo nga imong Dios.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע ועוד כתוב לא תנסה את יהוה אלהיך׃
word.textusreceptus: εφη αυτω ο ιησους παλιν γεγραπται ουκ εκπειρασεις κυριον τον θεον σου

word.kjv: Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสตอบมันว่า "อ้ายซาตาน จงไปเสียให้พ้น เพราะพระคัมภีร์มีเขียนไว้ว่า `จงนมัสการองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าผู้เป็นพระเจ้าของท่าน และปรนนิบัติพระองค์แต่ผู้เดียว'"
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús le dice: Vete, Satanás, que escrito está: Al Señor tu Dios adorarás y á él solo servirás.
word.latinvulgate: Tunc dicit ei Jesus : Vade Satana : Scriptum est enim : Dominum Deum tuum adorabis, et illi soli servies.
word.italian1927: Allora Gesù gli disse: Va’, Satana, poiché sta scritto: Adora il Signore Iddio tuo, ed a lui solo rendi il culto.
word.german1912: Da sprach Jesus zu ihm: Hebe dich weg von mir Satan! denn es steht geschrieben: "Du sollst anbeten Gott, deinen HERRN, und ihm allein dienen."
word.french1910: Jésus lui dit: Retire-toi, Satan! Car il est écrit: Tu adoreras le Seigneur, ton Dieu, et tu le serviras lui seul.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但耶穌說：“撒但，走開！經上記著：‘當拜主你的　神，單要事奉他。’”
word.korean: 이에 예수께서 말씀하시되 사단아 ! 물러가라 기록되었으되 주 너의 하나님께 경배하고 다만 그를 섬기라 ! 하였느니라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, Humayo ka, Satanas: sapagka't nasusulat, Sa Panginoon mong Dios sasamba ka, at siya lamang ang iyong paglilingkuran.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, Haere atu, e Hatana; kua oti hoki te tuhituhi, Me koropiko koe ki te Ariki ki tou Atua, me mahi ano ki a ia anake.
word.cebuano: Unya si Jesus miingon kaniya: Pahawa ka, satanas, kay nahisulat na: Magsimba ka sa Ginoo nga imong Dios, ug kaniya lamang mag-alagad ikaw,
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע סור ממני השטן כי כתוב ליהוה אלהיך תשתחוה ואותו לבדו תעבד׃
word.textusreceptus: τοτε λεγει αυτω ο ιησους υπαγε σατανα γεγραπται γαρ κυριον τον θεον σου προσκυνησεις και αυτω μονω λατρευσεις

word.kjv: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison, he departed into Galilee;
word.thailand: ครั้นพระเยซูทรงได้ยินว่ายอห์นถูกจำไว้แล้ว พระองค์ก็เสด็จไปยังแคว้นกาลิลี
word.spanish1909: Mas oyendo Jesús que Juan era preso, se volvió á Galilea;
word.latinvulgate: Cum autem audisset Jesus quod Joannes traditus esset, secessit in Galilæam :
word.italian1927: Or Gesù, avendo udito che Giovanni era stato messo in prigione, si ritirò in Galilea.
word.german1912: Da nun Jesus hörte, daß Johannes überantwortet war, zog er in das galiläische Land.
word.french1910: Jésus, ayant appris que Jean avait été livré, se retira dans la Galilée.
word.korean: 예수께서 요한의 잡힘을 들으시고 갈릴리로 물러 가셨다가
word.tagalog: Nang marinig nga niya na si Juan ay dinakip, ay umuwi siya sa Galilea;
word.maori: ¶ A, no ka rongo a Ihu kua tukua a Hoani ki te whare herehere, ka haere ia ki Kariri;
word.cebuano: Karon, sa nakadungog si Jesus nga si Juan gibilanggo, mipauli siya sa Galilea;
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי כשמעו כי הסגירו את יוחנן וילך לו ארץ הגליל׃
word.textusreceptus: ακουσας δε ο ιησους οτι ιωαννης παρεδοθη ανεχωρησεν εις την γαλιλαιαν

word.kjv: From that time Jesus began to preach, and to say, Repent: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
word.thailand: ตั้งแต่นั้นมาพระเยซูได้ทรงตั้งต้นประกาศว่า "จงกลับใจเสียใหม่ เพราะว่าอาณาจักรแห่งสวรรค์มาใกล้แล้ว"
word.spanish1909: Desde entonces comenzó Jesús á predicar, y á decir: Arrepentíos, que el reino de los cielos se ha acercado.
word.latinvulgate: Exinde cœpit Jesus prædicare, et dicere : Pœnitentiam agite : appropinquavit enim regnum cælorum.
word.italian1927: Da quel tempo Gesù cominciò a predicare e a dire: Ravvedetevi, perché il regno de’ cieli è vicino.
word.german1912: Von der Zeit an fing Jesus an, zu predigen und zu sagen: Tut Buße, das Himmelreich ist nahe herbeigekommen!
word.french1910: Dès ce moment Jésus commença à prêcher, et à dire: Repentez-vous, car le royaume des cieux est proche.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 從那時起，耶穌就開始傳道，說：“天國近了，你們應當悔改。”
word.korean: 이 때부터 예수께서 비로소 전파하여 가라사대 회개하라 ! 천국이 가까왔느니라 ! 하시더라
word.tagalog: Mula noon ay nagpasimulang mangaral si Jesus, at magsabi, Mangagsisi kayo; sapagka't malapit na ang kaharian ng langit.
word.maori: No reira ano a Ihu i timata ai te kauwhau, te mea, Ripeneta, kua tata hoki te rangatiratanga o te rangi.
word.cebuano: Sukad niadto misugod si Jesus sa pagwali, ug pag-ingon: Maghinulsol kamo, kay haduol na ang gingharian sa langit.
word.hebrewmodern: מן העת ההיא החל ישוע לקרא קרוא ואמור שובו כי הגיעה מלכות השמים׃
word.textusreceptus: απο τοτε ηρξατο ο ιησους κηρυσσειν και λεγειν μετανοειτε ηγγικεν γαρ η βασιλεια των ουρανων

word.kjv: And Jesus, walking by the sea of Galilee, saw two brethren, Simon called Peter, and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.
word.thailand: ขณะที่พระเยซูทรงดำเนินอยู่ตามชายทะเลกาลิลี ก็ทอดพระเนตรเห็นพี่น้องสองคน คือซีโมนที่เรียกว่าเปโตร กับอันดรูว์น้องชาย กำลังทอดอวนอยู่ที่ทะเลสาบ เพราะเขาเป็นชาวประมง
word.spanish1909: Y andando Jesús junto á la mar de Galilea, vió á dos hermanos, Simón, que es llamado Pedro, y Andrés su hermano, que echaban la red en la mar; porque eran pescadores.
word.latinvulgate: Ambulans autem Jesus juxta mare Galilææ, vidit duos fratres, Simonem, qui vocatur Petrus, et Andream fratrem ejus, mittentes rete in mare (erant enim piscatores),
word.italian1927: Or passeggiando lungo il mare della Galilea, egli vide due fratelli, Simone detto Pietro, e Andrea suo fratello, i quali gettavano la rete in mare; poiché erano pescatori.
word.german1912: Als nun Jesus an dem Galiläischen Meer ging, sah er zwei Brüder, Simon, der da heißt Petrus, und Andreas, seinen Bruder, die warfen ihre Netze ins Meer; denn sie waren Fischer.
word.french1910: Comme il marchait le long de la mer de Galilée, il vit deux frères, Simon, appelé Pierre, et André, son frère, qui jetaient un filet dans la mer; car ils étaient pêcheurs.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌在加利利海邊行走的時候，看見兄弟二人，就是名叫彼得的西門和他的弟弟安得烈，正在把網撒到海裡去；他們是漁夫。
word.korean: 갈릴리 해변에 다니시다가 두 형제 곧 베드로라 하는 시몬과 그 형제 안드레가 바다에 그물 던지는 것을 보시니 저희는 어부라
word.tagalog: At sa paglalakad niya sa tabi ng dagat ng Galilea; ay nakita niya ang dalawang magkapatid, si Simon na tinatawag na Pedro, at si Andres na kaniyang kapatid, na inihuhulog ang isang lambat sa dagat; sapagka't sila'y mga mamamalakaya.
word.maori: ¶ A, i a Ihu e haere ana i te taha o te moana o Kariri, ka kite ia i etahi tangata tokorua, he tuakana he teina, i a Haimona, tona ingoa nei ko Pita, raua ko tona teina ko Anaru, e maka ana i te kupenga ki te moana; he kaihao ika hoki raua.
word.cebuano: Ug sa nagalakaw si Jesus sa ubay sa dagat sa Galilea, hingkit-an niya ang duha ka magsoon, si Simon nga ginganlan si Pedro, ug si Andres nga iyang igsoon, nga nagataktak sa pukot sa dagat, kay sila mga mananagat.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי בהתהלכו על יד ים הגליל וירא שני אנשים אחים את שמעון הנקרא פטרוס ואת אנדרי אחיו והמה משליכים מצודה בים כי דיגים היו׃
word.textusreceptus: περιπατων δε ο ιησους παρα την θαλασσαν της γαλιλαιας ειδεν δυο αδελφους σιμωνα τον λεγομενον πετρον και ανδρεαν τον αδελφον αυτου βαλλοντας αμφιβληστρον εις την θαλασσαν ησαν γαρ αλιεις

word.kjv: And Jesus went about all Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people.
word.thailand: พระเยซูได้เสด็จไปทั่วแคว้นกาลิลี ทรงสั่งสอนในธรรมศาลาของเขา ทรงประกาศข่าวประเสริฐแห่งอาณาจักร และทรงรักษาโรคภัยไข้เจ็บทุกอย่างของชาวเมืองให้หาย
word.spanish1909: Y rodeó Jesús toda Galilea, enseñando en las sinagogas de ellos, y predicando el evangelio del reino, y sanando toda enfermedad y toda dolencia en el pueblo.
word.latinvulgate: Et circuibat Jesus totam Galilæam, docens in synagogis eorum, et prædicans Evangelium regni : et sanans omnem languorem, et omnem infirmitatem in populo.
word.italian1927: E Gesù andava attorno per tutta la Galilea, insegnando nelle loro sinagoghe e predicando l’evangelo del Regno, sanando ogni malattia ed ogni infermità fra il popolo.
word.german1912: Und Jesus ging umher im ganzen galiläischen Lande, lehrte sie in ihren Schulen und predigte das Evangelium von dem Reich und heilte allerlei Seuche und Krankheit im Volk.
word.french1910: Jésus parcourait toute la Galilée, enseignant dans les synagogues, prêchant la bonne nouvelle du royaume, et guérissant toute maladie et toute infirmité parmi le peuple.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌走遍加利利，在各會堂裡教導人，宣揚天國的福音，醫治民間各種疾病、各種病症。
word.korean: 예수께서 온 갈릴리에 두루 다니사 저희 회당에서 가르치시며 천국 복음을 전파하시며 백성 중에 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치시니
word.tagalog: At nilibot ni Jesus ang buong Galilea, na nagtuturo sa mga sinagoga nila, at ipinangangaral ang evangelio ng kaharian, at nagpapagaling ng lahat ng sarisaring sakit at ng lahat ng karamdaman na nasa mga tao.
word.maori: ¶ Na ka haereerea katoatia a Kariri e Ihu, whakaako ana i roto i o ratou whare karakia, kauwhau ana i te rongopai o te rangatiratanga, me te whakaora i nga mate katoa, i nga turorotanga katoa o te iwi.
word.cebuano: Ug gilibut ni Jesus ang tibook Galilea, nga nagapanudlo didto sa mga sinagoga nila, ug nagamantala sa Maayong Balita sa gingharian, ug nagaayo sa tanan nga balatian, ug tanan nga sakit sa katawohan.
word.hebrewmodern: ויסב ישוע בכל הגליל וילמד בבתי כנסיותיהם ויבשר בשורת המלכות וירפא כל מחלה וכל מדוה בעם׃
word.textusreceptus: και περιηγεν ολην την γαλιλαιαν ο ιησους διδασκων εν ταις συναγωγαις αυτων και κηρυσσων το ευαγγελιον της βασιλειας και θεραπευων πασαν νοσον και πασαν μαλακιαν εν τω λαω

word.kjv: And it came to pass, when Jesus had ended these sayings, the people were astonished at his doctrine:
word.thailand: ต่อมาครั้นพระเยซูตรัสคำเหล่านี้เสร็จแล้ว ประชาชนทั้งปวงก็อัศจรรย์ใจด้วยคำสั่งสอนของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y fué que, como Jesús acabó estas palabras, las gentes se admiraban de su doctrina;
word.latinvulgate: Et factum est : cum consummasset Jesus verba hæc, admirabantur turbæ super doctrina ejus.
word.italian1927: Ed avvenne che quando Gesù ebbe finiti questi discorsi, le turbe stupivano del suo insegnamento,
word.german1912: Und es begab sich, da Jesus diese Rede vollendet hatte, entsetzte sich das Volk über seine Lehre.
word.french1910: Après que Jésus eut achevé ces discours, la foule fut frappée de sa doctrine;

word.korean: 예수께서 이 말씀을 마치시매 무리들이 그 가르치심에 놀래니
word.tagalog: At nangyari, na nang matapos na ni Jesus ang mga salitang ito, ay nangatilihan ang mga karamihan sa kaniyang aral:
word.maori: A, no ka mutu enei korero a Ihu, ka miharo te whakaminenga ki tana ako:
word.cebuano: Ug nahitabo nga sa natapus ni Jesus kining mga pulonga, nanghibulong ang mga panon sa katawohan sa iyang pagtolon-an;
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי ככלות ישוע לדבר את הדברים האלה וישתומם המון העם על תורתו׃
word.textusreceptus: και εγενετο οτε συνετελεσεν ο ιησους τους λογους τουτους εξεπλησσοντο οι οχλοι επι τη διδαχη αυτου

word.kjv: And Jesus put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.
word.thailand: พระเยซูทรงยื่นพระหัตถ์ถูกต้องเขา แล้วตรัสว่า "เราพอใจแล้ว จงหายเถิด" ในทันใดนั้นโรคเรื้อนของเขาก็หาย
word.spanish1909: Y extendiendo Jesús su mano, le tocó, diciendo: Quiero; sé limpio. Y luego su lepra fué limpiada.
word.latinvulgate: Et extendens Jesus manum, tetigit eum, dicens : Volo. Mundare. Et confestim mundata est lepra ejus.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, stesa la mano, lo toccò dicendo: Lo voglio, sii mondato. E in quell’istante egli fu mondato dalla sua lebbra.
word.german1912: Und Jesus streckte seine Hand aus, rührte ihn an und sprach: Ich will's tun; sei gereinigt! Und alsbald ward er vom Aussatz rein.
word.french1910: Jésus étendit la main, le toucha, et dit: Je le veux, sois pur. Aussitôt il fut purifié de sa lèpre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌伸手摸他，說：“我肯，你潔淨了吧！”他的痲風立刻潔淨了。
word.korean: 예수께서 손을 내밀어 저에게 대시며 가라사대 내가 원하노니 깨끗함을 받으라 ! 하신대 즉시 그의 문둥병이 깨끗하여진지라
word.tagalog: At iniunat niya ang kaniyang kamay, at siya'y hinipo, na nagsasabi, Ibig ko; luminis ka. At pagdaka'y nalinis ang kaniyang ketong.
word.maori: A ka totoro te ringa o Ihu, ka pa ki a ia, ka mea, E pai ana ahau; kia ma koe. A ma tonu iho tona repera.
word.cebuano: Ug sa gituy-od ni Jesus ang iyang kamot, iyang gihikap siya nga nagaingon: Buot ako, magmahinlo ka. Ug dihadiha dayon nahinloan siya sa iyang sanla.
word.hebrewmodern: וישלח ישוע את ידו ויגע בו ויאמר חפץ אנכי טהר ומיד נרפאה צרעתו׃
word.textusreceptus: και εκτεινας την χειρα ηψατο αυτου ο ιησους λεγων θελω καθαρισθητι και ευθεως εκαθαρισθη αυτου η λεπρα

word.kjv: And Jesus saith unto him, See thou tell no man; but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer the gift that Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูตรัสสั่งเขาว่า "อย่าบอกเล่าให้ผู้ใดฟังเลย แต่จงไปสำแดงตัวแก่ปุโรหิต และถวายเครื่องถวายตามซึ่งโมเสสได้สั่งไว้ เพื่อเป็นหลักฐานต่อคนทั้งหลาย"
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús le dijo: Mira, no lo digas á nadie; mas ve, muéstrate al sacerdote, y ofrece el presente que mandó Moisés, para testimonio á ellos.
word.latinvulgate: Et ait illi Jesus : Vide, nemini dixeris : sed vade, ostende te sacerdoti, et offer munus, quod præcepit Moyses, in testimonium illis.
word.italian1927: E Gesù gli disse: Guarda di non dirlo a nessuno: ma va’, mostrati al sacerdote e fa’ l’offerta che Mosè ha prescritto; e ciò serva loro di testimonianza.
word.german1912: Und Jesus sprach zu ihm: Siehe zu, sage es niemand; sondern gehe hin und zeige dich dem Priester und opfere die Gabe, die Mose befohlen hat, zu einem Zeugnis über sie.
word.french1910: Puis Jésus lui dit: Garde-toi d'en parler à personne; mais va te montrer au sacrificateur, et présente l'offrande que Moïse a prescrite, afin que cela leur serve de témoignage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他說：“你千萬不可告訴別人，只要去給祭司檢查，並且照著摩西所規定的獻上供物，好向大家作證。”
word.korean: 예수께서 이르시되 삼가 아무에게도 이르지 말고 다만 가서 제사장에게 네 몸을 보이고 모세의 명한 예물을 드려 저희에게 증거하라 하시니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, Ingatan mong huwag sabihin kanino man; kundi humayo ka, pakita ka sa saserdote, at ihandog mo ang alay na ipinagutos ni Moises, na bilang patotoo sa kanila.
word.maori: Katahi ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, Kia mahara, kei korerotia ki te tangata; erangi haere, kia kite te tohunga i a koe, mauria atu hoki te whakahere i whakaritea e Mohi, hei mea whakaatu ki a ratou.
word.cebuano: Unya si Jesus miingon kaniya: Pagmatngon nga dili ka magsugilon bisan kang kinsa, apan, lumakaw ka ug magpakita ka sa sacerdote, ug maghalad sa halad nga gisugo ni Moises, aron mahimong usa ka pamatuod alang kanila.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע ראה פן תספר לאיש כי אם לך לך והראה אל הכהן והקרב את הקרבן אשר צוה משה לעדות להם׃
word.textusreceptus: και λεγει αυτω ο ιησους ορα μηδενι ειπης αλλ υπαγε σεαυτον δειξον τω ιερει και προσενεγκε το δωρον ο προσεταξεν μωσης εις μαρτυριον αυτοις

word.kjv: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum, there came unto him a centurion, beseeching him,

word.spanish1909: Y entrando Jesús en Capernaum, vino á él un centurión, rogándole,

word.italian1927: Or quand’egli fu entrato in Capernaum, un centurione venne a lui pregandolo e dicendo:
word.german1912: Da aber Jesus einging zu Kapernaum, trat ein Hauptmann zu ihm, der bat ihn
word.french1910: Comme Jésus entrait dans Capernaüm, un centenier l'aborda, le priant
word.chinesencvtraditional: 治好百夫長的僕人（路7:1~10）耶穌到了迦百農，有一個百夫長前來懇求他，

word.textusreceptus: και ιδου πασα η πολις εξηλθεν εις συναντησιν τω ιησου και ιδοντες αυτον παρεκαλεσαν οπως μεταβη απο των οριων αυτων

word.kjv: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด เขาหามคนอัมพาตคนหนึ่งซึ่งนอนอยู่บนที่นอนมาหาพระองค์ เมื่อพระเยซูทอดพระเนตรเห็นความเชื่อของเขาทั้งหลาย จึงตรัสกับคนอัมพาตว่า "ลูกเอ๋ย จงชื่นใจเถิด บาปของเจ้าได้รับอภัยแล้ว"
word.spanish1909: Y he aquí le trajeron un paralítico, echado en una cama: y viendo Jesús la fe de ellos, dijo al paralítico: Confía, hijo; tus pecados te son perdonados.
word.latinvulgate: Et ecce offerebant ei paralyticum jacentem in lecto. Et videns Jesus fidem illorum, dixit paralytico : Confide fili, remittuntur tibi peccata tua.
word.italian1927: Ed ecco gli portarono un paralitico steso sopra un letto. E Gesù, veduta la fede loro, disse al paralitico: Figliuolo, sta’ di buon animo, i tuoi peccati ti sono rimessi.
word.german1912: Und siehe, da brachten sie zu ihm einen Gichtbrüchigen, der lag auf einem Bett. Da nun Jesus ihren Glauben sah, sprach er zu dem Gichtbrüchigen: Sei getrost, mein Sohn; deine Sünden sind dir vergeben.
word.french1910: Et voici, on lui amena un paralytique couché sur un lit. Jésus, voyant leur foi, dit au paralytique: Prends courage, mon enfant, tes péchés te sont pardonnés.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 有人把一個躺在床上的癱子帶到他那裡。耶穌看見他們的信心，就對癱子說：“孩子，放心！你的罪赦了。”
word.korean: 침상에 누운 중풍병자를 사람들이 데리고 오거늘 예수께서 저희의 믿음을 보시고 중풍병자에게 이르시되 소자야 안심하라 네 죄사함을 받았느니라 !
word.tagalog: At narito, dinala nila sa kaniya ang isang lumpo, na nakahiga sa isang higaan: at nang makita ni Jesus ang kanilang pananampalataya, ay sinabi sa lumpo, Anak, laksan mo ang iyong loob; ang iyong mga kasalanan ay ipinatatawad na.
word.maori: Na ka kawea mai e ratou ki a ia tetahi pararutiki, e takoto ana i runga i te moenga; no te kitenga o Ihu i to ratou whakapono ka mea ia ki te pararutiki, E tama, kia maia; ka oti ou hara te muru.
word.cebuano: Ug ania karon, ilang gidala kaniya ang usa nga giparalisis nga nagahigda sa usa ka duyan. Ug sa nakita ni Jesus ang ilang pagtoo, miingon sa giparalisis: Anak, magmalipayon ka, gipasaylo kanimo ang imong mga sala.
word.hebrewmodern: והנה הם מביאים אליו איש נכה אברים והוא משכב על המטה ויהי כראות ישוע את אמונתם ויאמר אל נכה האברים חזק בני נסלחו לך חטאתיך׃
word.textusreceptus: και ιδου προσεφερον αυτω παραλυτικον επι κλινης βεβλημενον και ιδων ο ιησους την πιστιν αυτων ειπεν τω παραλυτικω θαρσει τεκνον αφεωνται σοι αι αμαρτιαι σου

word.kjv: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said, Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูทรงทราบความคิดของเขาจึงตรัสว่า "เหตุไฉนท่านทั้งหลายคิดชั่วอยู่ในใจเล่า
word.spanish1909: Y viendo Jesús sus pensamientos, dijo: ¿Por qué pensáis mal en vuestros corazones?
word.latinvulgate: Et cum vidisset Jesus cogitationes eorum, dixit : Ut quid cogitatis mala in cordibus vestris ?
word.italian1927: E Gesù, conosciuti i loro pensieri, disse: Perché pensate voi cose malvage ne’ vostri cuori?
word.german1912: Da aber Jesus ihre Gedanken sah, sprach er: Warum denkt ihr so arges in euren Herzen?
word.french1910: Et Jésus, connaissant leurs pensées, dit: Pourquoi avez-vous de mauvaises pensées dans vos coeurs?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌看出他們所想的，就說：“你們心裡為甚麼存著惡念呢？
word.korean: 예수께서 그 생각을 아시고 가라사대 너희가 어찌하여 마음에 악한 생각을 하느냐 ?
word.tagalog: At pagkaunawa ni Jesus ng kanilang mga kaisipan, ay sinabi, Bakit nangagiisip kayo ng masama sa inyong mga puso?
word.maori: A, ka kite a Ihu i o ratou whakaaro, ka mea ia, He aha i kino ai nga whakaaro o roto o o koutou ngakau?
word.cebuano: Apan sa nahibaloan ni Jesus ang ilang mga hunahuna, miingon: Nganong nagahunahuna kamo ug dautan sa inyong mga kasingkasing?
word.hebrewmodern: וירא ישוע את מחשבתם ויאמר למה תחשבו רעה בלבבכם׃
word.textusreceptus: και ιδων ο ιησους τας ενθυμησεις αυτων ειπεν ινα τι υμεις ενθυμεισθε πονηρα εν ταις καρδιαις υμων

word.kjv: And as Jesus passed forth from thence, he saw a man, named Matthew, sitting at the receipt of custom: and he saith unto him, Follow me. And he arose, and followed him.
word.thailand: ครั้นพระเยซูเสด็จเลยที่นั่นไป ก็ทอดพระเนตรเห็นชายคนหนึ่งชื่อมัทธิวนั่งอยู่ที่ด่านภาษี จึงตรัสกับเขาว่า "จงตามเรามาเถิด" เขาก็ลุกขึ้นตามพระองค์ไป
word.spanish1909: Y pasando Jesús de allí, vió á un hombre que estaba sentado al banco de los públicos tributos, el cual se llamaba Mateo; y dícele: Sígueme. Y se levantó, y le siguió.

word.italian1927: Poi Gesù, partitosi di là, passando, vide un uomo, chiamato Matteo, che sedeva al banco della gabella; e gli disse: Seguimi. Ed egli, levatosi, lo seguì.
word.german1912: Und da Jesus von dannen ging, sah er einen Menschen am Zoll sitzen, der hieß Matthäus; und er sprach zu ihm: Folge mir! Und er stand auf und folgte ihm.
word.french1910: De là étant allé plus loin, Jésus vit un homme assis au lieu des péages, et qui s'appelait Matthieu. Il lui dit: Suis-moi. Cet homme se leva, et le suivit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 呼召馬太（可2:14~17；路5:27~32）耶穌從那裡往前走，看見一個人，名叫馬太，坐在稅關那裡，就對他說：“來跟從我！”他就起來跟從了耶穌。
word.korean: 예수께서 거기서 떠나 지나가시다가 마태라 하는 사람이 세관에 앉은 것을 보시고 이르시되 나를 좇으라 ! 하시니 일어나 좇으니라
word.tagalog: At pagdaraan doon ni Jesus, ay nakita niya ang isang tao, na kung tawagi'y Mateo, na nakaupo sa paningilan ng buwis: at sinabi niya sa kaniya, Sumunod ka sa akin. At siya'y nagtindig, at sumunod sa kaniya.
word.maori: ¶ A, i a Ihu e haere ana i reira, ka kite ia i tetahi tangata, ko Matiu te ingoa, e noho ana i te wahi tango takoha; a ka mea ki a ia, Arumia ahau. Na whakatika ana ia, aru ana i a ia.
word.cebuano: Ug sa miagi si Jesus didto, hingkit-an niya ang usa ka tawo nga ginganlan si Mateo nga nagalingkod sa buhisanan, ug iyang giingon siya: Numunot ka kanako. Ug siya mitindog ug minunot kaniya.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי בעבר ישוע משם וירא איש ישב בבית המכס ושמו מתי ויאמר אליו לכה אחרי ויקם וילך אחריך׃
word.textusreceptus: και παραγων ο ιησους εκειθεν ειδεν ανθρωπον καθημενον επι το τελωνιον ματθαιον λεγομενον και λεγει αυτω ακολουθει μοι και αναστας ηκολουθησεν αυτω

word.kjv: And it came to pass, as Jesus sat at meat in the house, behold, many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples.
word.thailand: ต่อมาเมื่อพระเยซูเอนพระกายลงเสวยอยู่ในเรือน ดูเถิด มีคนเก็บภาษีและคนบาปอื่นๆหลายคนเข้ามาเอนกายลงร่วมสำรับกับพระองค์และกับพวกสาวกของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y aconteció que estando él sentado á la mesa en casa, he aquí que muchos publicanos y pecadores, que habían venido, se sentaron juntamente á la mesa con Jesús y sus discípulos.
word.latinvulgate: Et factum est, discumbente eo in domo, ecce multi publicani et peccatores venientes, discumbebant cum Jesu, et discipulis ejus.
word.italian1927: Ed avvenne che, essendo Gesù a tavola in casa di Matteo, ecco, molti pubblicani e peccatori vennero e si misero a tavola con Gesù e co’ suoi discepoli.
word.german1912: Und es begab sich, da er zu Tische saß im Hause, siehe, da kamen viele Zöllner und Sünder und saßen zu Tische mit Jesu und seinen Jüngern.
word.french1910: Comme Jésus était à table dans la maison, voici, beaucoup de publicains et de gens de mauvaise vie vinrent se mettre à table avec lui et avec ses disciples.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌在屋裡吃飯的時候，有很多稅吏和罪人來與他和門徒一起吃飯。
word.korean: 예수께서 마태의 집에서 앉아 음식을 잡수실 때에 많은 세리와 죄인들이 와서 예수와 그 제자들과 함께 앉았더니
word.tagalog: At nangyari, na nang nakaupo siya sa pagkain sa bahay, narito, ang maraming maniningil ng buwis at mga makasalanan ay nagsirating at nagsiupong kasalo ni Jesus at ng kaniyang mga alagad.
word.maori: A, i a ia e noho ana ki te kai i roto i te whare, na he tokomaha nga pupirikana me nga tangata hara i haere mai, i noho tahi ki a Ihu ratou ko ana akonga.
word.cebuano: Ug nahitabo nga sa milingkod siya sa balay niini aron sa pagkaon, ania karon, nangabut usab ang daghang mga maniningil sa buhis ug mga makasasala, ug nanaglingkod sa pagpangaon kauban ni Jesus ug sa iyang mga tinon-an.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי בהסבו בביתו והנה מוכסים וחטאים רבים באו ויסבו עם ישוע ותלמידיו׃
word.textusreceptus: και εγενετο αυτου ανακειμενου εν τη οικια και ιδου πολλοι τελωναι και αμαρτωλοι ελθοντες συνανεκειντο τω ιησου και τοις μαθηταις αυτου

word.kjv: But when Jesus heard that, he said unto them, They that be whole need not a physician, but they that are sick.

word.spanish1909: Y oyéndolo Jesús, le dijo: Los que están sanos no tienen necesidad de médico, sino los enfermos.

word.italian1927: Ma Gesù, avendoli uditi, disse: Non sono i sani che hanno bisogno del medico, ma i malati.
word.german1912: Da das Jesus hörte, sprach er zu ihnen: Die Starken bedürfen des Arztes nicht, sondern die Kranken.
word.french1910: Ce que Jésus ayant entendu, il dit: Ce ne sont pas ceux qui se portent bien qui ont besoin de médecin, mais les malades.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌聽見了，就說：“健康的人不需要醫生，有病的人才需要，
word.korean: 예수께서 들으시고 이르시되 건강한 자에게는 의원이 쓸데 없고 병든 자에게라야 쓸데 있느니라
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't nang ito'y marinig niya, ay kaniyang sinabi, Ang mga walang sakit ay hindi nangangailangan ng manggagamot, kundi ang mga may sakit.
word.maori: Otira ka rongo a Ihu, ka mea ki a ratou, Kahore he aha o nga tangata ora e meatia ai e te rata, engari o te hunga e mate ana.
word.cebuano: Apan sa hingdunggan kini ni Jesus, miingon kanila: Ang mga maayog lawas wala magakinahanglan ug mananambal, kondili ang mga masakiton lamang.
word.hebrewmodern: וישמע זאת ישוע ויאמר אליהם החזקים אינם צריכים לרפא כי אם החולים׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους ακουσας ειπεν αυτοις ου χρειαν εχουσιν οι ισχυοντες ιατρου αλλ οι κακως εχοντες

word.kjv: And Jesus said unto them, Can the children of the bridechamber mourn, as long as the bridegroom is with them? but the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken from them, and then shall they fast.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสกับเขาว่า "สหายของเจ้าบ่าวเป็นทุกข์โศกเศร้าเมื่อเจ้าบ่าวยังอยู่กับเขาได้หรือ แต่วันหนึ่งเจ้าบ่าวจะต้องจากเขาไป เมื่อนั้นเขาจะถืออดอาหาร
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús les dijo: ¿Pueden los que son de bodas tener luto entre tanto que el esposo está con ellos? mas vendrán días cuando el esposo será quitado de ellos, y entonces ayunarán.
word.latinvulgate: Et ait illis Jesus : Numquid possunt filii sponsi lugere, quamdiu cum illis est sponsus ? Venient autem dies cum auferetur ab eis sponsus : et tunc jejunabunt.
word.italian1927: E Gesù disse loro: Gli amici dello sposo possono essi far cordoglio, finché lo sposo è con loro? Ma verranno i giorni che lo sposo sarà loro tolto, ed allora digiuneranno.
word.german1912: Jesus sprach zu ihnen: Wie können die Hochzeitleute Leid tragen, solange der Bräutigam bei ihnen ist? Es wird aber die Zeit kommen, daß der Bräutigam von ihnen genommen wird; alsdann werden sie fasten.
word.french1910: Jésus leur répondit: Les amis de l'époux peuvent-ils s'affliger pendant que l'époux est avec eux? Les jours viendront où l'époux leur sera enlevé, et alors ils jeûneront.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“新郎跟賓客在一起的時候，賓客怎能哀痛呢？但到了時候，新郎就要從他們中間被取去，那時他們就要禁食了。
word.korean: 예수께서 저희에게 이르시되 혼인집 손님들이 신랑과 함께 있을 동안에 슬퍼할 수 있느뇨 그러나 신랑을 빼앗길 날이 이르리니 그 때에는 금식할 것이니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi sa kanila ni Jesus, Mangyayari bagang mangagluksa ang mga abay sa kasalan, samantalang ang kasintahang lalake ay kasama nila? datapuwa't darating ang mga araw, na ang kasintahang lalake ay aalisin sa kanila, at kung magkagayo'y mangagaayuno sila.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu ki a ratou, E ahei ranei nga tamariki o te whare marena te tangi, i te mea kei a ratou te tane marena hou? Na, tera e tae mai nga ra, e tangohia ai te tane marena hou i a ratou, a ko reira nohopuku ai ratou.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus miingon kanila: Makahimo ba sa pagsubo ang mga kauban sa kaslonon samtang ang pamanhonon anaa pa kauban nila? Apan moabut ra ang mga adlaw nga pagakuhaon kanila ang pamanhonon, ug unya managpuasa na sila.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליהם ישוע איך יוכלו בני החפה להתאבל בעוד החתן עמהם הנה ימים באים ולקח מאתם החתן ואז יצומו׃
word.textusreceptus: και ειπεν αυτοις ο ιησους μη δυνανται οι υιοι του νυμφωνος πενθειν εφ οσον μετ αυτων εστιν ο νυμφιος ελευσονται δε ημεραι οταν απαρθη απ αυτων ο νυμφιος και τοτε νηστευσουσιν

word.kjv: And Jesus arose, and followed him, and so did his disciples.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูจึงทรงลุกขึ้นเสด็จตามเขาไป และพวกสาวกของพระองค์ตามไปด้วย
word.spanish1909: Y se levantó Jesús, y le siguió, y sus discípulos.
word.latinvulgate: Et surgens Jesus, sequebatur eum, et discipuli ejus.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, alzatosi, lo seguiva co’ suoi discepoli.
word.german1912: Und Jesus stand auf und folgte ihm nach und seine Jünger.
word.french1910: Jésus se leva, et le suivit avec ses disciples.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是耶穌和門徒起來跟著他去了。
word.korean: 예수께서 일어나 따라 가시매 제자들도 가더니
word.tagalog: At si Jesus ay nagtindig, at sumama sa kaniya, pati ng kaniyang mga alagad.
word.maori: Na ka whakatika a Ihu ratou ko ana akonga, a aru ana i a ia.
word.cebuano: Ug mitindog si Jesus ug minunot kaniya kauban ang iyang mga tinon-an.
word.hebrewmodern: ויקם ישוע וילך אחריו הוא ותלמידיו׃
word.textusreceptus: και εγερθεις ο ιησους ηκολουθησεν αυτω και οι μαθηται αυτου

word.kjv: But Jesus turned him about, and when he saw her, he said, Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole. And the woman was made whole from that hour.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูทรงเหลียวหลังทอดพระเนตรเห็นนางจึงตรัสว่า "ลูกสาวเอ๋ย จงชื่นใจเถิด ความเชื่อของเจ้าทำให้เจ้าหายเป็นปกติ" นับตั้งแต่เวลานั้น ผู้หญิงนั้นก็หายป่วยเป็นปกติ
word.spanish1909: Mas Jesús volviéndose, y mirándola, dijo: Confía, hija, tu fe te ha salvado. Y la mujer fué salva desde aquella hora.
word.latinvulgate: At Jesus conversus, et videns eam, dixit : Confide, filia, fides tua te salvam fecit. Et salva facta est mulier ex illa hora.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, voltatosi e vedutala, disse: Sta’ di buon animo, figliuola; la tua fede t’ha guarita. E da quell’ora la donna fu guarita.
word.german1912: Da wandte sich Jesus um und sah sie und sprach: Sei getrost, meine Tochter; dein Glaube hat dir geholfen. Und das Weib ward gesund zu derselben Stunde.
word.french1910: Jésus se retourna, et dit, en la voyant: Prends courage, ma fille, ta foi t'a guérie. Et cette femme fut guérie à l'heure même.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌轉過來看見她，就說：“女兒，放心！你的信心使你痊愈了。”從那時起，那女人就好了。
word.korean: 예수께서 돌이켜 그를 보시며 가라사대 딸아 안심하라 네 믿음이 너를 구원하였다 ! 하시니 여자가 그 시로 구원을 받으니라
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't paglingon ni Jesus at pagkakita sa kaniya, ay sinabi, Anak, laksan mo ang iyong loob; pinagaling ka ng iyong pananampalataya. At gumaling ang babae mula sa oras na yaon.

word.cebuano: Apan si Jesus, sa milingi ug nakakita kaniya, miingon: Magmalipayon ka, anak ko, ang imong pagtoo nakaayo kanimo. Ug ang babaye naayo sukad niadtong taknaa.
word.hebrewmodern: ויפן ישוע וירא אותה ויאמר חזקי בתי אמונתך הושיעה לך ותושע האשה מן השעה ההיא׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους επιστραφεις και ιδων αυτην ειπεν θαρσει θυγατερ η πιστις σου σεσωκεν σε και εσωθη η γυνη απο της ωρας εκεινης

word.korean: 저희가 떠나매 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 ? 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐 ?

word.maori: ¶ A, i a raua e haere atu ana, ka timata a Ihu, ka korerotia a Hoani ki te mano, I haere koutou ki te koraha kia kite i te aha? I te kakaho e whakangaueuetia ana e te hau?
word.cebuano: Ug sa milakaw kini sila, misugod si Jesus sa pag-ingon sa katawohan nahatungod kang Juan: Unsa ang giadto ninyo sa pagtan-aw sa kamingawan? Usa ba ka bagakay nga ginahapayhapay sa hangin?

word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสถามเขาว่า "ท่านมีขนมปังกี่ก้อน" เขาทูลว่า "มีเจ็ดก้อนกับปลาเล็กๆสองสามตัว"
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús les dice: ¿Cuántos panes tenéis? Y ellos dijeron: Siete, y unos pocos pececillos.
word.latinvulgate: Et ait illis Jesus : Quot habetis panes ? At illi dixerunt : Septem, et paucos pisciculos.
word.italian1927: E Gesù chiese loro: Quanti pani avete? Ed essi risposero: Sette e pochi pescetti.
word.german1912: Und Jesus sprach zu ihnen: Wie viel Brote habt ihr? Sie sprachen: Sieben und ein wenig Fischlein.
word.french1910: Jésus leur demanda: Combien avez-vous de pains? Sept, répondirent-ils, et quelques petits poissons.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌問他們：“你們有多少餅？”他們說：“七個餅和幾條小魚。”
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 너희에게 떡이 몇 개나 있느냐 ? 가로되 `일곱 개와 작은 생선 두어 마리가 있나이다' 하거늘
word.tagalog: At sinabi ni Jesus sa kanila, Ilang tinapay mayroon kayo? At sinabi nila, Pito, at ilang maliliit na isda.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu ki a ratou, E hia a koutou taro? Ka mea ratou, E whitu, me nga ika nonohi, torutoru nei.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus miingon kanila: Pila ba ang mga tinapay ninyo? Ug sila nanag-ingon: Pito, ug pipila ka book isda nga gagmay.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע אליהם כמה ככרות לחם לכם ויאמרו שבע ומעט דגים קטנים׃
word.textusreceptus: και λεγει αυτοις ο ιησους ποσους αρτους εχετε οι δε ειπον επτα και ολιγα ιχθυδια

word.kjv: Then Jesus said unto them, Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสกับเขาว่า "จงสังเกตและระวังเชื้อแห่งพวกฟาริสีและพวกสะดูสีให้ดี"
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús les dijo: Mirad, y guardaos de la levadura de los Fariseos y de los Saduceos.
word.latinvulgate: Qui dixit illis : Intuemini, et cavete a fermento pharisæorum et sadducæorum.
word.italian1927: E Gesù disse loro: Vedete di guardarvi dal lievito de’ Farisei e de’ Sadducei.
word.german1912: Jesus aber sprach zu ihnen: Sehet zu und hütet euch vor dem Sauerteig der Pharisäer und Sadduzäer!
word.french1910: Jésus leur dit: Gardez-vous avec soin du levain des pharisiens et des sadducéens.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他們說：“你們要小心，提防法利賽人和撒都該人的酵。”
word.korean: 예수께서 이르시되 삼가 바리새인과 사두개인들의 누룩을 주의하라 하신대
word.tagalog: At sinabi sa kanila ni Jesus, Kayo'y mangagingat at magsipangilag sa lebadura ng mga Fariseo at mga Saduceo.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu ki a ratou, Kia mahara kia tupato i te rewena a nga Parihi, a nga Haruki.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus miingon kanila: Tan-awa ninyo ug maglikay kamo sa mga levadura sa mga Fariseo ug sa mga Saduceo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע אליהם ראו והשמרו לכם משאר הפרושים והצדוקים׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους ειπεν αυτοις ορατε και προσεχετε απο της ζυμης των φαρισαιων και σαδδουκαιων

word.kjv: Which when Jesus perceived, he said unto them, O ye of little faith, why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread?
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูทรงทราบจึงตรัสกับเขาว่า "โอ ผู้มีความเชื่อน้อย เหตุไฉนพวกท่านจึงปรึกษากันและกันถึงเรื่องไม่ได้เอาขนมปังมา
word.spanish1909: Y entendiéndolo Jesús, les dijo: ¿Por qué pensáis dentro de vosotros, hombres de poca fe, que no tomasteis pan?
word.latinvulgate: Sciens autem Jesus, dixit : Quid cogitatis intra vos modicæ fidei, quia panes non habetis ?
word.italian1927: Ma Gesù, accortosene, disse: O gente di poca fede, perché ragionate fra voi del non aver de’ pani?
word.german1912: Da das Jesus merkte, sprach er zu ihnen: Ihr Kleingläubigen, was bekümmert ihr euch doch, daß ihr nicht habt Brot mit euch genommen?
word.french1910: Jésus, l'ayant connu, dit: Pourquoi raisonnez-vous en vous-mêmes, gens de peu de foi, sur ce que vous n'avez pas pris de pains?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌知道了，就說：“小信的人，為甚麼議論沒有餅這件事呢？
word.korean: 예수께서 아시고 가라사대 믿음이 적은 자들아 ! 어찌 떡이 없음으로 서로 의논하느냐 ?
word.tagalog: At nang matalastas ni Jesus ay sinabi, Oh kayong kakaunti ang pananampalataya, bakit kayo'y nangagbubulaybulay sa inyong sarili, sapagka't wala kayong tinapay?
word.maori: A ka mohio a Ihu, ka mea ki a ratou, He aha koutou ka korerorero ai ki a koutou, e te hunga whakapono iti, no te mea kihai i maua mai he taro e koutou?
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus, sa hingbaloan niya kini, nag-ingon kanila: Nganong nagtolotimbang kamo sa inyong kaugalingon, mga tawo nga diyutay sa pagtoo, tungod kay wala kamo magdala sa tinapay?
word.hebrewmodern: וידע ישוע ויאמר אליהם קטני האמונה מה תחשבו בלבבכם כי לא לקחתם אתכם לחם׃
word.textusreceptus: γνους δε ο ιησους ειπεν αυτοις τι διαλογιζεσθε εν εαυτοις ολιγοπιστοι οτι αρτους ουκ ελαβετε

word.kjv: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, Whom do men say that I the Son of man am?
word.thailand: ครั้นพระเยซูเสด็จเข้าไปในเขตเมืองซีซารียาฟีลิปปี พระองค์จึงตรัสถามพวกสาวกของพระองค์ว่า "คนทั้งหลายพูดกันว่าเราซึ่งคือบุตรมนุษย์เป็นผู้ใด"
word.spanish1909: Y viniendo Jesús á las partes de Cesarea de Filipo, preguntó á sus discípulos, diciendo: ¿Quién dicen los hombres que es el Hijo del hombre?
word.latinvulgate: Venit autem Jesus in partes Cæsareæ Philippi : et interrogabat discipulos suos, dicens : Quem dicunt homines esse Filium hominis ?
word.italian1927: Poi Gesù, venuto nelle parti di Cesarea di Filippo, domandò ai suoi discepoli: Chi dice la gente che sia il Figliuol dell’uomo?
word.german1912: Da kam Jesus in die Gegend der Stadt Cäsarea Philippi und fragte seine Jünger und sprach: Wer sagen die Leute, daß des Menschen Sohn sei?
word.french1910: Jésus, étant arrivé dans le territoire de Césarée de Philippe, demanda à ses disciples: Qui dit-on que je suis, moi, le Fils de l'homme?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 彼得承認耶穌是基督（可8:27~29；路9:18~20）耶穌來到該撒利亞．腓立比的地區，就問自己的門徒：“人說人子是誰？”
word.korean: 예수께서 가이사랴 빌립보 지방에 이르러 제자들에게 물어 가라사대 사람들이 인자를 누구라 하느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Nang dumating nga si Jesus sa mga sakop ng Cesarea ni Filipo, ay itinanong niya sa kaniyang mga alagad, na sinasabi, Ano baga ang sabi ng mga tao kung sino ang Anak ng tao?
word.maori: ¶ Ka tae a Ihu ki nga wahi o Hiharia Piripai, ka ui ia ki ana akonga, ka mea, Ko wai ra ahau, te Tama a te tangata, ki ta nga tangata ki?
word.cebuano: Ug sa miadto si Jesus sa gingsakpan sa Cesarea ni Felipe, nangutana siya sa iyang mga tinon-an sa pag-ingon: Sumala sa mga pulong sa mga tawo, kinsa man kono ang Anak sa tawo?
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי כבוא ישוע אל גלילות קיסרין של פילפוס וישאל את תלמידיו לאמר מה אמרים האנשים עלי מי הוא בן האדם׃
word.textusreceptus: ελθων δε ο ιησους εις τα μερη καισαρειας της φιλιππου ηρωτα τους μαθητας αυτου λεγων τινα με λεγουσιν οι ανθρωποι ειναι τον υιον του ανθρωπου

word.kjv: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Blessed art thou, Simon Barjona: for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee, but my Father which is in heaven.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบเขาว่า "ซีโมนบุตรโยนาเอ๋ย ท่านก็เป็นสุข เพราะว่าเนื้อหนังและโลหิตมิได้แจ้งความนี้แก่ท่าน แต่พระบิดาของเราผู้ทรงสถิตในสวรรค์ทรงแจ้งให้ทราบ
word.spanish1909: Entonces, respondiendo Jesús, le dijo: Bienaventurado eres, Simón, hijo de Jonás; porque no te lo reveló carne ni sangre, mas mi Padre que está en los cielos.
word.latinvulgate: Respondens autem Jesus, dixit ei : Beatus es Simon Bar Jona : quia caro et sanguis non revelavit tibi, sed Pater meus, qui in cælis est.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, replicando, gli disse: Tu sei beato, o Simone, figliuol di Giona, perché non la carne e il sangue t’hanno rivelato questo, ma il Padre mio che è nei cieli.
word.german1912: Und Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Selig bist du, Simon, Jona's Sohn; denn Fleisch und Blut hat dir das nicht offenbart, sondern mein Vater im Himmel.
word.french1910: Jésus, reprenant la parole, lui dit: Tu es heureux, Simon, fils de Jonas; car ce ne sont pas la chair et le sang qui t'ont révélé cela, mais c'est mon Père qui est dans les cieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他說：“約拿的兒子西門，你是有福的，因為這不是人（“人”原文作“肉和血”）指示你的，而是我在天上的父啟示你的。
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 바요나 시몬아 네가 복이 있도다 이를 네게 알게 한 이는 혈육이 아니요 하늘에 계신 내 아버지시니라
word.tagalog: At sumagot si Jesus at sa kaniya'y sinabi, Mapalad ka, Simon Bar-Jonas: sapagka't hindi ipinahayag sa iyo ito ng laman at ng dugo, kundi ng aking Ama na nasa langit.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, Ka koa koe, e Haimona Parahona: ehara hoki i te kikokiko, i te toto, nana tenei i whakakite ki a koe, engari na toku Matua i te rangi.
word.cebuano: Ug mitubag si Jesus ug miingon kaniya: Bulahan ikaw, Simon, anak ni Jonas, kay wala igapahayag kana kanimo sa unod ug sa dugo, kondili sa akong Amahan nga atua sa langit.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ויאמר אליו אשריך שמעון בר יונה כי בשר ודם לא גלה לך את זאת כי אם אבי שבשמים׃
word.textusreceptus: και αποκριθεις ο ιησους ειπεν αυτω μακαριος ει σιμων βαρ ιωνα οτι σαρξ και αιμα ουκ απεκαλυψεν σοι αλλ ο πατηρ μου ο εν τοις ουρανοις

word.kjv: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ.
word.thailand: แล้วพระองค์ทรงกำชับห้ามเหล่าสาวกของพระองค์ มิให้บอกผู้ใดว่า พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเยซูพระคริสต์ผู้นั้น
word.spanish1909: Entonces mandó á sus discípulos que á nadie dijesen que él era Jesús el Cristo.
word.latinvulgate: Tunc præcepit discipulis suis ut nemini dicerent quia ipse esset Jesus Christus.
word.italian1927: Allora vietò ai suoi discepoli di dire ad alcuno ch’egli era il Cristo.
word.german1912: Da verbot er seinen Jüngern, daß sie niemand sagen sollten, daß er, Jesus, der Christus wäre.
word.french1910: Alors il recommanda aux disciples de ne dire à personne qu'il était le Christ.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是耶穌吩咐門徒不可對人說他就是基督。
word.korean: 이에 제자들을 경계하사 자기가 그리스도인 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y ipinagbilin niya sa mga alagad na huwag sabihin kanino man na siya ang Cristo.
word.maori: Me i reira ka whakatupato ia i ana akonga, kia kaua e korerotia e ratou ki te tangata ko te Karaiti ia.
word.cebuano: Unya nanugon sa iyang mga tinon-an nga dili sila magsugilon bisan kang kinsa, nga siya mao ang Cristo.
word.hebrewmodern: אז צוה את התלמידים בגערה לבלתי הגיד לאיש כי הוא ישוע המשיח׃
word.textusreceptus: τοτε διεστειλατο τοις μαθηταις αυτου ινα μηδενι ειπωσιν οτι αυτος εστιν ιησους ο χριστος

word.kjv: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples, how that he must go unto Jerusalem, and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be killed, and be raised again the third day.
word.thailand: ตั้งแต่เวลานั้นมา พระเยซูทรงเริ่มเผยแก่เหล่าสาวกของพระองค์ว่า พระองค์จะต้องเสด็จไปกรุงเยรูซาเล็ม และจะต้องทนทุกข์ทรมานหลายประการจากพวกผู้ใหญ่และพวกปุโรหิตใหญ่และพวกธรรมาจารย์ จนต้องถูกประหารเสีย แต่ในวันที่สามจะทรงถูกชุบให้เป็นขึ้นมาใหม่
word.spanish1909: Desde aquel tiempo comenzó Jesús á declarar á sus discípulos que le convenía ir á Jerusalem, y padecer mucho de los ancianos, y de los príncipes de los sacerdotes, y de los escribas; y ser muerto, y resucitar al tercer día.
word.latinvulgate: Exinde cœpit Jesus ostendere discipulis suis, quia oporteret eum ire Jerosolymam, et multa pati a senioribus, et scribis, et principibus sacerdotum, et occidi, et tertia die resurgere.
word.italian1927: Da quell’ora Gesù cominciò a dichiarare ai suoi discepoli che doveva andare a Gerusalemme e soffrir molte cose dagli anziani, dai capi sacerdoti e dagli scribi, ed esser ucciso, e risuscitare il terzo giorno.
word.german1912: Von der Zeit an fing Jesus an und zeigte seinen Jüngern, wie er müßte hin gen Jerusalem gehen und viel leiden von den Ältesten und Hohenpriestern und Schriftgelehrten und getötet werden und am dritten Tage auferstehen.
word.french1910: Dès lors Jésus commença à faire connaître à ses disciples qu'il fallait qu'il allât à Jérusalem, qu'il souffrît beaucoup de la part des anciens, des principaux sacrificateurs et des scribes, qu'il fût mis à mort, et qu'il ressuscitât le troisième jour.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌預言受難及復活（可8:31~9:1；路9:22~27）從那時起，耶穌開始向門徒指出，他必須往耶路撒冷去，受長老、祭司長和經學家許多的苦害，並且被殺，第三天復活。
word.korean: 이 때로부터 예수 그리스도께서 자기가 예루살렘에 올라가 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 많은 고난을 받고 죽임을 당하고 제 삼일에 살아나야 할 것을 제자들에게 비로소 가르치시니
word.tagalog: Mula ng panahong yao'y nagpasimulang ipinakilala ni Jesus sa kaniyang mga alagad, na kinakailangang siya'y pumaroon sa Jerusalem, at magbata ng maraming bagay sa matatanda at sa mga pangulong saserdote at sa mga eskriba, at siya'y patayin, at muling ibangon sa ikatlong araw.
word.maori: ¶ No reira mai ano i timata ai a Ihu te whakaatu ki ana akonga, kua takoto te tikanga kia haere ia ki Hiruharama, a he maha nga mamae e mamae ai ia i nga kaumatua, i nga tohunga nui, i nga karaipi, a ka whakamatea ia, a hei te toru o nga ra ka ara.
word.cebuano: Sukad niadtong panahona, misugod si Jesus sa pagpahayag sa iyang mga tinon-an, nga kinahanglan nga moadto siya sa Jerusalem, ug mag-antus ug daghang mga butang gikan sa mga anciano, ug sa mga punoan sa mga sacerdote, ug sa mga escriba, ug pagapatyon siya, ug mabanhaw sa ikatolo ka adlaw.
word.hebrewmodern: מן העת ההיא החל ישוע להורות את תלמידיו שהוא צריך ללכת ירושלים ויענה הרבה בידי הזקנים והכהנים הגדולים והסופרים ויהרג וביום השלישי קום יקום׃
word.textusreceptus: απο τοτε ηρξατο ο ιησους δεικνυειν τοις μαθηταις αυτου οτι δει αυτον απελθειν εις ιεροσολυμα και πολλα παθειν απο των πρεσβυτερων και αρχιερεων και γραμματεων και αποκτανθηναι και τη τριτη ημερα εγερθηναι

word.kjv: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.
word.thailand: ขณะนั้นพระเยซูจึงตรัสกับเหล่าสาวกของพระองค์ว่า "ถ้าผู้ใดใคร่ตามเรามา ให้ผู้นั้นเอาชนะตัวเอง และรับกางเขนของตนแบกและตามเรามา
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús dijo á sus discípulos: Si alguno quiere venir en pos de mí, niéguese á sí mismo, y tome su cruz, y sígame.
word.latinvulgate: Tunc Jesus dixit discipulis suis : Si quis vult post me venire, abneget semetipsum, et tollat crucem suam, et sequatur me.
word.italian1927: Allora Gesù disse ai suoi discepoli: Se uno vuol venire dietro a me, rinunzi a se stesso e prenda la sua croce e mi segua.
word.german1912: Da sprach Jesus zu seinen Jüngern: Will mir jemand nachfolgen, der verleugne sich selbst und nehme sein Kreuz auf sich und folge mir.
word.french1910: Alors Jésus dit à ses disciples: Si quelqu'un veut venir après moi, qu'il renonce à lui-même, qu'il se charge de sa croix, et qu'il me suive.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 於是耶穌對門徒說：“如果有人願意跟從我，就當捨己，背起他的十字架來跟從我。
word.korean: 이에 예수께서 제자들에게 이르시되 아무든지 나를 따라 오려거든 자기를 부인하고 자기 십자가를 지고 나를 좇을 것이니라
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y sinabi ni Jesus sa kaniyang mga alagad, Kung ang sinomang tao'y ibig sumunod sa akin ay tumanggi sa kaniyang sarili, at pasanin ang kaniyang krus, at sumunod sa akin.
word.maori: ¶ Katahi a Ihu ka mea ki ana akonga, Ki te mea tetahi kia haere mai ki te whai i ahau, me whakakahore ia e ia ano, me amo tona ripeka, ka aru ai i ahau.
word.cebuano: Unya si Jesus nag-ingon sa iyang mga tinon-an: Kong kinsa ang buot magsunod kanako, magdumili sa iyang kaugalingon, ug magpas-an sa iyang cruz, ug sumunod kanako.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע אל תלמידיו איש כי יחפץ ללכת אחרי יכחש בנפשו ונשא את צלבו והלך אחרי׃
word.textusreceptus: τοτε ο ιησους ειπεν τοις μαθηταις αυτου ει τις θελει οπισω μου ελθειν απαρνησασθω εαυτον και αρατω τον σταυρον αυτου και ακολουθειτω μοι

word.kjv: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter, James, and John his brother, and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart,
word.thailand: ครั้นล่วงไปได้หกวันแล้ว พระเยซูทรงพาเปโตร ยากอบ และยอห์นน้องชายของยากอบ ขึ้นภูเขาสูงแต่ลำพัง
word.spanish1909: Y DESPUÉS de seis días, Jesús toma á Pedro, y á Jacobo, y á Juan su hermano, y los lleva aparte á un monte alto:
word.latinvulgate: Et post dies sex assumit Jesus Petrum, et Jacobum, et Joannem fratrem ejus, et ducit illos in montem excelsum seorsum :
word.italian1927: Sei giorni dopo, Gesù prese seco Pietro, Giacomo e Giovanni suo fratello, e li condusse sopra un alto monte, in disparte.
word.german1912: Und nach sechs Tagen nahm Jesus zu sich Petrus und Jakobus und Johannes, seinen Bruder, und führte sie beiseits auf einen hohen Berg.
word.french1910: Six jours après, Jésus prit avec lui Pierre, Jacques, et Jean, son frère, et il les conduisit à l'écart sur une haute montagne.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在山上改變形象（可9:2~13；路9:28~36）過了六天，耶穌帶著彼得、雅各和雅各的弟弟約翰，領他們悄悄地上了高山。
word.korean: 엿새 후에 예수께서 베드로와 야고보와 그 형제 요한을 데리시고 따로 높은 산에 올라 가셨더니
word.tagalog: At pagkaraan ng anim na araw, ay isinama ni Jesus si Pedro, at si Santiago, at si Juan na kapatid niya, at sila'y dinalang bukod sa isang mataas na bundok:
word.maori: ¶ A ka pahure nga ra e ono, ka mau a Ihu ki a Pita, ki a Hemi raua ko tona teina ko Hoani, na kawea ana ratou e ia ki runga ki tetahi maunga tiketike ki te wahi motu ke.
word.cebuano: Ug sa tapus ang ikaunom ka adlaw gidala ni Jesus kauban niya si Pedro, ug si Jacobo, ug si Juan nga iyang igsoon ngadto sa usa ka hataas nga bukid nga hawa:
word.hebrewmodern: ומקץ ששת ימים לקח לו ישוע את פטרוס ואת יעקב ואת יוחנן אחיו ויעלם בדד על הר גבוה׃
word.textusreceptus: και μεθ ημερας εξ παραλαμβανει ο ιησους τον πετρον και ιακωβον και ιωαννην τον αδελφον αυτου και αναφερει αυτους εις ορος υψηλον κατ ιδιαν

word.kjv: Then answered Peter, and said unto Jesus, Lord, it is good for us to be here: if thou wilt, let us make here three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายเปโตรทูลพระเยซูว่า "พระองค์เจ้าข้า ซึ่งพวกข้าพระองค์อยู่ที่นี่ก็ดี ถ้าพระองค์ต้องพระประสงค์ พวกข้าพระองค์จะทำพลับพลาสามหลังที่นี่ สำหรับพระองค์หลังหนึ่ง สำหรับโมเสสหลังหนึ่ง สำหรับเอลียาห์หลังหนึ่ง"
word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Pedro, dijo á Jesús: Señor, bien es que nos quedemos aquí: si quieres, hagamos aquí tres pabellones: para ti uno, y para Moisés otro, y otro para Elías.
word.latinvulgate: Respondens autem Petrus, dixit ad Jesum : Domine, bonum est nos hic esse : si vis, faciamus tria tabernacula, tibi unum, Moysi unum, et Eliæ unum.
word.italian1927: E Pietro prese a dire a Gesù: Signore, egli è bene che stiamo qui; se vuoi, farò qui tre tende: una per te, una per Mosè ed una per Elia.
word.german1912: Petrus aber antwortete und sprach zu Jesu: HERR, hier ist gut sein! Willst du, so wollen wir hier drei Hütten machen: dir eine, Mose eine und Elia eine.
word.french1910: Pierre, prenant la parole, dit à Jésus: Seigneur, il est bon que nous soyons ici; si tu le veux, je dresserai ici trois tentes, une pour toi, une pour Moïse, et une pour Elie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 彼得對耶穌說：“主啊，我們在這裡真好。如果你願意，我就在這裡搭三個帳棚，一個為你，一個為摩西，一個為以利亞。”
word.korean: 베드로가 예수께 여짜와 가로되 `주여 우리가 여기 있는 것이 좋사오니 주께서 만일 원하시면 내가 여기서 초막 셋을 짓되 하나는 주를 위하여, 하나는 모세를 위하여, 하나는 엘리야를 위하여 하리이다'
word.tagalog: At sumagot si Pedro, at sinabi kay Jesus, Panginoon, mabuti sa atin ang tayo'y dumito: kung ibig mo, ay gagawa ako rito ng tatlong tabernakulo; isa ang sa iyo, at isa ang kay Moises, at isa ang kay Elias.
word.maori: Katahi ka oho a Pita, ka mea ki a Ihu, E te Ariki, he pai kia noho tatou i konei: ki te pai koe, ma matou e hanga etahi wharau ki konei kia toru; kia kotahi mou, kia kotahi mo Mohi, kia kotahi mo Iraia.
word.cebuano: Ug si Pedro mitubag ug miingon kang Jesus: Ginoo, maayo nga magpabilin kita dinhi; kong buot ka, magbuhat ako dinhi tolo ka payag: usa alang kanimo, ug usa alang kang Moises, ug usa alang kang Elias.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען פטרוס ויאמר אל ישוע אדני טוב היותנו פה אם תחפץ נעשה נא פה שלש סכות לך אחת ולמשה אחת ולאליהו אחת׃
word.textusreceptus: αποκριθεις δε ο πετρος ειπεν τω ιησου κυριε καλον εστιν ημας ωδε ειναι ει θελεις ποιησωμεν ωδε τρεις σκηνας σοι μιαν και μωση μιαν και μιαν ηλια

word.kjv: And Jesus came and touched them, and said, Arise, and be not afraid.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงเสด็จมาถูกต้องเขา แล้วตรัสว่า "จงลุกขึ้นเถิด อย่ากลัวเลย"
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús llegando, los tocó, y dijo: Levantaos, y no temáis.

word.italian1927: Ma Gesù, accostatosi, li toccò e disse: Levatevi, e non temete.
word.german1912: Jesus aber trat zu ihnen, rührte sie an und sprach: Stehet auf und fürchtet euch nicht!

word.korean: 예수께서 나아가 저희에게 손을 대시며 가라사대 일어나라 두려워 말라 하신대
word.tagalog: At lumapit si Jesus at sila'y tinapik, at sinabi, Mangagbangon kayo, at huwag kayong mangatakot.
word.maori: Na ka haere a Ihu, ka pa ki a ratou, ka mea, Whakatika, kaua e wehi.
word.cebuano: Ug sa miduot si Jesus, iyang gikablit sila ug nagaingon: Tumindog kamo, ug dili kamo mangahadlok.
word.hebrewmodern: ויגש ישוע ויגע בם ויאמר קומו ואל תיראו׃
word.textusreceptus: και προσελθων ο ιησους ηψατο αυτων και ειπεν εγερθητε και μη φοβεισθε

word.kjv: And when they had lifted up their eyes, they saw no man, save Jesus only.
word.thailand: เมื่อเขาเงยหน้าดูก็ไม่เห็นผู้ใด เห็นแต่พระเยซูองค์เดียว

word.italian1927: Ed essi, alzati gli occhi, non videro alcuno, se non Gesù tutto solo.
word.german1912: Da sie aber ihre Augen aufhoben, sahen sie niemand denn Jesum allein.
word.french1910: Ils levèrent les yeux, et ne virent que Jésus seul.

word.korean: 제자들이 눈을 들고 보매 오직 ! 예수 외에는 아무도 보이지 아니하더라
word.tagalog: At sa paglingap ng kanilang mga mata, ay wala silang nakitang sinoman, kundi si Jesus lamang.
word.maori: A, no ka ara ake o ratou kanohi, kahore he tangata i kitea e ratou, ko Ihu anake.
word.cebuano: Ug sa giyahat nila ang ilang mga mata, wala silay hingkit-an nga lain kondili si Jesus na lamang.
word.hebrewmodern: וישאו עיניהם ולא ראו איש בלתי את ישוע לבדו׃
word.textusreceptus: επαραντες δε τους οφθαλμους αυτων ουδενα ειδον ει μη τον ιησουν μονον

word.kjv: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying, Tell the vision to no man, until the Son of man be risen again from the dead.
word.thailand: ขณะที่ลงมาจากภูเขา พระเยซูตรัสห้ามเหล่าสาวกว่า "นิมิตซึ่งพวกท่านได้เห็นนั้น อย่าบอกเล่าแก่ผู้ใดจนกว่าบุตรมนุษย์จะฟื้นขึ้นมาจากความตาย"
word.spanish1909: Y como descendieron del monte, les mandó Jesús, diciendo: No digáis á nadie la visión, hasta que el Hijo del hombre resucite de los muertos.
word.latinvulgate: Et descendentibus illis de monte, præcepit eis Jesus, dicens : Nemini dixeritis visionem, donec Filius hominis a mortuis resurgat.
word.italian1927: Poi, mentre scendevano dal monte, Gesù diede loro quest’ordine: Non parlate di questa visione ad alcuno, finché il Figliuol dell’uomo sia risuscitato dai morti.
word.german1912: Und da sie vom Berge herabgingen, gebot ihnen Jesus und sprach: Ihr sollt dies Gesicht niemand sagen, bis das des Menschen Sohn von den Toten auferstanden ist.
word.french1910: Comme ils descendaient de la montagne, Jésus leur donna cet ordre: Ne parlez à personne de cette vision, jusqu'à ce que le Fils de l'homme soit ressuscité des morts.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們下山的時候，耶穌吩咐他們：“人子從死人中復活以前，你們不要把所看見的異象告訴人。”
word.korean: 저희가 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 명하여 가라사대 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나기 전에는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니
word.tagalog: At habang sila'y nagsisibaba mula sa bundok, ay iniutos sa kanila ni Jesus, na nagsasabi, Huwag ninyong sabihin kanino mang tao ang pangitain, hanggang sa ang Anak ng tao ay ibangon sa mga patay.
word.maori: Na, i a ratou e heke iho ana i te maunga, ka whakatupato a Ihu i a ratou, ka mea, Kaua e korerotia ki te tangata te mea i kitea nei, kia ara ake ra ano te Tama a te tangata i te hunga mate.
word.cebuano: Ug sa nagalugsong sila sa bukid, nagsugo kanila si Jesus, nga nagaingon: Dili kamo magsugilon bisan kang kinsa sa inyong nakita hangtud nga ang Anak sa tawo mabanhaw sa mga minatay.
word.hebrewmodern: וברדתם מן ההר צוה ישוע אתם לאמר לא תגידו לאיש את דבר המראה עד אם קם בן האדם מעם המתים׃
word.textusreceptus: και καταβαινοντων αυτων απο του ορους ενετειλατο αυτοις ο ιησους λεγων μηδενι ειπητε το οραμα εως ου ο υιος του ανθρωπου εκ νεκρων αναστη

word.kjv: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Elias truly shall first come, and restore all things.

word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Jesús, les dijo: á la verdad, Elías vendrá primero, y restituirá todas las cosas.

word.italian1927: Ed egli, rispondendo, disse loro: Certo, Elia deve venire e ristabilire ogni cosa.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihnen: Elia soll ja zuvor kommen und alles zurechtbringen.
word.french1910: Il répondit: Il est vrai qu'Elie doit venir, et rétablir toutes choses.

word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 엘리야가 과연 먼저 와서 모든 일을 회복하리라
word.tagalog: At sumagot siya, at sinabi, Katotohanang si Elias ay paririto, at isasauli ang lahat ng mga bagay:

word.cebuano: Ug sa mitubag si Jesus, nag-ingon kanila: Oo, matuod nga si Elias moanhi ug magapahauli sa tanang mga butang:
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליהם הנה אליהו בא בראשונה והשיב את הכל׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους αποκριθεις ειπεν αυτοις ηλιας μεν ερχεται πρωτον και αποκαταστησει παντα

word.kjv: Then Jesus answered and said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I suffer you? bring him hither to me.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบว่า "โอ คนในยุคที่ขาดความเชื่อและมีทิฐิชั่ว เราจะต้องอยู่กับท่านทั้งหลายนานเท่าใด เราจะต้องอดทนเพราะท่านไปถึงไหน จงพาเด็กนั้นมาหาเราที่นี่เถิด"
word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Jesús, dijo: ­Oh generación infiel y torcida! ¿hasta cuándo tengo de estar con vosotros? ¿hasta cuándo os tengo de sufrir? traédmele acá.

word.italian1927: E Gesù, rispondendo, disse: O generazione incredula e perversa! Fino a quando sarò con voi? Fino a quando vi sopporterò? Menatemelo qua.
word.german1912: Jesus aber antwortete und sprach: O du ungläubige und verkehrte Art, wie lange soll ich bei euch sein? wie lange soll ich euch dulden? Bringt ihn hierher!
word.french1910: Race incrédule et perverse, répondit Jésus, jusques à quand serai-je avec vous? jusques à quand vous supporterai-je? Amenez-le-moi ici.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“唉！這又不信又乖謬的世代啊！我要跟你們在一起到幾時呢？我要忍受你們到幾時呢？把孩子帶到我這裡來吧。”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 믿음이 없고 패역한 세대여 ! 내가 얼마나 너희와 함께 있으며 얼마나 너희를 참으리요 그를 이리로 데려오라 하시다
word.tagalog: At sumagot si Jesus at sinabi, Oh lahing walang pananampalataya at taksil, hanggang kailan titiisin ko kayo? dalhin ninyo siya rito sa akin.
word.maori: Na ka oho a Ihu, ka mea, E te uri whakaponokore, parori ke, kia pehea te roa o toku noho ki a koutou? Kia pehea te roa o toku manawanui ki a koutou? Kawea mai ia ki konei, ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Ug sa mitubag si Jesus, nag-ingon: Oh, kaliwatan nga walay pagtoo ug masukihon! Hangtud anus-a magapuyo ako kauban ninyo? Hangtud anus-a pagaantuson ko kamo? Dad-a ninyo siya dinhi kanako.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר הוי דור בלתי מאמין ופתלתל עד מתי אהיה עמכם עד מתי אסבל אתכם הביאו אותו אלי הנה׃
word.textusreceptus: αποκριθεις δε ο ιησους ειπεν ω γενεα απιστος και διεστραμμενη εως ποτε εσομαι μεθ υμων εως ποτε ανεξομαι υμων φερετε μοι αυτον ωδε

word.german1912: Und Jesus bedrohte ihn; und der Teufel fuhr aus von ihm, und der Knabe ward gesund zu derselben Stunde.

word.maori: Na ka riria te rewera e Ihu; a puta ana i roto i a ia; a ora ake te tamaiti i taua wa pu ano.

word.textusreceptus: και επετιμησεν αυτω ο ιησους και εξηλθεν απ αυτου το δαιμονιον και εθεραπευθη ο παις απο της ωρας εκεινης

word.thailand: ภายหลังเหล่าสาวกมาหาพระเยซูเป็นส่วนตัวทูลถามว่า "เหตุไฉนพวกข้าพระองค์ขับผีนั้นออกไม่ได้"

word.german1912: Da traten zu ihm seine Jünger besonders und sprachen: Warum konnten wir ihn nicht austreiben?

word.maori: Na ko te kianga a Ihu, Tukua mai nga tamariki nonohi, aua hoki e araia atu ta ratou haere mai ki ahau: no nga penei hoki te rangatiratanga o te rangi.

word.german1912: Jesus sprach zu ihm: Willst du vollkommen sein, so gehe hin, verkaufe, was du hast, und gib's den Armen, so wirst du einen Schatz im Himmel haben; und komm und folge mir nach!
word.french1910: Jésus lui dit: Si tu veux être parfait, va, vends ce que tu possèdes, donne-le aux pauvres, et tu auras un trésor dans le ciel. Puis viens, et suis-moi.

word.cebuano: Miingon si Jesus kaniya: Kong buot ka maghingpit, lumakaw ka, ibaligya mo ang imong kahimtang, ug ihatag mo sa mga kabus; ug may bahandi ka sa langit; ug umari ka ug sumunod kanako.

word.kjv: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.

word.kjv: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.

word.french1910: Jésus leur répondit: Je vous le dis en vérité, quand le Fils de l'homme, au renouvellement de toutes choses, sera assis sur le trône de sa gloire, vous qui m'avez suivi, vous serez de même assis sur douze trônes, et vous jugerez les douze tribus d'Israël.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他們說：“我實在告訴你們，到了萬物更新，人子坐在他榮耀的寶座上的時候，你們這些跟從我的人，也會坐在十二個寶座上，審判以色列的十二個支派。
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 세상이 새롭게 되어 인자가 자기 영광의 보좌에 앉을 때에 나를 좇는 너희도 열 두 보좌에 앉아 이스라엘 열 두 지파를 심판하리라
word.tagalog: At sinabi ni Jesus sa kanila, Katotohanang sinasabi ko sa inyo, na kayong nagsisunod sa akin, sa pagbabagong lahi pagka uupo na ang Anak ng tao sa luklukan ng kaniyang kaluwalhatian, kayo nama'y magsisiupo sa labingdalawang luklukan, upang magsihukom sa labingdalawang angkan ng Israel.
word.maori: Ka ki a Ihu ki a ratou, He pono taku e mea nei ki a koutou, Ko koutou i aru nei i ahau, kia taea te whanautanga houtanga, te wa e noho ai te Tama a te tangata ki runga ki te torona o tona kororia, ka noho ano koutou ki runga ki etahi torona kota hi tekau ma rua, ki te whakawa i nga iwi kotahi tekau ma rua o Iharaira.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus nag-ingon kanila: Sa pagkamatuod nagaingon ako kaninyo, nga kamo nga misunod kanako, sa panahon sa pagbag-o sa tanan nga ang Anak sa tawo magalingkod sa lingkoranan nga harianon sa iyang himaya, kamo magalingkod usab sa napulo ug duha ka lingkoranan nga harianon, sa paghukom sa napulo ug duha ka banay ni Israel.

word.maori: ¶ A, i a Ihu e haere ana ki Hiruharama, i a ratou i te ara, ka kawea e ia ana akonga kotahi tekau ma rua ki tahaki, a ka mea ki a ratou,

word.textusreceptus: και αναβαινων ο ιησους εις ιεροσολυμα παρελαβεν τους δωδεκα μαθητας κατ ιδιαν εν τη οδω και ειπεν αυτοις

word.thailand: แต่พระเยซูตรัสตอบว่า "ที่ท่านขอนั้นท่านไม่เข้าใจ ถ้วยซึ่งเราจะดื่มนั้นท่านจะดื่มได้หรือ และบัพติศมานั้นซึ่งเราจะรับ ท่านจะรับได้หรือ" เขาทูลพระองค์ว่า "พวกข้าพระองค์ทำได้"

word.latinvulgate: Respondens autem Jesus, dixit : Nescitis quid petatis. Potestis bibere calicem, quem ego bibiturus sum ? Dicunt ei : Possumus.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, rispondendo, disse: Voi non sapete quel che chiedete. Potete voi bere il calice che io sto per bere? Essi gli dissero: Sì, lo possiamo.
word.german1912: Aber Jesus antwortete und sprach: Ihr wisset nicht, was ihr bittet. Könnt ihr den Kelch trinken, den ich trinken werde, und euch taufen lassen mit der Taufe, mit der ich getauft werde? Sie sprachen zu ihm: Jawohl.
word.french1910: Jésus répondit: Vous ne savez ce que vous demandez. Pouvez-vous boire la coupe que je dois boire? Nous le pouvons, dirent-ils.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“你們不知道你們求的是甚麼。我將要喝的杯，你們能喝嗎？”他們說：“能。”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 너희 구하는 것을 너희가 알지 못하는도다 나의 마시려는 잔을 너희가 마실 수 있느냐 ? 저희가 말하되 `할 수 있나이다'
word.tagalog: Nguni't sumagot si Jesus at sinabi, Hindi ninyo nalalaman ang inyong hinihingi. Mangyayari bagang inuman ninyo ang sarong malapit nang aking iinuman? Sa kaniya'y sinabi nila, Mangyayari.
word.maori: Otira ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea, Kahore korua e mohio ki ta korua e inoi nei. E ahei ranei korua te inu i te kapu meake inumia e ahau, kia iriiria hoki ki te iriiringa ka iriiria nei ahau? Ka mea raua ki a ia, E ahei ano.
word.cebuano: Apan sa mitubag si Jesus, nag-ingon: Wala ninyo hibaloi ang inyong gipangayo. Arang ba kamo makainum sa copa nga akong pagaimnan? Nagaingon sila kaniya: Arang kami.

word.tagalog: At sinabi nila sa kaniya, Naririnig mo baga ang sinasabi ng mga ito? At sinabi sa kanila ni Jesus, Oo: kailan man baga'y hindi ninyo nabasa, Mula sa bibig ng mga sanggol at ng mga sumususo ay iyong nilubos ang pagpupuri?
word.maori: Ka mea ki a ia, E rongo ana koe ki ta enei e mea nei? Ka mea a Ihu ki a ratou, Ae ra; kiano koutou i kite noa, Pumau tonu i a koe te whakamoemiti a te waha o nga kohungahunga, o nga mea ngote u?
word.cebuano: Ug nanag-ingon kaniya: Hingdunggan mo ba kining ginaingon nila? Si Jesus miingon kanila: Oo. Wala ba gayud ninyo hibasahi: Sa baba sa mga bata ug sa mga nagasuso, gihingpit mo ang pagdayeg?

word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Jesús les dijo: De cierto os digo, que si tuviereis fe, y no dudareis, no sólo haréis esto de la higuera: mas si á este monte dijereis: Quítate y échate en la mar, será hecho.
