word.tagalog: Nangyari nga, nang mabautismuhan ang buong bayan, na si Jesus ay binautismuhan naman, at nang nananalangin, ay nabuksan ang langit,
word.maori: ¶ Na, ka poto katoa te iwi te iriiri, i a Ihu kua oti te iriiri, a i a ia e inoi ana, ka tuwhera te rangi,
word.cebuano: Karon nahitabo nga sa gibautismohan ang tanang katawohan, nga sa nabautismohan usab si Jesus, ug sa nagaampo, ang langit naabli,
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי בהטבל כל העם וגם ישוע נטבל ומתפלל ויפתחו השמים׃
word.textusreceptus: εγενετο δε εν τω βαπτισθηναι απαντα τον λαον και ιησου βαπτισθεντος και προσευχομενου ανεωχθηναι τον ουρανον

word.kjv: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age, being (as was supposed) the son of Joseph, which was the son of Heli,
word.thailand: เมื่อพระเยซูทรงมีพระชนมายุประมาณสามสิบพรรษา (ตามความคาดหมายของคนทั้งหลาย) เข้าใจว่าเป็นบุตรโยเซฟ ซึ่งเป็นบุตรเฮลี
word.spanish1909: Y el mismo Jesús comenzaba á ser como de treinta años, hijo de José, como se creía; que fué hijo de Elí,
word.latinvulgate: Et ipse Jesus erat incipiens quasi annorum triginta, ut putabatur, filius Joseph, qui fuit Heli, qui fuit Mathat,
word.italian1927: E Gesù, quando cominciò anch’egli ad insegnare, avea circa trent’anni ed era figliuolo come credevasi, di Giuseppe,
word.german1912: Und Jesus war, da er anfing, ungefähr dreißig Jahre alt, und ward gehalten für einen Sohn Josephs, welcher war ein Sohn Eli's,
word.french1910: Jésus avait environ trente ans lorsqu'il commença son ministère, étant, comme on le croyait, fils de Joseph, fils d'Héli,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌的家譜（太1:1~17）耶穌開始傳道，年約三十歲，人以為他是約瑟的兒子，約瑟是希里的兒子，
word.korean: 예수께서 가르치심을 시작할 때에 삼십세 쯤 되시니라 사람들의 아는대로는 요셉의 아들이니 요셉의 이상은 헬리요
word.tagalog: At si Jesus din, nang magpasimula siyang magturo ay may gulang na tatlongpung taon, na anak (ayon sa sinasapantaha) ni Jose, ni Eli,
word.maori: Na ko Ihu, i a ia i timata ai ki te whakaako, kei te toru tekau ona tau, a ki ta te tangata ki, he tama ia na Hohepa, tama a Heri,
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus sa iyang kaugalingon, sa pagsugod niya sa pagtudlo, may mga katloan ka tuig ang iyang panuigon; siya anak ni Jose, (ingon sa gihunahuna) nga anak ni Eli,
word.hebrewmodern: והוא ישוע בהחלו היה כבן שלשים שנה ויחשבהו לבן יוסף בן עלי׃
word.textusreceptus: και αυτος ην ο ιησους ωσει ετων τριακοντα αρχομενος ων ως ενομιζετο υιος ιωσηφ του ηλι

word.kjv: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,
word.thailand: พระเยซูประกอบด้วยพระวิญญาณบริสุทธิ์ได้เสด็จกลับไปจากแม่น้ำจอร์แดน และพระวิญญาณได้ทรงนำพระองค์ไปในถิ่นทุรกันดาร
word.spanish1909: Y JESUS, lleno del Espíritu Santo, volvió del Jordán, y fué llevado por el Espíritu al desierto
word.latinvulgate: Jesus autem plenus Spiritu Sancto regressus est a Jordane : et agebatur a Spiritu in desertum
word.italian1927: Or Gesù, ripieno dello Spirito Santo, se ne ritornò dal Giordano, e fu condotto dallo Spirito nel deserto per quaranta giorni, ed era tentato dal diavolo.
word.german1912: Jesus aber, voll des heiligen Geistes, kam wieder von dem Jordan und ward vom Geist in die Wüste geführt
word.french1910: Jésus, rempli du Saint-Esprit, revint du Jourdain, et il fut conduit par l'Esprit dans le désert,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌受試探（太4:1~11；可1:12~13）耶穌被聖靈充滿，從約旦河回來，聖靈引他到曠野，四十天受魔鬼的試探。
word.korean: 예수께서 성령의 충만함을 입어 요단강에서 돌아오사 광야에서 사십 일 동안 성령에게 이끌리시며
word.tagalog: At si Jesus, na puspos ng Espiritu Santo ay bumalik mula sa Jordan at inihatid ng Espiritu sa ilang,
word.maori: ¶ Na, ko Ihu, ki tonu i te Wairua Tapu, hoki atu ana i Horano, a ka arahina e te Wairua i te koraha,
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus nga puno sa Espiritu Santo, mipauli gikan sa Jordan; ug gidala sa Espiritu ngadto sa kamingawan,
word.hebrewmodern: וישוע שב מן הירדן מלא רוח הקדש וינהגהו הרוח המדברה׃
word.textusreceptus: ιησους δε πνευματος αγιου πληρης υπεστρεψεν απο του ιορδανου και ηγετο εν τω πνευματι εις την ερημον

word.kjv: And Jesus answered him, saying, It is written, That man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูตรัสตอบมารว่า "มีพระคัมภีร์เขียนไว้ว่า `มนุษย์จะบำรุงชีวิตด้วยอาหารสิ่งเดียวก็หามิได้ แต่บำรุงด้วยพระวจนะทุกคำของพระเจ้า'"
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús respondiéndole, dijo: Escrito está: Que no con pan solo vivirá el hombre, mas con toda palabra de Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Et respondit ad illum Jesus : Scriptum est : Quia non in solo pane vivit homo, sed in omni verbo Dei.
word.italian1927: E Gesù gli rispose: Sta scritto: Non di pane soltanto vivrà l’uomo.
word.german1912: Und Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Es steht geschrieben: "Der Mensch lebt nicht allein vom Brot, sondern von einem jeglichen Wort Gottes."
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Il est écrit: L'Homme ne vivra pas de pain seulement.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“經上記著：‘人活著不是單靠食物。’”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하시되 `기록하기를 사람이 떡으로만 살 것이 아니라 하였느니라'
word.tagalog: At sinagot siya ni Jesus, Nasusulat, Hindi sa tinapay lamang mabubuhay ang tao.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu ki a ia, ka mea, Kua oti te tuhituhi, E kore e ora te tangata i te taro kau, engari a nga kupu katoa a te Atua.
word.cebuano: Ug mitubag kaniya si Jesus, nga nagaingon: Nahasulat na: Dili sa tinapay lamang mabuhi ang tawo, kondili sa tanang pulong sa Dios.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען אתו ישוע הן כתוב כי לא על הלחם לבדו יחיה האדם כי על כל מוצא פי יהוה׃
word.textusreceptus: και απεκριθη ιησους προς αυτον λεγων γεγραπται οτι ουκ επ αρτω μονω ζησεται ο ανθρωπος αλλ επι παντι ρηματι θεου

word.kjv: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Get thee behind me, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูตรัสตอบมารว่า "อ้ายซาตาน จงไปให้พ้น มีพระคัมภีร์เขียนไว้ว่า `จงนมัสการองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าผู้เป็นพระเจ้าของท่าน และปรนนิบัติพระองค์แต่ผู้เดียว'"
word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Jesús, le dijo: Vete de mí, Satanás, porque escrito está: A tu Señor Dios adorarás, y á él solo servirás.
word.latinvulgate: Et respondens Jesus, dixit illi : Scriptum est : Dominum Deum tuum adorabis, et illi soli servies.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, rispondendo, gli disse: Sta scritto: Adora il Signore Iddio tuo, e a lui solo rendi il tuo culto.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete ihm und sprach: Es steht geschrieben: "Du sollst Gott, deinen HERRN, anbeten und ihm allein dienen." {~} {~} {~} {~}
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Il est écrit: Tu adoreras le Seigneur, ton Dieu, et tu le serviras lui seul.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“經上記著：‘當拜主你的　神，單要事奉他。’”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 기록하기를 `주 너의 하나님께 경배하고 다만 그를 섬기라 하였느니라'
word.tagalog: At si Jesus ay sumagot at sinabi sa kaniya, Nasusulat, Sa Panginoon mong Dios sasamba ka, at siya lamang ang iyong paglilingkuran.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu ki a ia, ka mea, Kua oti te tuhituhi, Me koropiko koe ki te Ariki, ki tou Atua, me mahi ano ki a ia anake.
word.cebuano: Ug mitubag kaniya si Jesus ug nag-ingon: Pahawa ka sa akong atubangan, satanas; kay nahasulat na: Magsimba ka sa imong Ginoong Dios, ug kaniya lamang mag-alagad ikaw.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליו סור ממני השטן כי כתוב ליהוה אלהיך תשתחוה ואתו תעבד׃
word.textusreceptus: και αποκριθεις αυτω ειπεν ο ιησους υπαγε οπισω μου σατανα γεγραπται γαρ προσκυνησεις κυριον τον θεον σου και αυτω μονω λατρευσεις

word.kjv: And Jesus answering said unto him, It is said, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสตอบมารว่า "มีคำกล่าวไว้ว่า `อย่าทดลององค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าผู้เป็นพระเจ้าของท่าน'"
word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Jesús, le dijo: Dicho está: No tentarás al Señor tu Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Et respondens Jesus, ait illi : Dictum est : Non tentabis Dominum Deum tuum.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, rispondendo, gli disse: E’ stato detto: Non tentare il Signore Iddio tuo.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Es ist gesagt: "Du sollst Gott, deinen HERRN, nicht versuchen."
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Il est dit: Tu ne tenteras point le Seigneur, ton Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“經上說：‘不可試探主你的　神。’”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `말씀하기를 주 너의 하나님을 시험치 말라 하였느니라'
word.tagalog: At pagsagot ni Jesus ay sinabi sa kaniya, Nasasabi, Huwag mong tutuksuhin ang Panginoon mong Dios.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, Kua takoto te korero, Aua e whakamatautau ki te Ariki, ki tou Atua.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus mitubag ug nag-ingon kaniya: Giingon na: Dili mo pagpanulayon ang Ginoo nga imong Dios.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליו נאמר לא תנסה את יהוה אלהיך׃
word.textusreceptus: και αποκριθεις ειπεν αυτω ο ιησους οτι ειρηται ουκ εκπειρασεις κυριον τον θεον σου

word.kjv: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee: and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about.
word.thailand: พระเยซูได้เสด็จกลับไปด้วยฤทธิ์เดชแห่งพระวิญญาณยังแคว้นกาลิลี และกิตติศัพท์ของพระองค์เลื่องลือไปตามถิ่นโดยรอบ
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús volvió en virtud del Espíritu á Galilea, y salió la fama de él por toda la tierra de alrededor,
word.latinvulgate: Et regressus est Jesus in virtute Spiritus in Galilæam, et fama exiit per universam regionem de illo.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, nella potenza dello Spirito, se ne tornò in Galilea; e la sua fama si sparse per tutta la contrada circonvicina.
word.german1912: Und Jesus kam wieder in des Geistes Kraft nach Galiläa; und das Gerücht erscholl von ihm durch alle umliegenden Orte.
word.french1910: Jésus, revêtu de la puissance de l'Esprit, retourna en Galilée, et sa renommée se répandit dans tout le pays d'alentour.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在加利利傳道（太4:12~17；可1:14~15）耶穌帶著聖靈的能力，回到加利利。他的名聲傳遍了周圍各地。
word.korean: 예수께서 성령의 권능으로 갈릴리에 돌아가시니 그 소문이 사방에 퍼졌고
word.tagalog: At bumalik si Jesus sa Galilea sa kapangyarihan ng Espiritu: at kumalat ang kabantugan tungkol sa kaniya sa palibot ng buong lupain.
word.maori: ¶ Na ka hoki a Ihu i runga i te kaha o te Wairua ki Kariri: a haere ana tona rongo a puta noa i nga wahi tata katoa.
word.cebuano: Ug mibalik si Jesus sa gahum sa Espiritu ngadto sa Galilea; ug nasangyaw ang iyang kabantugan sa tibook kayutaan nga nagalibut.
word.hebrewmodern: וישב ישוע בגבורת הרוח אל הגליל ויצא שמעו בכל הככר׃
word.textusreceptus: και υπεστρεψεν ο ιησους εν τη δυναμει του πνευματος εις την γαλιλαιαν και φημη εξηλθεν καθ ολης της περιχωρου περι αυτου

word.kjv: Saying, Let us alone; what have we to do with thee, thou Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art; the Holy One of God.
word.thailand: กล่าวว่า "ไฮ้ พระเยซูชาวนาซาเร็ธ ปล่อยเราไว้ ท่านมายุ่งกับเราทำไม ท่านมาทำลายพวกเราหรือ เรารู้ว่าท่านเป็นผู้ใด ท่านคือองค์บริสุทธิ์ของพระเจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Diciendo: Déjanos, ¿qué tenemos contigo Jesús Nazareno? ¿has venido á destruirnos? Yo te conozco quién eres, el Santo de Dios.
word.latinvulgate: dicens : Sine, quid nobis et tibi, Jesu Nazarene ? venisti perdere nos ? scio te quis sis, Sanctus Dei.
word.italian1927: Che v’è fra noi e te, o Gesù Nazareno? Se’ tu venuto per perderci? Io so chi tu sei: il Santo di Dio!
word.german1912: und sprach: Halt, was haben wir mit dir zu schaffen, Jesus von Nazareth? Du bist gekommen uns zu verderben. Ich weiß wer du bist: der heilige Gottes.
word.french1910: Ah! qu'y a-t-il entre nous et toi, Jésus de Nazareth? Tu es venu pour nous perdre. Je sais qui tu es: le Saint de Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: “哎！拿撒勒人耶穌，我們跟你有甚麼關係呢？你來毀滅我們嗎？我知道你是誰，你是　神的聖者。”
word.korean: `아, 나사렛 예수여 ! 우리가 당신과 무슨 상관이 있나이까 ? 우리를 멸하러 왔나이까 ? 나는 당신이 누구인 줄 아노니 하나님의 거룩한자니이다'
word.tagalog: Ah! anong mayroon kami sa iyo, Jesus, ikaw na Nazareno? naparito ka baga upang kami'y iyong puksain? nakikilala ko ikaw kung sino ka, ang Banal ng Dios.
word.maori: Ka mea, Kati ra; he aha matou nau, e Ihu o Nahareta; kua tae mai koe ki te whakangaro i a matou? e mohio ana ahau ki a koe, ko wai koe; ko te Mea Tapu a te Atua.
word.cebuano: Nga nagaingon: Oy, unsay labut namo kanimo, Jesus nga Nazaretnon? Mianhi ba ikaw aron sa paglaglag kanamo? Hingbaloan ko kong kinsa ikaw, ang Balaan sa Dios,
word.hebrewmodern: אתה מה לנו ולך ישוע הנצרי באת להאבידנו ידעתיך מי אתה קדוש האלהים׃
word.textusreceptus: λεγων εα τι ημιν και σοι ιησου ναζαρηνε ηλθες απολεσαι ημας οιδα σε τις ει ο αγιος του θεου

word.kjv: And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him. And when the devil had thrown him in the midst, he came out of him, and hurt him not.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสห้ามมันว่า "จงนิ่งเสีย ออกมาจากเขาซิ" เมื่อผีนั้นได้ทำให้เขาล้มลงท่ามกลางประชาชนแล้ว ก็ออกมาจากเขา แต่มิได้ทำอันตรายเขาเลย
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús le increpó, diciendo: Enmudece, y sal de él. Entonces el demonio, derribándole en medio, salió de él, y no le hizo daño alguno.
word.latinvulgate: Et increpavit illum Jesus, dicens : Obmutesce, et exi ab eo. Et cum projecisset illum dæmonium in medium, exiit ab illo, nihilque illum nocuit.
word.italian1927: E Gesù lo sgridò, dicendo: Ammutolisci, ed esci da quest’uomo! E il demonio, gettatolo a terra in mezzo alla gente, uscì da lui senza fargli alcun male.
word.german1912: Und Jesus bedrohte ihn und sprach: Verstumme und fahre aus von ihm! Und der Teufel warf ihn mitten unter sie und fuhr von ihm aus und tat ihm keinen Schaden.
word.french1910: Jésus le menaça, disant: Tais-toi, et sors de cet homme. Et le démon le jeta au milieu de l'assemblée, et sortit de lui, sans lui faire aucun mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌斥責他說：“住口！從他身上出來！”鬼把那人摔倒在眾人中間，就從他身上出來了，沒有傷害他。
word.korean: 예수께서 꾸짖어 가라사대 `잠잠하고 그 사람에게서 나오라' 하시니 귀신이 그 사람을 무리 중에 넘어 뜨리고 나오되 그 사람은 상하지 아니한지라
word.tagalog: At sinaway siya ni Jesus, na sinasabi, Tumahimik ka, at lumabas ka sa kaniya. At nang siya'y mailugmok ng demonio sa gitna, ay lumabas siya sa kaniya, na hindi siya sinaktan.
word.maori: Na riria iho ia e Ihu, ka mea ia, Kati te korero, puta mai hoki i roto i a ia. Katahi te rewera ka turaki i a ia ki waenganui, a puta mai ana i roto i a ia, kihai hoki tera i ahatia.
word.cebuano: Ug gibadlong siya ni Jesus, sa pag-ingon: Humilum ka, ug gumola kaniya. Ug sa tapus siya ilamba sa yawa sa taliwala, kini minggula kaniya sa walay kadautan nga nahimo kaniya.
word.hebrewmodern: ויגער בו ישוע לאמר האלם וצא ממנו ויפילהו השד בתוכם ויצא ממנו לא הרע לו׃
word.textusreceptus: και επετιμησεν αυτω ο ιησους λεγων φιμωθητι και εξελθε εξ αυτου και ριψαν αυτον το δαιμονιον εις το μεσον εξηλθεν απ αυτου μηδεν βλαψαν αυτον

word.kjv: When Simon Peter saw it, he fell down at Jesus' knees, saying, Depart from me; for I am a sinful man, O Lord.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายซีโมนเปโตรเมื่อเห็นดังนั้น ก็กราบลงที่พระชานุของพระเยซูทูลว่า "โอ พระองค์เจ้าข้า ขอเสด็จไปให้ห่างจากข้าพระองค์เถิด เพราะว่าข้าพระองค์เป็นคนบาป"
word.spanish1909: Lo cual viendo Simón Pedro, se derribó de rodillas á Jesús, diciendo: Apártate de mí, Señor, porque soy hombre pecador.
word.latinvulgate: Quod cum vidisset Simon Petrus, procidit ad genua Jesu, dicens : Exi a me, quia homo peccator sum, Domine.
word.italian1927: Simon Pietro, veduto ciò, si gettò a’ ginocchi di Gesù, dicendo: Signore, dipartiti da me, perché son uomo peccatore.
word.german1912: Da das Simon Petrus sah, fiel er Jesu zu den Knieen und sprach: HERR, gehe von mir hinaus! ich bin ein sündiger Mensch.

word.cebuano: Ug sa nakita niya si Jesus, misinggit siya, ug mihapa sa atubangan niya, ug sa makusog nga tingog miingon: Unsay labut ko kanimo, Jesus, ikaw nga Anak sa Hataas Uyamut nga Dios? Ginapakilooy ko kanimo, ayaw ako pagsakita.

word.spanish1909: Y he aquí un varón, llamado Jairo, y que era príncipe de la sinagoga, vino, y cayendo á los pies de Jesús, le rogaba que entrase en su casa;
word.latinvulgate: Et ecce venit vir, cui nomen Jairus, et ipse princeps synagogæ erat : et cecidit ad pedes Jesu, rogans eum ut intraret in domum ejus,
word.italian1927: Ed ecco venire un uomo, chiamato Iairo, che era capo della sinagoga; e gittatosi ai piedi di Gesù, lo pregava d’entrare in casa sua,
word.german1912: Und siehe, da kam ein Mann mit Namen Jairus, der ein Oberster der Schule war, und fiel Jesu zu den Füßen und bat ihn, daß er wollte in sein Haus kommen;
word.french1910: Et voici, il vint un homme, nommé Jaïrus, qui était chef de la synagogue. Il se jeta à ses pieds, et le supplia d'entrer dans sa maison,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那時，有一個人來了，名叫葉魯，他是一位會堂主管。他俯伏在耶穌腳前，求他往他家裡去，
word.korean: 이에 회당장인 야이로라 하는 사람이 와서 예수의 발 아래 엎드려 자기 집에 오시기를 간구하니
word.tagalog: At narito, lumapit ang isang lalaking nagngangalang Jairo, at siya'y isang pinuno sa sinagoga: at siya'y nagpatirapa sa paanan ni Jesus, at ipinamamanhik sa kaniya, na pumasok sa kaniyang bahay;
word.maori: Na ka haere mai tetahi tangata, ko Hairuha te ingoa, he rangatira no te whare karakia; a takoto ana ki nga waewae o Ihu, ka inoi ki a ia kia tomo ki tona whare:
word.cebuano: Ug ania karon, may miabut usa ka tawo nga ginganlan si Jairo, ug siya usa ka punoan sa sinagoga; ug siya mihapa sa tiilan ni Jesus ug nagpakilooy kaniya nga moadto siya sa iyang balay;
word.hebrewmodern: והנה בא איש ושמו יאיר והוא ראש בית הכנסת ויפל לרגלי ישוע ויתחנן לו לבוא אתו אל ביתו׃
word.textusreceptus: και ιδου ηλθεν ανηρ ω ονομα ιαειρος και αυτος αρχων της συναγωγης υπηρχεν και πεσων παρα τους ποδας του ιησου παρεκαλει αυτον εισελθειν εις τον οικον αυτου

word.kjv: And Jesus said, Who touched me? When all denied, Peter and they that were with him said, Master, the multitude throng thee and press thee, and sayest thou, Who touched me?
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสถามว่า "ใครได้ถูกต้องเรา" เมื่อคนทั้งหลายได้ปฏิเสธ เปโตรกับคนที่อยู่ด้วยกันจึงทูลว่า "อาจารย์เจ้าข้า ก็เป็นเพราะประชาชนเบียดเสียดพระองค์ และพระองค์ยังทรงถามอีกหรือว่า `ใครได้ถูกต้องเรา'"
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús dijo: ¿Quién es el que me ha tocado? Y negando todos, dijo Pedro y los que estaban con él: Maestro, la compañía te aprieta y oprime, y dices: ¿Quién es el que me ha tocado?
word.latinvulgate: Et ait Jesus : Quis est, qui me tetigit ? Negantibus autem omnibus, dixit Petrus, et qui cum illo erant : Præceptor, turbæ te comprimunt, et affligunt, et dicis : Quis me tetigit ?
word.italian1927: E Gesù domandò: Chi m’ha toccato? E siccome tutti negavano, Pietro e quelli ch’eran con lui, risposero: Maestro, le turbe ti stringono e t’affollano.
word.german1912: Und Jesus sprach: Wer hat mich angerührt? Da sie aber alle leugneten, sprach Petrus und die mit ihm waren: Meister, das Volk drängt und drückt dich, und du sprichst: Wer hat mich angerührt?
word.french1910: Et Jésus dit: Qui m'a touché? Comme tous s'en défendaient, Pierre et ceux qui étaient avec lui dirent: Maître, la foule t'entoure et te presse, et tu dis: Qui m'a touché?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“摸我的是誰？”眾人都不承認。彼得說：“主啊，眾人都擁擠著你。”
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `내게 손을 댄 자가 누구냐 ?' 하시니 다 아니라 할때에 베드로가 가로되 `주여 무리가 옹위하여 미나이다'
word.tagalog: At sinabi ni Jesus, Sino ang humipo sa akin? At nang tumatanggi ang lahat, ay sinabi ni Pedro, at ng mga kasamahan niya, Guro, iniimpit ka at sinisiksik ka ng karamihan.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu, Ko wai tenei kua pa nei ki ahau? A, no ka whakakahore katoa, ka mea a Pita ratou ko ona hoa, E kara, e pipiri ana nga mano ki a koe, e tutetute ana, ka mea koe, ko wai e pa ki ahau?
word.cebuano: Ug miingon si Jesus: Kinsa ang mihikap kanako? Ug sa nanaglimod ang tanan, miingon si Pedro ug sila nga diha uban kaniya; Magtutudlo, ginadotdot ug ginapiit ka sa mga panon sa katawohan, ug moingon ka: Kinsa ang mihikap kanako?
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע מי זה נגע בי וכלם כחשו ויאמר פטרוס והעמדים אצלו מורה המון העם דחקים ולחצים אתך ואתה תאמר מי נגע בי׃
word.textusreceptus: και ειπεν ο ιησους τις ο αψαμενος μου αρνουμενων δε παντων ειπεν ο πετρος και οι μετ αυτου επιστατα οι οχλοι συνεχουσιν σε και αποθλιβουσιν και λεγεις τις ο αψαμενος μου

word.kjv: And Jesus said, Somebody hath touched me: for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me.
word.thailand: แต่พระเยซูตรัสว่า "มีผู้หนึ่งได้ถูกต้องเรา เพราะเรารู้สึกว่าฤทธิ์ได้ซ่านออกจากตัวเรา"
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús dijo: Me ha tocado alguien; porque yo he conocido que ha salido virtud de mí.
word.latinvulgate: Et dicit Jesus : Tetigit me aliquis : nam ego novi virtutem de me exiisse.
word.italian1927: Ma Gesù replicò: Qualcuno m’ha toccato, perché ho sentito che una virtù è uscita da me.
word.german1912: Jesus aber sprach: Es hat mich jemand angerührt; denn ich fühle, daß eine Kraft von mir gegangen ist.
word.french1910: Mais Jésus répondit: Quelqu'un m'a touché, car j'ai connu qu'une force était sortie de moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“必定有人摸我，因為我覺得有能力從我身上出去。”
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `내게 손을 댄 자가 있도다 이는 내게서 능력이 나간 줄 앎이로다' 하신대
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't sinabi ni Jesus, May humipo sa akin, sapagka't naramdaman ko na may umalis na bisa sa akin.
word.maori: Otira i mea a Ihu, Ehara, kua pa tetahi ki ahau: e mohio ana ahau, kua puta atu he mana i ahau.
word.cebuano: Apan miingon si Jesus: May mihikap kanako, kay hingmatngonan ko nga may gahum migula kanako.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע נגע בי אדם כי ידעתי אשר יצאה ממני גבורה׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους ειπεν ηψατο μου τις εγω γαρ εγνων δυναμιν εξελθουσαν απ εμου

word.kjv: But when Jesus heard it, he answered him, saying, Fear not: believe only, and she shall be made whole.
word.thailand: ฝ่ายพระเยซูเมื่อได้ยินจึงตรัสแก่เขาว่า "อย่ากลัวเลย จงเชื่อเท่านั้นและลูกจะหายดี"
word.spanish1909: Y oyéndolo Jesús, le respondió: No temas: cree solamente, y será salva.
word.latinvulgate: Jesus autem, audito hoc verbo, respondit patri puellæ : Noli timere, crede tantum, et salva erit.
word.italian1927: Ma Gesù, udito ciò, rispose a Iairo: Non temere; solo abbi fede, ed ella sarà salva.
word.german1912: Da aber Jesus das hörte, antwortete er ihm und sprach: Fürchte dich nicht, glaube nur, so wird sie gesund!
word.french1910: Mais Jésus, ayant entendu cela, dit au chef de la synagogue: Ne crains pas, crois seulement, et elle sera sauvée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌聽見就對他說：“不要怕，只要信，她必得痊愈。”
word.korean: 예수께서 들으시고 가라사대 `두려워 말고 믿기만 하라 ! 그리하면 딸이 구원을 얻으리라' 하시고
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't nang marinig ito ni Jesus ay sumagot sa kaniya, Huwag kang matakot: manampalataya ka lamang, at siya'y gagaling.
word.maori: Otiia, i te rongonga o Ihu, ka whakahoki ki a ia, ka mea, Kaua e mataku: ko te whakapono ia kia whakapono, a ka ora ia.
word.cebuano: Apan si Jesus sa pagkadungog niini, mitubag kaniya: Ayaw kahadlok, tomoo ka lamang, ug maluwas siya.
word.hebrewmodern: וישמע ישוע ויען ויאמר לו אל תירא אך האמן והיא תושע׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους ακουσας απεκριθη αυτω λεγων μη φοβου μονον πιστευε και σωθησεται

word.kjv: And it came to pass, as they departed from him, Peter said unto Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias: not knowing what he said.
word.thailand: ต่อมาเมื่อสองคนนั้นกำลังลาไปจากพระองค์ เปโตรจึงทูลพระเยซูว่า "พระอาจารย์เจ้าข้า ซึ่งเราอยู่ที่นี่ก็ดี ให้พวกข้าพระองค์ทำพลับพลาสามหลัง สำหรับพระองค์หลังหนึ่ง สำหรับโมเสสหลังหนึ่ง สำหรับเอลียาห์หลังหนึ่ง" เปโตรไม่เข้าใจว่าตัวได้พูดอะไร
word.spanish1909: Y aconteció, que apartándose ellos de él, Pedro dice á Jesús: Maestro, bien es que nos quedemos aquí: y hagamos tres pabellones, uno para ti, y uno para Moisés, y uno para Elías; no sabiendo lo que se decía.
word.latinvulgate: Et factum est cum discederent ab illo, ait Petrus ad Jesum : Præceptor, bonum est nos hic esse : et faciamus tria tabernacula, unum tibi, et unum Moysi, et unum Eliæ : nesciens quid diceret.
word.italian1927: E come questi si partivano da lui, Pietro disse a Gesù: Maestro, egli è bene che stiamo qui; facciamo tre tende: una per te, una per Mosè, ed una per Elia; non sapendo quel che si dicesse.
word.german1912: Und es begab sich, da die von ihm wichen, sprach Petrus zu Jesu: Meister, hier ist gut sein. Lasset uns drei Hütten machen: dir eine, Mose eine und Elia eine. Und er wußte nicht, was er redete. {~}
word.french1910: Au moment où ces hommes se séparaient de Jésus, Pierre lui dit: Maître, il est bon que nous soyons ici; dressons trois tentes, une pour toi, une pour Moïse, et une pour Elie. Il ne savait ce qu'il disait.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 二人正要離開他的時候，彼得對耶穌說：“主啊，我們在這裡真好！我們可以搭三個帳棚，一個為你，一個為摩西，一個為以利亞。”他根本不知道自己在說甚麼。
word.korean: 두 사람이 떠날 때에 베드로가 예수께 여짜오되 `주여, 우리가 여기 있는 것이 좋사오니 우리가 초막 셋을 짓되 하나는 주를 위하여, 하나는 모세를 위하여, 하나는 엘리야를 위하여 하사이다' 하되 자기의 하는 말을 자기도 알지 못하더라
word.tagalog: At nangyari, samantalang sila'y nagsisihiwalay sa kaniya, ay sinabi ni Pedro kay Jesus, Guro, mabuti sa atin ang tayo'y dumito: at magsigawa tayo ng tatlong dampa; isa ang sa iyo, at isa ang kay Moises, at isa ang kay Elias: na hindi nalalaman ang kaniyang sinasabi.
word.maori: A i a raua e mawehe atu ana i a ia, ka mea a Pita ki a Ihu, E kara, he pai kia noho tatou i konei: na kia hanga e matou etahi wharau kia toru; kia kotahi mou, kia kotahi mo Mohi, kia kotahi mo Iraia: kihai ia i mohio ki tana i korero ai.
word.cebuano: Ug nahitabo, nga sa ilang pagbulag kaniya si Pedro miingon kang Jesus: Magtutudlo, maayo nga pabilin kita dinhi; ug magbuhat kita ug tolo ka payag; usa alang kanimo, usa alang kang Moises, ug usa alang kang Elias; sa wala siya magpanghibalo sa iyang gisulti.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי בהפרדם ממנו ויאמר פטרוס אל ישוע מורה טוב היותנו פה נעשה נא שלש סכות לך אחת ולמשה אחת ולאליהו אחת ולא ידע מה דבר׃
word.textusreceptus: και εγενετο εν τω διαχωριζεσθαι αυτους απ αυτου ειπεν ο πετρος προς τον ιησουν επιστατα καλον εστιν ημας ωδε ειναι και ποιησωμεν σκηνας τρεις μιαν σοι και μωσει μιαν και μιαν ηλια μη ειδως ο λεγει

word.kjv: And when the voice was past, Jesus was found alone. And they kept it close, and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen.
word.thailand: เมื่อพระสุรเสียงนั้นสงบแล้ว พระเยซูทรงสถิตอยู่องค์เดียว เขาทั้งสามก็เก็บเรื่องนี้ไว้ และในกาลครั้งนั้นเขามิได้บอกเหตุการณ์ซึ่งเขาได้เห็นแก่ผู้ใด
word.spanish1909: Y pasada aquella voz, Jesús fué hallado solo: y ellos callaron; y por aquellos días no dijeron nada á nadie de lo que habían visto.
word.latinvulgate: Et dum fieret vox, inventus est Jesus solus. Et ipsi tacuerunt, et nemini dixerunt in illis diebus quidquam ex his quæ viderant.
word.italian1927: E mentre si faceva quella voce, Gesù si trovò solo. Ed essi tacquero, e non riferirono in quei giorni ad alcuno nulla di quel che aveano veduto.
word.german1912: Und indem solche Stimme geschah, fanden sie Jesum allein. Und sie verschwiegen es und verkündigten niemand in jenen Tagen, was sie gesehen hatten.
word.french1910: Quand la voix se fit entendre, Jésus se trouva seul. Les disciples gardèrent le silence, et ils ne racontèrent à personne, en ce temps-là, rien de ce qu'ils avaient vu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 聲音過了，只見耶穌獨自在那裡。在那些日子，門徒保持緘默，不把所看見的告訴任何人。
word.korean: 소리가 그치매 오직 예수만 보이시더라 제자들이 잠잠하여 그 본 것을 무엇이든지 그 때에는 아무에게도 이르지 아니하니라
word.tagalog: At nang dumating ang tinig, si Jesus ay nasumpungang nagiisa. At sila'y di nagsisiimik, at nang mga araw na yao'y hindi nila sinabi kanino mang tao ang alin man sa mga bagay na kanilang nakita.
word.maori: A, no te putanga o te reo, ko Ihu anake i kitea. A whakarongo puku ana ratou, kihai hoki i korerotia e ratou ki te tangata i aua ra tetahi o nga mea i kite ai ratou.
word.cebuano: Ug sa miabut ang tingog, si Jesus hingkaplagan nga nag-inusara. Ug nangahilum sila, ug wala magsugilon kang bisan kinsa niadtong mga adlawa sa bisan unsang butang nga ilang hikit-an.
word.hebrewmodern: ובהיות הקול נשאר ישוע לבדו והמה החשו ולא הגידו דבר לאיש בימים ההם מכל אשר ראו׃
word.textusreceptus: και εν τω γενεσθαι την φωνην ευρεθη ο ιησους μονος και αυτοι εσιγησαν και ουδενι απηγγειλαν εν εκειναις ταις ημεραις ουδεν ων εωρακασιν

word.kjv: And Jesus answering said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you, and suffer you? Bring thy son hither.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบว่า "โอ คนในยุคที่ขาดความเชื่อและมีทิฐิชั่ว เราจะต้องอยู่กับเจ้าทั้งหลายและอดทนเพราะพวกเจ้านานเท่าใด จงพาบุตรของท่านมาที่นี่เถิด"
word.spanish1909: Y respondiendo Jesús, dice: ­Oh generación infiel y perversa! ¿hasta cuándo tengo de estar con vosotros, y os sufriré? Trae tu hijo acá.
word.latinvulgate: Respondens autem Jesus, dixit : O generatio infidelis, et perversa, usquequo ero apud vos, et patiar vos ? adduc huc filium tuum.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, rispondendo, disse: O generazione incredula e perversa, fino a quando sarò io con voi e vi sopporterò?
word.german1912: Da antwortete Jesus und sprach: O du ungläubige und verkehrte Art, wie lange soll ich bei euch sein und euch dulden? Bringe deinen Sohn her!
word.french1910: Race incrédule et perverse, répondit Jésus, jusqu'à quand serai-je avec vous, et vous supporterai-je? Amène ici ton fils.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“唉！這不信又乖謬的世代啊！我跟你們在一起，忍受你們，要到幾時呢？把你兒子帶到這裡來吧！”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `믿음이 없고 패역한 세대여 ! 내가 얼마나 너희와 함께 있으며 너희를 참으리요 네 아들을 이리로 데리고 오라' 하시니
word.tagalog: At sumagot si Jesus at nagsabi, Oh lahing walang pananampalataya at taksil, hanggang kailan makikisama ako sa inyo at magtitiis sa inyo? dalhin mo rito ang anak mo.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea, E te uri whakaponokore, parori ke, kia pehea te roa o toku noho ki a koutou, o toku manawanui ki a koutou? Kawea mai tau tama ki konei.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus mitubag ug miingon: Ay, kaliwatan nga walay pagtoo ug sukihan, hangtud anus-a ako magapuyo uban kaninyo ug mag-antus kaninyo? Dad-a nganhi ang imong anak.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר הוי דור חסר אמונה ופתלתל עד מתי אהיה עמכם ואסבל אתכם הבא הנה את בנך׃
word.textusreceptus: αποκριθεις δε ο ιησους ειπεν ω γενεα απιστος και διεστραμμενη εως ποτε εσομαι προς υμας και ανεξομαι υμων προσαγαγε ωδε τον υιον σου

word.kjv: And as he was yet a coming, the devil threw him down, and tare him. And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit, and healed the child, and delivered him again to his father.
word.thailand: เมื่อเด็กนั้นกำลังมา ผีก็ทำให้เขาล้มชักดิ้นใหญ่ แต่พระเยซูตรัสสำทับผีโสโครกนั้นและทรงรักษาเด็กให้หาย แล้วส่งคืนให้บิดาเขา
word.spanish1909: Y como aun se acercaba, el demonio le derribó y despedazó: mas Jesús increpó al espíritu inmundo, y sanó al muchacho, y se lo volvió á su padre.
word.latinvulgate: Et cum accederet, elisit illum dæmonium, et dissipavit.
word.italian1927: Mena qua il tuo figliuolo. E mentre il fanciullo si avvicinava, il demonio lo gettò per terra e lo torse in convulsione; ma Gesù sgridò lo spirito immondo, guarì il fanciullo, e lo rese a suo padre.
word.german1912: Und da er zu ihm kam, riß ihn der Teufel und zerrte ihn. Jesus aber bedrohte den unsauberen Geist und machte den Knaben gesund und gab ihn seinem Vater wieder.
word.french1910: Comme il approchait, le démon le jeta par terre, et l'agita avec violence. Mais Jésus menaça l'esprit impur, guérit l'enfant, et le rendit à son père.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那孩子正走過來的時候，污鬼把他摔倒，使他重重地抽瘋。耶穌斥責那污靈，把孩子醫好，交給他父親。
word.korean: 올 때에 귀신이 거꾸러뜨리고 심한 경련을 일으키게 하는지라 예수께서 더러운 귀신을 꾸짖으시고 아이를 낫게 하사 그 아비에게 도로 주시니
word.tagalog: At samantalang siya'y lumalapit, ay ibinuwal siya ng demonio, at pinapangatal na mainam. Datapuwa't pinagwikaan ni Jesus ang karumaldumal na espiritu, at pinagaling ang bata, at isinauli siya sa kaniyang ama.
word.maori: Na i a ia e haere mai ana, ka taia iho ia e te rewera, haehaea iho. Na ka riria te wairua poke e Ihu, a whakaorangia ana te tamaiti, hoatu ana ki tona papa.
word.cebuano: Ug sa diha nga nagakaduol na siya, ang yawa nagpahapla kaniya sa yuta, ug gipakurog siya sa hilabihan. Apan si Jesus nagbadlong sa espiritu nga mahugaw, ug giayo niya ang ulitawo, ug siya giuli niya sa iyang amahan.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי אך הקריב לבוא וירעצהו השד וירוצצהו וישוע גער ברוח הטמא וירפא את הנער וישיבהו לאביו׃
word.textusreceptus: ετι δε προσερχομενου αυτου ερρηξεν αυτον το δαιμονιον και συνεσπαραξεν επετιμησεν δε ο ιησους τω πνευματι τω ακαθαρτω και ιασατο τον παιδα και απεδωκεν αυτον τω πατρι αυτου

word.italian1927: E tutti sbigottivano della grandezza di Dio.

word.tagalog: At nangagtaka silang lahat sa karangalan ng Dios. Datapuwa't samantalang ang lahat ay nagsisipanggilalas sa lahat ng mga bagay na kaniyang ginagawa, ay sinabi niya sa kaniyang mga alagad,

word.cebuano: Ug silang tanan nahitingala sa pagkahalangdon sa Dios. Apan samtang ang tanan nahibulong sa tanang mga butang nga gibuhat ni Jesus, siya miingon sa iyang mga tinon-an:
word.hebrewmodern: וישתוממו כלם על גדלת האלהים ויהי בתמהם כלם על כל אשר עשה ויאמר ישוע אל תלמידיו׃
word.textusreceptus: εξεπλησσοντο δε παντες επι τη μεγαλειοτητι του θεου παντων δε θαυμαζοντων επι πασιν οις εποιησεν ο ιησους ειπεν προς τους μαθητας αυτου

word.tagalog: At sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, May mga lungga ang mga sorra, at ang mga ibon sa langit ay may mga pugad; datapuwa't ang Anak ng tao ay walang kahiligan ang kaniyang ulo.

word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus miingon kaniya: Ang mga milo adunay mga lungib, ug ang mga langgam sa langit adunay mga salag; apan ang Anak sa tawo walay dapit kapaurarayan sa iyang ulo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע לשועלים יש חורי עפר ולעוף השמים קנים ובן האדם אין לו מקום להניח שם את ראשו׃
word.textusreceptus: και ειπεν αυτω ο ιησους αι αλωπεκες φωλεους εχουσιν και τα πετεινα του ουρανου κατασκηνωσεις ο δε υιος του ανθρωπου ουκ εχει που την κεφαλην κλινη

word.tagalog: Datapuwa't sinabi niya sa kaniya, Pabayaan mong ilibing ng mga patay ang kanilang sariling mga patay; datapuwa't yumaon ka at ibalita mo ang kaharian ng Dios.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, Waiho ma nga tupapaku e tanu o ratou na tupapaku: ko koe ia me haere ki te kauwhau i te rangatiratanga o te Atua.
word.cebuano: Apan si Jesus miingon kaniya: Pasagdi ang mga patay nga maglubong sa ilang kaugalingong mga minatay; apan lumakaw ka ug magmantala sa gingharian sa Dios.

word.korean: 예수께서 이르시되 `손에 쟁기를 잡고 뒤를 돌아보는 자는 하나님의 나라에 합당치 아니하니라' 하시니라

word.cebuano: Apan si Jesus miingon kaniya: Walay tawo nga, sa makakupot sa iyang kamot sa daro, ug sa magalingi, takus sa gingharian sa Dios.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע כל השם את ידו על המחרשה ומביט אחריו לא יכשר למלכות האלהים׃

word.kjv: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit, and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes: even so, Father; for so it seemed good in thy sight.
word.thailand: ในโมงนั้นเอง พระเยซูทรงมีความเปรมปรีดิ์ในพระวิญญาณ จึงตรัสว่า "ข้าแต่พระบิดา ผู้เป็นเจ้าแห่งฟ้าสวรรค์และแผ่นดินโลก ข้าพระองค์ขอบพระคุณพระองค์ที่พระองค์ไ ด้ทรงปิดบังสิ่งเหล่านี้ไว้จากคนมีปัญญาและคนสุขุมรอบคอบ และได้ทรงเปิดเผยสิ่งเหล่านี้แก่ทารกน้อย ข้าแต่พระบิดา ที่เป็นอย่างนั้นก็เพราะเป็นที่ชอบพระทัยในสายพระเนตรของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: En aquella misma hora Jesús se alegró en espíritu, y dijo: Yo te alabo, oh Padre, Señor del cielo y de la tierra, que escondiste estas cosas á los sabios y entendidos, y las has revelado á los pequeños: así, Padre, porque así te agradó.
word.latinvulgate: In ipsa hora exsultavit Spiritu Sancto, et dixit : Confiteor tibi Pater, Domine cæli et terræ, quod abscondisti hæc a sapientibus et prudentibus, et revelasti ea parvulis. Etiam Pater : quoniam sic placuit ante te.
word.italian1927: In quella stessa ora, Gesù giubilò per lo Spirito Santo, e disse: Io ti rendo lode, o Padre, Signore del cielo e della terra, perché hai nascoste queste cose ai savi e agl’intelligenti, e le hai rivelate ai piccoli fanciulli! Sì, o Padre, perché così ti è piaciuto.
word.german1912: Zu der Stunde freute sich Jesus im Geist und sprach: Ich preise dich, Vater und HERR des Himmels und der Erde, daß du solches verborgen hast den Weisen und Klugen, und hast es offenbart den Unmündigen. Ja, Vater, also war es wohlgefällig vor dir.
word.french1910: En ce moment même, Jésus tressaillit de joie par le Saint-Esprit, et il dit: Je te loue, Père, Seigneur du ciel et de la terre, de ce que tu as caché ces choses aux sages et aux intelligents, et de ce que tu les as révélées aux enfants. Oui, Père, je te loue de ce que tu l'as voulu ainsi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌歡樂讚美天父（太11:25~27，13:16~17）就在這時候，耶穌因聖靈而歡樂，說：“父啊，天地的主，我讚美你，因為你把這些事向智慧和聰明的人隱藏起來，卻向嬰孩顯明。父啊，是的，這就是你的美意。
word.korean: 이 때에 예수께서 성령으로 기뻐하사 가라사대 `천지의 주재이신 아버지여 이것을 지혜롭고 슬기 있는 자들에게는 숨기시고 어린 아이들에게는 나타내심을 감사하나이다 옳소이다 이렇게 된 것이 아버지의 뜻이니이다
word.tagalog: Nang oras ding yaon siya'y nagalak sa Espiritu Santo, at sinabi, Ako'y nagpapasalamat sa iyo, Oh Ama, Panginoon ng langit at lupa, na iyong inilihim ang mga bagay na ito sa mga pantas at matatalino, at ipinahayag mo sa mga sanggol: gayon nga, Ama; sapagka't gayon ang nakalulugod sa iyong paningin.
word.maori: I taua wa ano ka hari ia i te Wairua Tapu, ka mea, ka whakawhetai ahau ki a koe, e Pa, e te Ariki o te rangi, o te whenua, kua huna nei hoki e koe enei mea i te hunga matau, i te hunga mahara, a whakakitea ana ki nga kohungahunga: ae ra, e pa, i pai hoki te penei ki tau titiro.
word.cebuano: Sa maong takna si Jesus nalipay sa Espiritu Santo, ug nag-ingon: Naga-pasalamat ako kanimo, O Amahan, Ginoo sa langit ug sa yuta nga ikaw naglilong niining mga butanga gikan sa mga maalam ug sa mga masinabuton, ug imong gipadayag sa mga bata. Oo Amahan, kay mao man ang nahamut-an sa imong atubangan.
word.hebrewmodern: בשעה ההיא עלץ ישוע ברוח ויאמר אודך האב אדון השמים והארץ כי הסתרת את אלה מן החכמים והנבונים וגליתם לעללים הן אבי כי כן היה רצון מלפניך׃
word.textusreceptus: εν αυτη τη ωρα ηγαλλιασατο τω πνευματι ο ιησους και ειπεν εξομολογουμαι σοι πατερ κυριε του ουρανου και της γης οτι απεκρυψας ταυτα απο σοφων και συνετων και απεκαλυψας αυτα νηπιοις ναι ο πατηρ οτι ουτως εγενετο ευδοκια εμπροσθεν σου

word.kjv: But he, willing to justify himself, said unto Jesus, And who is my neighbour?
word.thailand: แต่คนนั้นปรารถนาจะแก้ตัวจึงทูลพระเยซูว่า "แล้วใครเป็นเพื่อนบ้านของข้าพเจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Mas él, queriéndose justificar á sí mismo, dijo á Jesús: ¿Y quién es mi prójimo?
word.latinvulgate: Ille autem volens justificare seipsum, dixit ad Jesum : Et quis est meus proximus ?
word.italian1927: Ma colui, volendo giustificarsi, disse a Gesù: E chi è il mio prossimo?
word.german1912: Er aber wollte sich selbst rechtfertigen und sprach zu Jesus: "Wer ist denn mein Nächster?"
