word.hebrewmodern: ושני תלמידיו שמעו את דברו וילכו אחרי ישוע׃
word.textusreceptus: και ηκουσαν αυτου οι δυο μαθηται λαλουντος και ηκολουθησαν τω ιησου

word.kjv: Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master,) where dwellest thou?
word.thailand: พระเยซูทรงเหลียวหลังและทอดพระเนตรเห็นเขาตามพระองค์มา จึงตรัสถามเขาว่า "ท่านหาอะไร" และเขาทั้งสองทูลพระองค์ว่า "รับบี" (ซึ่งแปลว่าอาจารย์) "ท่านอยู่ที่ไหน"
word.spanish1909: Y volviéndose Jesús, y viéndolos seguir le, díceles: ¿Qué buscáis? Y ellos le dijeron: Rabbí (que declarado quiere decir Maestro) ¿dónde moras?
word.latinvulgate: Conversus autem Jesus, et videns eos sequentes se, dicit eis : Quid quæritis ? Qui dixerunt ei : Rabbi (quod dicitur interpretatum Magister), ubi habitas ?
word.italian1927: E Gesù, voltatosi, e osservando che lo seguivano, domandò loro: Che cercate? Ed essi gli dissero: Rabbì (che, interpretato, vuol dire: Maestro), ove dimori?
word.german1912: Jesus aber wandte sich um und sah sie nachfolgen und sprach zu ihnen: Was suchet ihr? Sie aber sprachen zu ihm: Meister, wo bist du zur Herberge? {~} {~} {~}
word.french1910: Jésus se retourna, et voyant qu'ils le suivaient, il leur dit: Que cherchez-vous? Ils lui répondirent: Rabbi ce qui signifie Maître, où demeures-tu?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌轉過身來，看見他們跟著，就問：“你們要甚麼？”他們說：“拉比，你在哪裡住？”（“拉比”的意思就是“老師”。）
word.korean: 예수께서 돌이켜 그 좇는 것을 보시고 물어 가라사대 `무엇을 구하느냐 ?' 가로되 `랍비여 어디 계시오니이까 ?' 하니 (랍비는 번역하면 선생이라)
word.tagalog: At lumingon si Jesus, at nakita silang nagsisisunod, at sinabi sa kanila, Ano ang inyong hinahanap? At sinabi nila sa kaniya, Rabi (na kung liliwanagin, ay Guro), saan ka tumitira?
word.maori: A ka tahuri a Ihu, ka kite i a raua e aru ana, ka mea ia ki a raua, E rapu ana korua i te aha? Na ko ta raua meatanga ki a ia, E Rapi, ko te tikanga tenei ina whakamaoritia, E te Kaiwhaako, kei hea tou kainga?
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus milingi, ug nakakita kanilang nagsunod, ug miingon kanila: Unsay inyong gipangita? Ug sila nanag-ingon kaniya: Rabbi, (nga sa ato pa, kong hubaron, Magtutudlo), Hain ka magpuyo?
word.hebrewmodern: ויפן ישוע אחריו וירא אתם הלכים אחריו ויאמר אליהם מה תבקשו ויאמרו אליו רבי פרושו מורי איפה תלין׃
word.textusreceptus: στραφεις δε ο ιησους και θεασαμενος αυτους ακολουθουντας λεγει αυτοις τι ζητειτε οι δε ειπον αυτω ραββι ο λεγεται ερμηνευομενον διδασκαλε που μενεις

word.kjv: And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, A stone.
word.thailand: อันดรูว์จึงพาซีโมนไปเฝ้าพระเยซู และเมื่อพระเยซูทรงทอดพระเนตรเขาแล้วจึงตรัสว่า "ท่านคือซีโมนบุตรชายโยนาห์ เขาจะเรียกท่านว่าเคฟาส" ซึ่งแปลว่าศิลา
word.spanish1909: Y le trajo á Jesús. Y mirándole Jesús, dijo: Tú eres Simón, hijo de Jonás: tú serás llamado Cephas (que quiere decir, Piedra).
word.latinvulgate: Et adduxit eum ad Jesum. Intuitus autem eum Jesus, dixit : Tu es Simon, filius Jona ; tu vocaberis Cephas, quod interpretatur Petrus.
word.italian1927: E Gesù, fissato in lui lo sguardo, disse: Tu sei Simone, il figliuol di Giovanni; tu sarai chiamato Cefa (che significa Pietro).
word.german1912: und führte ihn zu Jesu. Da ihn Jesus sah, sprach er: Du bist Simon, Jona's Sohn; du sollst Kephas (Fels) heißen. {~} {~}
word.french1910: Et il le conduisit vers Jésus. Jésus, l'ayant regardé, dit: Tu es Simon, fils de Jonas; tu seras appelé Céphas ce qui signifie Pierre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 安得烈就帶他到耶穌那裡。耶穌定睛看著他，說：“你是約翰的兒子西門，你要稱為磯法。”（“磯法”翻譯出來就是“彼得”。）
word.korean: 데리고 예수께로 오니 예수께서 보시고 가라사대 `네가 요한의 아들 시몬이니 장차 게바라 하리라' 하시니라 (게바는 번역하면 베드로라)
word.tagalog: Siya'y kaniyang dinala kay Jesus. Siya'y tiningnan ni Jesus, at sinabi, Ikaw ay si Simon na anak ni Juan: tatawagin kang Cefas (na kung liliwanagin, ay Pedro).
word.maori: Na ka arahina mai ia e ia ki a Ihu. A ka titiro a Ihu ki a ia, ka mea, Ko Haimona koe, ko te tama a Hona: me hua koe ko Kipa: tona whakamaoritanga ko Pita, ara ko Kohatu.
word.cebuano: Iyang gidala siya kang Jesus. Si Jesus mitan-aw kaniya ug miingon: Ikaw mao si Simon, ang anak ni Juan; Paga-nganlan ikaw Cefas (nga kong hubaron, Pedro).
word.hebrewmodern: ויוליכהו אל ישוע ויהי כהביט אליו ישוע ויאמר שמעון בן יונה לך יקרא כיפא אשר תרגומו פטרוס׃
word.textusreceptus: και ηγαγεν αυτον προς τον ιησουν εμβλεψας δε αυτω ο ιησους ειπεν συ ει σιμων ο υιος ιωνα συ κληθηση κηφας ο ερμηνευεται πετρος

word.kjv: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee, and findeth Philip, and saith unto him, Follow me.
word.thailand: วันรุ่งขึ้นพระเยซูตั้งพระทัยจะเสด็จไปยังแคว้นกาลิลี และพระองค์ทรงพบฟีลิปจึงตรัสกับเขาว่า "จงตามเรามา"
word.spanish1909: El siguiente día quiso Jesús ir á Galilea, y halla á Felipe, al cual dijo: Sígueme.
word.latinvulgate: In crastinam voluit exire in Galilæam, et invenit Philippum. Et dicit ei Jesus : Sequere me.
word.italian1927: Il giorno seguente, Gesù volle partire per la Galilea; trovò Filippo, e gli disse: Seguimi.
word.german1912: Des andern Tages wollte Jesus wieder nach Galiläa ziehen und findet Philippus und spricht zu ihm: Folge mir nach!
word.french1910: Le lendemain, Jésus voulut se rendre en Galilée, et il rencontra Philippe. Il lui dit: Suis-moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 呼召腓力和拿但業再過一天，耶穌決定往加利利去；他遇見腓力，就對他說：“來跟從我！”
word.korean: 이튿날 예수께서 갈릴리로 나가려 하시다가 빌립을 만나 이르시되 나를 좇으라 ! 하시니
word.tagalog: Nang kinabukasan ay pinasiyahan niyang pumaroon sa Galilea, at kaniyang nasumpungan si Felipe: at sa kaniya'y sinabi ni Jesus, Sumunod ka sa akin.
word.maori: ¶ I te aonga ake ka mea a Ihu kia haere ki Kariri, a ka kite i a Piripi: a ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, E aru i ahau.
word.cebuano: Sa adlaw nga misunod gituyo ni Jesus ang pag-adto sa Galilea, ug iyang hipalgan si Felipe; ug si Jesus miingon kaniya: Sumunod ka kanako.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי ממחרת ויואל ישוע לצאת הגלילה וימצא את פילפוס ויאמר אליו לך אחרי׃
word.textusreceptus: τη επαυριον ηθελησεν ο ιησους εξελθειν εις την γαλιλαιαν και ευρισκει φιλιππον και λεγει αυτω ακολουθει μοι

word.kjv: Philip findeth Nathanael, and saith unto him, We have found him, of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.
word.thailand: ฟีลิปไปหานาธานาเอลและบอกเขาว่า "เราได้พบพระองค์ผู้ที่โมเสสได้กล่าวถึงในพระราชบัญญัติ และที่พวกศาสดาพยากรณ์ได้กล่าวถึง คือพระเยซูชาวนาซาเร็ธบุตรชายโยเซฟ"
word.spanish1909: Felipe halló á Natanael, y dícele: Hemos hallado á aquel de quien escribió Moisés en la ley, y los profetas: á Jesús, el hijo de José, de Nazaret.
word.latinvulgate: Invenit Philippus Nathanaël, et dicit ei : Quem scripsit Moyses in lege, et prophetæ, invenimus Jesum filium Joseph a Nazareth.
word.italian1927: Filippo trovò Natanaele, e gli disse: Abbiam trovato colui del quale hanno scritto Mosè nella legge, ed i profeti: Gesù figliuolo di Giuseppe, da Nazaret.
word.german1912: Philippus findet Nathanael und spricht zu ihm: Wir haben den gefunden, von welchem Moses im Gesetz und die Propheten geschrieben haben, Jesum, Joseph's Sohn von Nazareth.
word.french1910: Philippe rencontra Nathanaël, et lui dit: Nous avons trouvé celui de qui Moïse a écrit dans la loi et dont les prophètes ont parlé, Jésus de Nazareth, fils de Joseph.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 腓力找到拿但業，告訴他：“摩西在律法書上所寫的，和眾先知所記的那位，我們已經遇見了，他就是約瑟的兒子拿撒勒人耶穌。”
word.korean: 빌립이 나다나엘을 찾아 이르되 `모세가 율법에 기록하였고 여러 선지자가 기록한 그 이를 우리가 만났으니 요셉의 아들 나사렛 예수니라'
word.tagalog: Nasumpungan ni Felipe si Natanael, at sinabi sa kaniya, Nasumpungan namin yaong isinulat ni Moises sa kautusan, at gayon din ng mga propeta, si Jesus na taga Nazaret, ang anak ni Jose.
word.maori: Ka kite a Piripi i a Natanahira, ka mea ki a ia, Kua kitea e matou a ia, mona nei te tuhituhi a Mohi i roto i te ture, ta nga poropiti hoki, a Ihu o Nahareta te tama a Hohepa.
word.cebuano: Si Felipe nakakaplag kang Natanael, ug miingon kaniya: Hingkaplagan namo siya, ang gisulat ni Moises sa Kasugoan, ug sa mga manalagna, si Jesus nga Nazaretnon, ang anak ni Jose.
word.hebrewmodern: ויפגע פילפוס את נתנאל ויאמר אליו מצאנו אתו אשר כתב משה בספר התורה והנביאים את ישוע בן יוסף מנצרת׃
word.textusreceptus: ευρισκει φιλιππος τον ναθαναηλ και λεγει αυτω ον εγραψεν μωσης εν τω νομω και οι προφηται ευρηκαμεν ιησουν τον υιον του ιωσηφ τον απο {VAR1: ναζαρετ } {VAR2: ναζαρεθ }

word.kjv: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him, and saith of him, Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom is no guile!
word.thailand: พระเยซูทอดพระเนตรเห็นนาธานาเอลมาหาพระองค์จึงตรัสถึงเรื่องตัวเขาว่า "ดูเถิด ชนอิสราเอลแท้ ในตัวเขาไม่มีอุบาย"
word.spanish1909: Jesús vió venir á sí á Natanael, y dijo de él: He aquí un verdadero Israelita, en el cual no hay engaño.
word.latinvulgate: Vidit Jesus Nathanaël venientem ad se, et dicit de eo : Ecce vere Israëlita, in quo dolus non est.
word.italian1927: Gesù vide Natanaele che gli veniva incontro, e disse di lui: Ecco un vero israelita in cui non c’è frode.
word.german1912: Jesus sah Nathanael zu sich kommen und spricht von ihm: Siehe, ein rechter Israeliter, in welchem kein Falsch ist.
word.french1910: Jésus, voyant venir à lui Nathanaël, dit de lui: Voici vraiment un Israélite, dans lequel il n'y a point de fraude.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌看見拿但業向他走過來，就論到他說：“看哪，這的確是個以色列人，他心裡沒有詭詐。”
word.korean: 예수께서 나다나엘이 자기에게 오는 것을 보시고 그를 가리켜 가라사대 `보라, 이는 참 이스라엘 사람이라 그 속에 간사한 것이 없도다'
word.tagalog: Nakita ni Jesus si Natanael na lumalapit sa kaniya, at sinabi ang tungkol sa kaniya, Narito, ang isang tunay na Israelita, na sa kaniya'y walang daya!
word.maori: Ka kite a Ihu i a Natanahira e haere ana mai ki a ia, ka puaki tana kupu mona, Na he tino tangata no Iharaira, kahore ona tinihanga.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus nakakita kang Natanael nga nagapadulong kaniya, ug miingon mahitungod kaniya: Tan-awa, ang matuod gayud nga Israelihanon, nga kaniya walay limbong!
word.hebrewmodern: וירא ישוע את נתנאל בא לקראתו ויאמר עליו הנה באמת בן ישראל אשר אין בו רמיה׃
word.textusreceptus: ειδεν ο ιησους τον ναθαναηλ ερχομενον προς αυτον και λεγει περι αυτου ιδε αληθως ισραηλιτης εν ω δολος ουκ εστιν

word.kjv: Nathanael saith unto him, Whence knowest thou me? Jesus answered and said unto him, Before that Philip called thee, when thou wast under the fig tree, I saw thee.
word.thailand: นาธานาเอลทูลถามพระองค์ว่า "พระองค์ทรงรู้จักข้าพระองค์ได้อย่างไร" พระเยซูตรัสตอบเขาว่า "ก่อนที่ฟีลิปจะเรียกท่าน เมื่อท่านอยู่ที่ใต้ต้นมะเดื่อนั้น เราเห็นท่าน"
word.spanish1909: Dícele Natanael: ¿De dónde me conoces? Respondió Jesús, y díjole: Antes que Felipe te llamara, cuando estabas debajo de la higuera te vi.
word.latinvulgate: Dicit ei Nathanaël : Unde me nosti ? Respondit Jesus, et dixit ei : Priusquam te Philippus vocavit, cum esses sub ficu, vidi te.
word.italian1927: Natanaele gli chiese: Da che mi conosci? Gesù gli rispose: Prima che Filippo ti chiamasse, quand’eri sotto il fico, io t’ho veduto.
word.german1912: Nathanael spricht zu ihm: Woher kennst du mich? Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Ehe denn dich Philippus rief, da du unter dem Feigenbaum warst, sah ich dich.
word.french1910: D'où me connais-tu? lui dit Nathanaël. Jésus lui répondit: Avant que Philippe t'appelât, quand tu étais sous le figuier, je t'ai vu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 拿但業問他：“你怎麼認識我呢？”耶穌回答：“腓力還沒有招呼你，你在無花果樹下的時候，我就看見你了。”
word.korean: 나다나엘이 가로되 `어떻게 나를 아시나이까 ?' 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `빌립이 너를 부르기 전에 네가 무화과나무 아래 있을 때에 보았노라'
word.tagalog: Sinabi sa kaniya ni Natanael, Saan mo ako nakilala? Si Jesus ay sumagot at sinabi sa kaniya, Bago ka tinawag ni Felipe, nang ikaw ay nasa ilalim ng puno ng igos, ay nakita kita.
word.maori: Ka mea a Natanahira ki a ia, No hea koe i matau ai ki ahau? Ka whakahoki a Ihu ki a ia, ka mea, I te mea kiano koe i karangatia e Piripi, i a koe ano i raro i te piki, i kite ahau i a koe.
word.cebuano: Si Natanael miingon kaniya: Diin mo ako hiilhi? Si Jesus mitubag ug miingon kaniya: Sa wala pa si Felipe magtawag kanimo, sa didto ikaw sa ilalum sa higuera, nakita ko ikaw.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו נתנאל מאין ידעתני ויען ישוע ויאמר לו בטרם קרא לך פילפוס בהיותך תחת התאנה אנכי ראיתיך׃
word.textusreceptus: λεγει αυτω ναθαναηλ ποθεν με γινωσκεις απεκριθη ο ιησους και ειπεν αυτω προ του σε φιλιππον φωνησαι οντα υπο την συκην ειδον σε

word.kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบเขาว่า "เพราะเราบอกท่านว่า เราเห็นท่านอยู่ใต้ต้นมะเดื่อนั้น ท่านจึงเชื่อหรือ ท่านจะได้เห็นเหตุการณ์ใหญ่กว่านั้นอีก"
word.spanish1909: Respondió Jesús y díjole: ¿Porque te dije, te vi debajo de la higuera, crees? cosas mayores que éstas verás.
word.latinvulgate: Respondit Jesus, et dixit ei : Quia dixi tibi : Vidi te sub ficu, credis ; majus his videbis.
word.italian1927: Gesù rispose e gli disse: Perché t’ho detto che t’avevo visto sotto il fico, tu credi? Tu vedrai cose maggiori di queste.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Du glaubst, weil ich dir gesagt habe, daß ich dich gesehen habe unter dem Feigenbaum; du wirst noch Größeres denn das sehen.
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Parce que je t'ai dit que je t'ai vu sous le figuier, tu crois; tu verras de plus grandes choses que celles-ci.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“因為我告訴你‘我看見你在無花果樹下’，你就信了嗎？你還要看見比這些更大的事。”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `내가 너를 무화과나무 아래서 보았다 하므로 믿느냐 ? 이보다 더 큰 일을 보리라
word.tagalog: Si Jesus ay sumagot at sinabi sa kaniya, Dahil baga sa sinabi ko sa iyo, Kita'y nakita sa ilalim ng puno ng igos, kaya ka sumasampalataya? makikita mo ang mga bagay na lalong dakila kay sa rito.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, No taku meatanga ki a koe, I kite ahau i a koe i raro i te piki, i whakapono ai koe? rahi atu i enei nga mea e kitea e koe.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus mitubag ug miingon kaniya: Tungod sa akong pag-ingon kanimo, nakita ko ikaw sa ilalum sa higuera, mitoo ikaw? Makakita ka ug labi pang dagku nga mga butang kay niini.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליו על אמרי לך כי תחת התאנה ראיתיך האמנת הנה גדלות מאלה תראה׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκριθη ιησους και ειπεν αυτω οτι ειπον σοι ειδον σε υποκατω της συκης πιστευεις μειζω τουτων οψει

word.kjv: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:
word.thailand: วันที่สามมีงานสมรสที่หมู่บ้านคานาแคว้นกาลิลี และมารดาของพระเยซูก็อยู่ที่นั่น
word.spanish1909: Y AL tercer día hiciéronse unas bodas en Caná de Galilea; y estaba allí la madre de Jesús.
word.latinvulgate: Et die tertia nuptiæ factæ sunt in Cana Galilææ, et erat mater Jesu ibi.
word.italian1927: Tre giorni dopo, si fecero delle nozze in Cana di Galilea, e c’era la madre di Gesù.
word.german1912: Und am dritten Tag ward eine Hochzeit zu Kana in Galiläa; und die Mutter Jesu war da.
word.french1910: Trois jours après, il y eut des noces à Cana en Galilée. La mère de Jésus était là,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 迦拿的婚筵第三天，在加利利的迦拿有婚筵，耶穌的母親在那裡；
word.korean: 사흘 되던 날에 갈릴리 가나에 혼인이 있어 예수의 어머니도 거기 계시고
word.tagalog: At nang ikatlong araw ay nagkaroon ng isang kasalan sa Cana ng Galilea; at naroon ang ina ni Jesus:
word.maori: ¶ Na i te toru o nga ra he marena i Kana o Kariri; a reira te whaea o Ihu:
word.cebuano: Ug sa ikatolo ka adlaw may usa ka kasal sa Cana sa Galilea; ug didto miadto ang inahan ni Jesus.
word.hebrewmodern: וביום השלישי היתה חתנה בקנה אשר בגליל ואם ישוע היתה שם׃
word.textusreceptus: και τη ημερα τη τριτη γαμος εγενετο εν κανα της γαλιλαιας και ην η μητηρ του ιησου εκει

word.kjv: And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.
word.thailand: พระเยซูและสาวกของพระองค์ได้รับเชิญไปในงานนั้น
word.spanish1909: Y fué también llamado Jesús y sus discípulos á las bodas.
word.latinvulgate: Vocatus est autem et Jesus, et discipuli ejus, ad nuptias.
word.italian1927: E Gesù pure fu invitato co’ suoi discepoli alle nozze.
word.german1912: Jesus aber und seine Jünger wurden auch auf die Hochzeit geladen.
word.french1910: et Jésus fut aussi invité aux noces avec ses disciples.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌和門徒也被邀請參加婚筵。
word.korean: 예수와 그 제자들도 혼인에 청함을 받았더니
word.tagalog: At inanyayahan din naman si Jesus, at ang kaniyang mga alagad, sa kasalan.
word.maori: I karangatia ano a Ihu ratou ko ana akonga ki te marena.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus usab ug ang iyang mga tinon-an gidapit sa kasal.
word.hebrewmodern: וישוע ותלמידיו היו גם הם קרואים אל החתנה׃
word.textusreceptus: εκληθη δε και ο ιησους και οι μαθηται αυτου εις τον γαμον

word.kjv: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.
word.thailand: เมื่อน้ำองุ่นหมดแล้ว มารดาของพระเยซูทูลพระองค์ว่า "เขาไม่มีน้ำองุ่น"
word.spanish1909: Y faltando el vino, la madre de Jesús le dijo: Vino no tienen.
word.latinvulgate: Et deficiente vino, dicit mater Jesu ad eum : Vinum non habent.
word.italian1927: E venuto a mancare il vino, la madre di Gesù gli disse: Non han più vino.
word.german1912: Und da es an Wein gebrach, spricht die Mutter Jesu zu ihm: Sie haben nicht Wein.
word.french1910: Le vin ayant manqué, la mère de Jésus lui dit: Ils n'ont plus de vin.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 酒用盡了，耶穌的母親對他說：“他們沒有酒了。”
word.korean: 포도주가 모자란지라 예수의 어머니가 예수에게 이르되 `저희에게 포도주가 없다' 하니
word.tagalog: At nang magkulang ng alak, ang ina ni Jesus ay nagsabi sa kaniya, Wala silang alak.
word.maori: A, i te paunga o te waina, ka mea te whaea o Ihu ki a ia, Kahore a ratou waina.
word.cebuano: Ug sa nagkulang ang vino, ang inahan ni Jesus miingon kaniya: Wala na silay vino.
word.hebrewmodern: ויחסר היין ותאמר אם ישוע אליו יין אין להם׃
word.textusreceptus: και υστερησαντος οινου λεγει η μητηρ του ιησου προς αυτον οινον ουκ εχουσιν

word.kjv: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสกับนางว่า "หญิงเอ๋ย นั่นเป็นธุระอะไรของท่านและของข้าพเจ้า เวลาของข้าพเจ้ายังไม่มาถึง"
word.spanish1909: Y dícele Jesús: ¿Qué tengo yo contigo, mujer? aun no ha venido mi hora.
word.latinvulgate: Et dicit ei Jesus : Quid mihi et tibi est, mulier ? nondum venit hora mea.
word.italian1927: E Gesù le disse: Che v’è fra me e te, o donna? L’ora mia non è ancora venuta.
word.german1912: Jesus spricht zu ihr: Weib, was habe ich mit dir zu schaffen? Meine Stunde ist noch nicht gekommen.
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Femme, qu'y a-t-il entre moi et toi? Mon heure n'est pas encore venue.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“母親（“母親”原文作“婦人”），我跟你有甚麼關係呢？我的時候還沒有到。”
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `여자여, 나와 무슨 상관이 있나이까 ? 내 때가 아직 이르지 못하였나이다'
word.tagalog: At sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, Babae, anong pakialam ko sa iyo? ang aking oras ay hindi pa dumarating.
word.maori: Ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, E tai, he aha taku ki a koe? kahore ano kia taea noatia toku haora.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus miingon kaniya: Babaye, unsay labut ko kanimo? Wala pa moabut ang akong takna.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליה ישוע מה לי ולך אשה עתי עדין לא באה׃
word.textusreceptus: λεγει αυτη ο ιησους τι εμοι και σοι γυναι ουπω ηκει η ωρα μου

word.kjv: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสสั่งเขาว่า "จงตักน้ำใส่โอ่งให้เต็มเถิด" และเขาก็ตักน้ำใส่โอ่งเต็มเสมอปาก
word.spanish1909: Díceles Jesús: Henchid estas tinajuelas de agua. E hinchiéronlas hasta arriba.
word.latinvulgate: Dicit eis Jesus : Implete hydrias aqua. Et impleverunt eas usque ad summum.
word.italian1927: Gesù disse loro: Empite d’acqua le pile. Ed essi le empirono fino all’orlo.
word.german1912: Jesus spricht zu ihnen: Füllet die Wasserkrüge mit Wasser! Und sie füllten sie bis obenan.
word.french1910: Jésus leur dit: Remplissez d'eau ces vases. Et ils les remplirent jusqu'au bord.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌吩咐僕人：“把缸都倒滿水！”他們就倒滿了，直到缸口。
word.korean: 예수께서 저희에게 이르시되 항아리에 물을 채우라 하신즉 아구까지 채우니
word.tagalog: Sinabi sa kanila ni Jesus, Punuin ninyo ng tubig ang mga tapayan. At kanilang pinuno hanggang sa labi.
word.maori: Ka mea a Ihu ki a ratou, Whakakiia nga ipu ki te wai. A whakakiia ana e ratou, purena noa.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus miingon kanila: Pun-a ninyo sa tubig ang mga tadyaw. Ug kini gipanagpuno nila hangtud sa ngabil.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליהם ישוע מלאו לכם הכדים מים וימלאום עד למעלה׃
word.textusreceptus: λεγει αυτοις ο ιησους γεμισατε τας υδριας υδατος και εγεμισαν αυτας εως ανω

word.kjv: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.
word.thailand: การอัศจรรย์ครั้งแรกนี้พระเยซูได้ทรงกระทำที่บ้านคานาแคว้นกาลิลี และได้ทรงสำแดงสง่าราศีของพระองค์ และสาวกของพระองค์ก็ได้เชื่อในพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Este principio de señales hizo Jesús en Caná de Galilea, y manifestó su gloria; y sus discípulos creyeron en él.
word.latinvulgate: Hoc fecit initium signorum Jesus in Cana Galilææ ; et manifestavit gloriam suam, et crediderunt in eum discipuli ejus.
word.italian1927: Gesù fece questo primo de’ suoi miracoli in Cana di Galilea, e manifestò la sua gloria; e i suoi discepoli credettero in lui.
word.german1912: Das ist das erste Zeichen, das Jesus tat, geschehen zu Kana in Galiläa, und offenbarte seine Herrlichkeit. Und seine Jünger glaubten an ihn.
word.french1910: Tel fut, à Cana en Galilée, le premier des miracles que fit Jésus. Il manifesta sa gloire, et ses disciples crurent en lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這是耶穌所行的第一件神蹟，是在加利利的迦拿行的。他顯出了自己的榮耀，他的門徒就信了他。
word.korean: 예수께서 이 처음 표적을 갈릴리 가나에서 행하여 그 영광을 나타내시매 제자들이 그를 믿으니라
word.tagalog: Ang pasimulang ito ng kaniyang mga tanda ay ginawa ni Jesus sa Cana ng Galilea, at inihayag ang kaniyang kaluwalhatian; at nagsisampalataya sa kaniya ang kaniyang mga alagad.
word.maori: I meatia tenei timatanga merekara e Ihu ki Kana o Kariri, i whakakitea e ia tona kororia; a whakapono ana ana akonga ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Kini mao ang una sa mga katingalahan nga gibuhat ni Jesus sa Cana sa Galilea, ug nagpadayag kini sa iyang himaya; ug ang iyang mga tinon-an nanagpanoo kaniya.
word.hebrewmodern: זאת תחלת האתות אשר עשה ישוע בקנה אשר בארץ הגליל וגלה את כבודו ויאמינו בו תלמידיו׃
word.textusreceptus: ταυτην εποιησεν την αρχην των σημειων ο ιησους εν κανα της γαλιλαιας και εφανερωσεν την δοξαν αυτου και επιστευσαν εις αυτον οι μαθηται αυτου

word.kjv: And the Jews' passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,
word.thailand: เทศกาลปัสกาของพวกยิวใกล้เข้ามาแล้ว และพระเยซูเสด็จขึ้นไปยังกรุงเยรูซาเล็ม
word.spanish1909: Y estaba cerca la Pascua de los Judíos; y subió Jesús á Jerusalem.
word.latinvulgate: Et prope erat Pascha Judæorum, et ascendit Jesus Jerosolymam :
word.italian1927: Or la Pasqua de’ Giudei era vicina, e Gesù salì a Gerusalemme.
word.german1912: Und der Juden Ostern war nahe, und Jesus zog hinauf gen Jerusalem.
word.french1910: La Pâque des Juifs était proche, et Jésus monta à Jérusalem.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 潔淨聖殿（太21:12~13；可11:15~17；路19:45~46）猶太人的逾越節近了，耶穌就上耶路撒冷去。
word.korean: 유대인의 유월절이 가까운지라 예수께서 예루살렘으로 올라가셨더니
word.tagalog: At malapit na ang paskua ng mga Judio, at umahon si Jesus sa Jerusalem.
word.maori: Na kua tata te kapenga o nga Hurai, a ka haere a Ihu ki Hiruharama:
word.cebuano: Ug haduol na ang pasko sa mga Judio, ug si Jesus mitungas sa Jerusalem.
word.hebrewmodern: ויקרבו ימי חג הפסח אשר ליהודים ויעל ישוע ירושלים׃
word.textusreceptus: και εγγυς ην το πασχα των ιουδαιων και ανεβη εις ιεροσολυμα ο ιησους

word.kjv: Jesus answered and said unto them, Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสตอบเขาทั้งหลายว่า "ทำลายวิหารนี้เสีย แล้วเราจะยกขึ้นในสามวัน"
word.spanish1909: Respondió Jesús, y díjoles: Destruid este templo, y en tres días lo levantaré.
word.latinvulgate: Respondit Jesus, et dixit eis : Solvite templum hoc, et in tribus diebus excitabo illud.
word.italian1927: Gesù rispose loro: Disfate questo tempio, e in tre giorni lo farò risorgere.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihnen: Brechet diesen Tempel, und am dritten Tage will ich ihn aufrichten.
word.french1910: Jésus leur répondit: Détruisez ce temple, et en trois jours je le relèverai.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“你們拆毀這殿，我三天之內要把它建造起來。”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `너희가 이 성전을 헐라 내가 사흘 동안에 일으키리라'
word.tagalog: Sumagot si Jesus at sa kanila'y sinabi, Igiba ninyo ang templong ito, at aking itatayo sa tatlong araw.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ratou, Wawahia tenei whare tapu, a kia toru nga ra ka ara ano i ahau.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus mitubag ug miingon kanila: Gub-a ninyo kining templo, ug sa ikatolo ka adlaw akong patindugon.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליהם הרסו את ההיכל הזה ובשלשה ימים אקימנו׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκριθη ο ιησους και ειπεν αυτοις λυσατε τον ναον τουτον και εν τρισιν ημεραις εγερω αυτον

word.kjv: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.
word.thailand: เหตุฉะนั้นเมื่อพระองค์ทรงเป็นขึ้นมาจากความตายแล้ว พวกสาวกของพระองค์ก็ระลึกได้ว่าพระองค์ได้ตรัสดังนี้ไว้แก่เขา และเขาก็เชื่อพระคัมภีร์และพระดำรัสที่พระเยซูได้ตรัสแล้วนั้น
word.spanish1909: Por tanto, cuando resucitó de los muertos, sus discípulos se acordaron que había dicho esto; y creyeron á la Escritura, y á la palabra que Jesús había dicho.
word.latinvulgate: Cum ergo resurrexisset a mortuis, recordati sunt discipuli ejus, quia hoc dicebat, et crediderunt scripturæ et sermoni quem dixit Jesus.
word.italian1927: Quando dunque fu risorto da’ morti, i suoi discepoli si ricordarono ch’egli avea detto questo; e credettero alla Scrittura e alla parola che Gesù avea detta.
word.german1912: Da er nun auferstanden war von den Toten, gedachten seine Jünger daran, daß er dies gesagt hatte, und glaubten der Schrift und der Rede, die Jesus gesagt hatte.)
word.french1910: C'est pourquoi, lorsqu'il fut ressuscité des morts, ses disciples se souvinrent qu'il avait dit cela, et ils crurent à l'Ecriture et à la parole que Jésus avait dite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 所以當耶穌從死人中復活以後，門徒想起了他說過這話，就信了聖經和耶穌所說的話。
word.korean: 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나신 후에야 제자들이 이 말씀하신 것을 기억하고 성경과 및 예수의 하신 말씀을 믿었더라
word.tagalog: Nang magbangon na maguli nga siya sa mga patay, ay naalaala ng kaniyang mga alagad na sinalita niya ito; at nagsisampalataya sila sa kasulatan, at sa salitang sinabi ni Jesus.
word.maori: Na reira, i tona aranga ake i te hunga mate, ka mahara ana akonga ki tana korerotanga i tenei; a whakapono ana ratou ki te karaipiture, ki te kupu hoki i korerotia e Ihu.
word.cebuano: Busa, sa nabanhaw siya sa mga minatay, ang iyang mga tinon-an nahinumdum nga siya nagsulti niini, ug mitoo sila sa Kasulatan, ug sa pulong nga gisulti ni Jesus.
word.hebrewmodern: ואחרי קומו מן המתים זכרו תלמידיו כי זאת אמר להם ויאמינו בכתוב ובדבר אשר דבר ישוע׃
word.textusreceptus: οτε ουν ηγερθη εκ νεκρων εμνησθησαν οι μαθηται αυτου οτι τουτο ελεγεν αυτοις και επιστευσαν τη γραφη και τω λογω ω ειπεν ο ιησους

word.kjv: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men,
word.thailand: แต่พระเยซูมิได้ทรงวางพระทัยในคนเหล่านั้น เพราะพระองค์ทรงรู้จักมนุษย์ทุกคน
word.spanish1909: Mas el mismo Jesús no se confiaba á sí mismo de ellos, porque él conocía á todos,
word.latinvulgate: Ipse autem Jesus non credebat semetipsum eis, eo quod ipse nosset omnes,
word.italian1927: Ma Gesù non si fidava di loro, perché conosceva tutti,
word.german1912: Aber Jesus vertraute sich ihnen nicht; denn er kannte sie alle
word.french1910: Mais Jésus ne se fiait point à eux, parce qu'il les connaissait tous,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌卻不信任他們，因為他知道所有的人，
word.korean: 예수는 그 몸을 저희에게 의탁지 아니하셨으니 이는 친히 모든 사람을 아심이요
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't si Jesus sa kaniyang sarili ay hindi rin nagkatiwala sa kanila, sapagka't nakikilala niya ang lahat ng mga tao,
word.maori: Otira kihai a Ihu i tuku atu i a ia ki a ratou, i mohio hoki ia ki nga tangata katoa.
word.cebuano: Apan si Jesus wala gayud mosalig sa iyang kaugalingon kanila, tungod kay siya nakaila sa tanang mga tawo;
word.hebrewmodern: והוא ישוע לא הפקיד את עצמו בידם על אשר ידע את כלם׃
word.textusreceptus: αυτος δε ο ιησους ουκ επιστευεν εαυτον αυτοις δια το αυτον γινωσκειν παντας

word.kjv: The same came to Jesus by night, and said unto him, Rabbi, we know that thou art a teacher come from God: for no man can do these miracles that thou doest, except God be with him.
word.thailand: ชายผู้นี้ได้มาหาพระเยซูในเวลากลางคืนและทูลพระองค์ว่า "รับบี พวกข้าพเจ้าทราบอยู่ว่าท่านเป็นครูที่มาจากพระเจ้า เพราะไม่มีผู้ใดกระทำการอัศจรรย์ซึ่งท่านได้กระทำนั้นได้ นอกจากว่าพระเจ้าทรงสถิตอยู่กับเขาด้วย"
word.spanish1909: Este vino á Jesús de noche, y díjole: Rabbí, sabemos que has venido de Dios por maestro; porque nadie puede hacer estas señales que tú haces, si no fuere Dios con él.
word.latinvulgate: Hic venit ad Jesum nocte, et dixit ei : Rabbi, scimus quia a Deo venisti magister, nemo enim potest hæc signa facere, quæ tu facis, nisi fuerit Deus cum eo.
word.italian1927: Egli venne di notte a Gesù, e gli disse: Maestro, noi sappiamo che tu sei un dottore venuto da Dio; perché nessuno può fare questi miracoli che tu fai, se Dio non è con lui.
word.german1912: Der kam zu Jesu bei der Nacht und sprach zu ihm: Meister, wir wissen, daß du bist ein Lehrer von Gott gekommen; denn niemand kann die Zeichen tun, die du tust, es sei denn Gott mit ihm.
word.french1910: qui vint, lui, auprès de Jésus, de nuit, et lui dit: Rabbi, nous savons que tu es un docteur venu de Dieu; car personne ne peut faire ces miracles que tu fais, si Dieu n'est avec lui.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他夜間來到耶穌那裡，對他說：“拉比，我們知道你是從　神那裡來的教師，因為如果沒有　神同在，你所行的這些神蹟，就沒有人能行。”
word.korean: 그가 밤에 예수께 와서 가로되 `랍비여, 우리가 당신은 하나님께로서 오신 선생인 줄 아나이다 하나님이 함께 하시지 아니하시면 당신의 행하시는 이 표적을 아무라도 할 수 없음이니이다'
word.tagalog: Ito rin ay naparoon sa kaniya nang gabi, at sa kaniya'y nagsabi, Rabi, nalalaman naming ikaw ay isang guro na nagbuhat sa Dios; sapagka't walang makagagawa ng mga tanda na iyong ginagawa, maliban na kung sumasa kaniya ang Dios.
word.maori: Ka haere mai tenei ki a Ihu i te po, ka mea ki a ia, E Rapi, e matau ana matou i haere mai koe i te Atua hei kaiwhakaako, ina hoki e kore tetahi tangata e ahei te mea i enei merekara e meatia nei e koe, ki te kahore te Atua i a ia.
word.cebuano: Kini miduol kaniya sa gabii, ug miingon kaniya: Rabbi, nahibalo kami nga ikaw magtutudlo nga nagagikan sa Dios, kay walay tawo nga makabuhat niini nga mga katingalahan nga imong gibuhat, gawas kong ang Dios anaa kaniya.
word.hebrewmodern: ויבא אל ישוע לילה ויאמר אליו רבי ידענו כי אתה מורה מאת אלהים באת כי לא יוכל איש לעשות האתות אשר אתה עשה בלתי אם האלהים עמו׃
word.textusreceptus: ουτος ηλθεν προς τον ιησουν νυκτος και ειπεν αυτω ραββι οιδαμεν οτι απο θεου εληλυθας διδασκαλος ουδεις γαρ ταυτα τα σημεια δυναται ποιειν α συ ποιεις εαν μη η ο θεος μετ αυτου

word.kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบเขาว่า "เราบอกความจริงแก่ท่านว่า ถ้าผู้ใดไม่ได้บังเกิดใหม่ ผู้นั้นจะเห็นอาณาจักรของพระเจ้าไม่ได้"
word.spanish1909: Respondió Jesús, y díjole: De cierto, de cierto te digo, que el que no naciere otra vez, no puede ver el reino de Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Respondit Jesus, et dixit ei : Amen, amen dico tibi, nisi quis renatus fuerit denuo, non potest videre regnum Dei.
word.italian1927: Gesù gli rispose dicendo: In verità, in verità io ti dico che se uno non è nato di nuovo, non può vedere il regno di Dio.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Wahrlich, wahrlich, ich sage dir: Es sei denn, daß jemand von neuem geboren werde, so kann er das Reich Gottes nicht sehen.
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: En vérité, en vérité, je te le dis, si un homme ne naît de nouveau, il ne peut voir le royaume de Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“我實實在在告訴你，人若不重生，就不能見　神的國。”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `진실로 진실로 네게 이르노니 사람이 거듭나지 아니하면 하나님 나라를 볼 수 없느니라'
word.tagalog: Sumagot si Jesus at sa kaniya'y sinabi, Katotohanan, katotohanang sinasabi ko sa iyo, Maliban na ang tao'y ipanganak na muli, ay hindi siya makakakita ng kaharian ng Dios.
word.maori: Ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, he pono, he pono, taku e mea nei ki a koe, Ki te kahore te tangata e whanau hou, e kore ia e ahei te kite i te rangatiratanga o te Atua.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus mitubag ug miingon kaniya: Sa pagkamatuod, sa pagkamatuod, naga-ingon ako kanimo, gawas kong ang tawo magapakatawo pag-usab, dili siya makakita sa gingharian sa Dios.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליו אמן אמן אני אמר לך אם לא יולד איש מלמעלה לא יוכל לראות מלכות האלהים׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκριθη ο ιησους και ειπεν αυτω αμην αμην λεγω σοι εαν μη τις γεννηθη ανωθεν ου δυναται ιδειν την βασιλειαν του θεου

word.kjv: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบว่า "เราบอกความจริงแก่ท่านว่า ถ้าผู้ใดไม่ได้บังเกิดจากน้ำและพระวิญญาณ ผู้นั้นจะเข้าในอาณาจักรของพระเจ้าไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Respondió Jesús: De cierto, de cierto te digo, que el que no naciere de agua y del Espíritu, no puede entrar en el reino de Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Respondit Jesus : Amen, amen dico tibi, nisi quis renatus fuerit ex aqua, et Spiritu Sancto, non potest introire in regnum Dei.
word.italian1927: Gesù rispose: In verità, in verità io ti dico che se uno non è nato d’acqua e di Spirito, non può entrare nel regno di Dio.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete: Wahrlich, wahrlich ich sage dir: Es sei denn daß jemand geboren werde aus Wasser und Geist, so kann er nicht in das Reich Gottes kommen.
word.french1910: Jésus répondit: En vérité, en vérité, je te le dis, si un homme ne naît d'eau et d'Esprit, il ne peut entrer dans le royaume de Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答：“我實實在在告訴你，人若不是從水和聖靈生的，就不能進　神的國。
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하시되 `진실로 진실로 네게 이르노니 사람이 물과 성령으로 나지 아니하면 하나님 나라에 들어갈 수 없느니라
word.tagalog: Sumagot si Jesus, Katotohanan, katotohanang sinasabi ko sa iyo, Maliban na ang tao'y ipanganak ng tubig at ng Espiritu, ay hindi siya makapapasok sa kaharian ng Dios.
word.maori: Ka whakahokia e Ihu, He pono, he pono taku e mea nei ki a koe, Ki te kahore te tangata e whanau i te wai, i te Wairua hoki, e kore ia e ahei te tomo ki te rangatiratanga o te Atua.
word.cebuano: Mitubag si Jesus: Sa pagkamatuod, sa pagkamatuod, nagaingon ako kanimo: Gawas kong ang tawo magpakatawo sa tubig ug sa Espiritu, dili siya makasulod sa gingharian sa Dios.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע אמן אמן אני אמר לך אם לא יולד איש מן המים והרוח לא יוכל לבוא אל מלכות האלהים׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκριθη ο ιησους αμην αμην λεγω σοι εαν μη τις γεννηθη εξ υδατος και πνευματος ου δυναται εισελθειν εις την βασιλειαν του θεου

word.kjv: Jesus answered and said unto him, Art thou a master of Israel, and knowest not these things?
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบเขาว่า "ท่านเป็นอาจารย์ของชนอิสราเอล และยังไม่เข้าใจสิ่งเหล่านี้หรือ
word.spanish1909: Respondió Jesús, y díjole: ¿Tú eres el maestro de Israel, y no sabes esto?
word.latinvulgate: Respondit Jesus, et dixit ei : Tu es magister in Israël, et hæc ignoras ?
word.italian1927: Gesù gli rispose: Tu se’ il dottor d’Israele e non sai queste cose?
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihm: Bist du ein Meister in Israel und weißt das nicht?
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Tu es le docteur d'Israël, et tu ne sais pas ces choses!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌說：“你是以色列人的教師，還不明白這事嗎？
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `너는 이스라엘의 선생으로서 이러한 일을 알지 못하느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Sumagot si Jesus at sa kaniya'y sinabi, Ikaw ang guro sa Israel, at hindi mo nauunawa ang mga bagay na ito?
word.maori: Ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, Ko koe te Kaiwhakaako o Iharaira, a kahore i matau ki enei mea?
word.cebuano: Si Jesus mitubag ug miingon kaniya: Ikaw ba ang magtutudlo sa Israel, ug dili mahibalo niining mga butanga?
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליו רבן של ישראל אתה וזאת לא ידעת׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκριθη ο ιησους και ειπεν αυτω συ ει ο διδασκαλος του ισραηλ και ταυτα ου γινωσκεις

word.kjv: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea; and there he tarried with them, and baptized.
word.thailand: ภายหลังเหตุการณ์เหล่านี้พระเยซูก็เสด็จเข้าไปในแคว้นยูเดียกับสาวกของพระองค์ และทรงประทับที่นั่นกับเขา และให้บัพติศมา
word.spanish1909: Pasado esto, vino Jesús con sus discípulos á la tierra de Judea; y estaba allí con ellos, y bautizaba.
word.latinvulgate: Post hæc venit Jesus et discipuli ejus in terram Judæam : et illic demorabatur cum eis, et baptizabat.
word.italian1927: Dopo queste cose, Gesù venne co’ suoi discepoli nelle campagne della Giudea; quivi si trattenne con loro, e battezzava.
word.german1912: Darnach kam Jesus und seine Jünger in das jüdische Land und hatte daselbst sein Wesen mit ihnen und taufte.
word.french1910: Après cela, Jésus, accompagné de ses disciples, se rendit dans la terre de Judée; et là il demeurait avec eux, et il baptisait.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他必興旺，我必衰微這事以後，耶穌和門徒來到猶太地，他和他們住在那裡，並且施洗。
word.korean: 이 후에 예수께서 제자들과 유대땅으로 가서 거기 함께 유하시며 세례를 주시더라
word.tagalog: Pagkatapos ng mga bagay na ito ay nagsiparoon si Jesus at ang kaniyang mga alagad sa lupain ng Judea; at doon siya tumira na kasama nila, at bumabautismo.
word.maori: ¶ A no muri i enei mea ka haere a Ihu, ratou ko ana akonga, ki te whenua o Huria; a noho tahi ana ratou ki reira, me tana iriiri ano.
word.cebuano: Sa human kining mga butanga, si Jesus ug ang iyang mga tinon-an miadto sa yuta sa Judea, ug didto mipuyo siya uban kanila ug nagabautismo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי אחרי הדברים האלה ויבא ישוע ותלמידיו אל ארץ יהודה ויגר שם עמהם ויטבל׃
word.textusreceptus: μετα ταυτα ηλθεν ο ιησους και οι μαθηται αυτου εις την ιουδαιαν γην και εκει διετριβεν μετ αυτων και εβαπτιζεν

word.kjv: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,
word.thailand: เหตุฉะนั้นเมื่อองค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าทรงทราบว่า พวกฟาริสีได้ยินว่า พระเยซูทรงมีสาวกและให้บัพติศมามากกว่ายอห์น
word.spanish1909: DE manera que como Jesús entendió que los Fariseos habían oído que Jesús hacía y bautizaba más discípulos que Juan,
word.latinvulgate: Ut ergo cognovit Jesus quia audierunt pharisæi quod Jesus plures discipulos facit, et baptizat, quam Joannes
word.italian1927: Quando dunque il Signore ebbe saputo che i Farisei aveano udito ch’egli faceva e battezzava più discepoli di Giovanni
word.german1912: Da nun der HERR inneward, daß vor die Pharisäer gekommen war, wie Jesus mehr Jünger machte und taufte denn Johannes
word.french1910: Le Seigneur sut que les pharisiens avaient appris qu'il faisait et baptisait plus de disciples que Jean.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 生命的活水主知道法利賽人聽見他收門徒和施洗比約翰更多
word.korean: 예수의 제자를 삼고 세례를 주는 것이 요한보다 많다 하는 말을 바리새인들이 들은 줄을 주께서 아신지라
word.tagalog: Nang maalaman nga ng Panginoon na nabalitaan ng mga Fariseo na si Jesus ay gumagawa at bumabautismo ng lalong maraming alagad kay sa kay Juan
word.maori: ¶ A, no ka mohio te Ariki, kua rongo nga Parihi, ko nga akonga a Ihu i mea ai, i iriiri ai, he tokomaha atu i a Hoani,
word.cebuano: Busa sa naila sa Ginoo nga ang mga Fariseo nakadungog nga si Jesus nagabuhat ug nagabautismo ug labing daghan nga mga tinon-an kay kang Juan,
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי כאשר נודע לאדון כי שמעו הפרושים אשר ישוע העמיד והטביל תלמידים הרבה מיוחנן׃
word.textusreceptus: ως ουν εγνω ο κυριος οτι ηκουσαν οι φαρισαιοι οτι ιησους πλειονας μαθητας ποιει και βαπτιζει η ιωαννης

word.kjv: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)
word.thailand: (แม้ว่าพระเยซูไม่ได้ทรงให้บัพติศมาเอง แต่สาวกของพระองค์เป็นผู้ให้)
word.spanish1909: (Aunque Jesús no bautizaba, sino sus discípulos),
word.latinvulgate: (quamquam Jesus non baptizaret, sed discipuli ejus),
word.italian1927: (quantunque non fosse Gesù che battezzava, ma i suoi discepoli),
word.german1912: (wiewohl Jesus selber nicht taufte, sondern seine Jünger),
word.french1910: Toutefois Jésus ne baptisait pas lui-même, mais c'étaient ses disciples.
word.chinesencvtraditional: （其實不是耶穌親自施洗，而是他的門徒施洗），
word.korean: (예수께서 친히 세례를 주신 것이 아니요 제자들이 준 것이라)
word.tagalog: (Bagaman hindi bumabautismo si Jesus, kundi ang kaniyang mga alagad),
word.maori: He ahakoa ra ehara i a Ihu nana i iriiri, na ana akonga ia,
word.cebuano: (Bisan dili si Jesus gayud ang nagabautismo kondili ang iyang mga tinon-an),
word.hebrewmodern: ואולם ישוע הוא לא הטביל כי אם תלמידיו׃
word.textusreceptus: καιτοιγε ιησους αυτος ουκ εβαπτιζεν αλλ οι μαθηται αυτου

word.kjv: Now Jacob's well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.
word.thailand: บ่อน้ำของยาโคบอยู่ที่นั่น พระเยซูทรงดำเนินทางมาเหน็ดเหนื่อยจึงประทับบนขอบบ่อนั้น เป็นเวลาประมาณเที่ยง
word.spanish1909: Y estaba allí la fuente de Jacob. Pues Jesús, cansado del camino, así se sentó á la fuente. Era como la hora de sexta.
word.latinvulgate: Erat autem ibi fons Jacob. Jesus ergo fatigatus ex itinere, sedebat sic supra fontem. Hora erat quasi sexta.
word.italian1927: e quivi era la fonte di Giacobbe. Gesù dunque, stanco del cammino, stava così a sedere presso la fonte. Era circa l’ora sesta.
word.german1912: Es war aber daselbst Jakobs Brunnen. Da nun Jesus müde war von der Reise, setzte er sich also auf den Brunnen; und es war um die sechste Stunde.
word.french1910: Là se trouvait le puits de Jacob. Jésus, fatigué du voyage, était assis au bord du puits. C'était environ la sixième heure.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在那裡有雅各井。耶穌因為旅途疲倦了，就坐在井旁；那時大約正午。
word.korean: 거기 또 야곱의 우물이 있더라 예수께서 행로에 곤하여 우물 곁에 그대로 앉으시니 때가 제 육시쯤 되었더라
word.tagalog: At naroon ang balon ni Jacob. Si Jesus nga, nang napapagod na sa kaniyang paglalakbay, ay naupong gayon sa tabi ng balon. Magiikaanim na nga ang oras.
word.maori: Kei reira hoki te puna a Hakopa. Na kua ngenge a Ihu i te haerenga, heoi noho ana ia ki te taha o te puna: a meake ko te ono o nga haora.
word.cebuano: Ug didto atua ang atabay ni Jacob. Busa si Jesus, ingon nga gikapuyan sa iyang panaw, milingkod haduol sa atabay. Kadto daw may ikaunom ang takna.
word.hebrewmodern: ושם באר יעקב וישוע היה עיף מן הדרך וישב לו על הבאר והעת כשעה הששית׃
word.textusreceptus: ην δε εκει πηγη του ιακωβ ο ουν ιησους κεκοπιακως εκ της οδοιποριας εκαθεζετο ουτως επι τη πηγη ωρα ην ωσει εκτη

word.kjv: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her, Give me to drink.
word.thailand: มีหญิงชาวสะมาเรียคนหนึ่งมาตักน้ำ พระเยซูตรัสกับนางว่า "ขอน้ำให้เราดื่มบ้าง"
word.spanish1909: Vino una mujer de Samaria á sacar agua: y Jesús le dice: Dame de beber.
word.latinvulgate: Venit mulier de Samaria haurire aquam. Dicit ei Jesus : Da mihi bibere.
word.italian1927: Una donna samaritana venne ad attinger l’acqua. Gesù le disse: Dammi da bere.
word.german1912: Da kommt ein Weib aus Samaria, Wasser zu schöpfen. Jesus spricht zu ihr: Gib mir zu trinken!
word.french1910: Une femme de Samarie vint puiser de l'eau. Jésus lui dit: Donne-moi à boire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 有一個撒瑪利亞婦人來打水。耶穌對她說：“請給我水喝。”
word.korean: 사마리아 여자 하나가 물을 길러 왔으매 예수께서 물을 좀 달라 하시니
word.tagalog: Dumating ang isang babaing taga Samaria upang umigib ng tubig: sa kaniya'y sinabi ni Jesus, Painumin mo ako.
word.maori: Ka haere mai tetahi wahine o Hamaria ki te utu wai: ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, Homai he wai moku.
word.cebuano: May miduol usa ka babaye nga Samariahanon sa pagkalos ug tubig. Si Jesus miingon kaniya: Paimna ako.
word.hebrewmodern: ותבא אשה משמרון לשאב מים ויאמר אליה ישוע תני נא לי לשתות׃
word.textusreceptus: ερχεται γυνη εκ της σαμαρειας αντλησαι υδωρ λεγει αυτη ο ιησους δος μοι πιειν

word.kjv: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสตอบนางว่า "ถ้าเจ้าได้รู้จักของประทานของพระเจ้า และรู้จักผู้ที่พูดกับเจ้าว่า `ขอน้ำให้เราดื่มบ้าง' เจ้าจะได้ขอจากท่านผู้นั้น และท่านผู้นั้นจะให้น้ำประกอบด้วยชีวิตแก่เจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Respondió Jesús y díjole: Si conocieses el don de Dios, y quién es el que te dice: Dame de beber: tú pedirías de él, y él te daría agua viva.
word.latinvulgate: Respondit Jesus, et dixit ei : Si scires donum Dei, et quis est qui dicit tibi : Da mihi bibere, tu forsitan petisses ab eo, et dedisset tibi aquam vivam.
word.italian1927: Gesù rispose e le disse: Se tu conoscessi il dono di Dio e chi è che ti dice: Dammi da bere, tu stessa gliene avresti chiesto, ed egli t’avrebbe dato dell’acqua viva.
word.german1912: Jesus antwortete und sprach zu ihr: Wenn du erkenntest die Gabe Gottes und wer der ist, der zu dir sagt: "Gib mir zu trinken!", du bätest ihn, und er gäbe dir lebendiges Wasser.
word.french1910: Jésus lui répondit: Si tu connaissais le don de Dieu et qui est celui qui te dit: Donne-moi à boire! tu lui aurais toi-même demandé à boire, et il t'aurait donné de l'eau vive.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌回答她：“你若知道　神的恩賜，和對你說‘請給我水喝’的是誰，你必早已求他，他也必早把活水賜給你了。”
word.korean: 예수께서 대답하여 가라사대 `네가 만일 하나님의 선물과 또 네게 물좀 달라 하는 이가 누구인줄 알았더면 네가 그에게 구하였을 것이요 그가 생수를 네게 주었으리라'
word.tagalog: Sumagot si Jesus at sa kaniya'y sinabi, Kung napagkikilala mo ang kaloob ng Dios, at kung sino ang sa iyo'y nagsasabi, Painumin mo ako; ikaw ay hihingi sa kaniya, at ikaw ay bibigyan niya ng tubig na buhay.
word.maori: Ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ia, Me i matau koe ki ta te Atua e homai ai, ki tenei hoki e mea nei ki a koe, Homai he wai moku; penei kua tono koe ki a ia, a kua hoatu e ia te wai ora ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus mitubag ug mi ingon kaniya: Kong ikaw nakaila sa hatag sa Dios ug kong kinsa ang nagaingon kanimo, Paimna ako; mangayo unta ikaw kaniya, ug siya mohatag kanimo ug buhi nga tubig.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליה לו ידעת את מתת אלהים ומי הוא האמר אליך תני נא לי לשתות כי עתה שאלת ממנו ונתן לך מים חיים׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκριθη ιησους και ειπεν αυτη ει ηδεις την δωρεαν του θεου και τις εστιν ο λεγων σοι δος μοι πιειν συ αν ητησας αυτον και εδωκεν αν σοι υδωρ ζων

word.kjv: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:

word.kjv: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.

word.kjv: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.
word.thailand: ฉะนั้นพระเยซูจึงได้เสด็จไปยังหมู่บ้านคานาแคว้นกาลิลีอีก อันเป็นที่ซึ่งพระองค์ทรงกระทำให้น้ำกลายเป็นน้ำองุ่น และที่เมืองคาเปอรนาอุมมีขุนนางคนหนึ่ง บุตรชายของท่านป่วยหนัก
word.spanish1909: Vino pues Jesús otra vez á Caná de Galilea, donde había hecho el vino del agua. Y había en Capernaum uno del rey, cuyo hijo estaba enfermo.
word.latinvulgate: Venit ergo iterum in Cana Galilææ, ubi fecit aquam vinum. Et erat quidam regulus, cujus filius infirmabatur Capharnaum.
word.italian1927: Gesù dunque venne di nuovo a Cana di Galilea, dove avea cambiato l’acqua in vino. E v’era un certo ufficial reale, il cui figliuolo era infermo a Capernaum.
word.german1912: Und Jesus kam abermals gen Kana in Galiläa, da er das Wasser hatte zu Wein gemacht.
word.french1910: Il retourna donc à Cana en Galilée, où il avait changé l'eau en vin. Il y avait à Capernaüm un officier du roi, dont le fils était malade.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌又到了加利利的迦拿，就是他變水為酒的地方。有一個大臣，他的兒子在迦百農患病。
word.korean: 예수께서 다시 갈릴리 가나에 이르시니 전에 물로 포도주를 만드신 곳이라 왕의 신하가 있어 그 아들이 가버나움에서 병들었더니
word.tagalog: Naparoon ngang muli siya sa Cana ng Galilea, na doo'y kaniyang pinapaging alak ang tubig. At naroroon ang isang mahal na tao, na ang kaniyang anak na lalake ay may-sakit sa Capernaum.
word.maori: A ka tae ano a Ihu ki Kana o Kariri, ki te wahi i meatia ai e ia te wai hei waina. Na ko tetahi tangata a te kingi, kei Kaperenauma tana tama e mate ana.
word.cebuano: Busa miadto pag-usab si Jesus sa Cana sa Galilea, diin iyang gibuhat nga vino ang tubig. Ug may usa ka tawong halangdon, nga may anak nga lalake nga nagadaut didto sa Capernaum.
word.hebrewmodern: ויבא ישוע עוד הפעם אל קנה אשר בגליל מקום שומו המים ליין ואיש היה מעבדי המלך ובנו חלה בכפר נחום׃
word.textusreceptus: ηλθεν ουν ο ιησους παλιν εις την κανα της γαλιλαιας οπου εποιησεν το υδωρ οινον και ην τις βασιλικος ου ο υιος ησθενει εν καπερναουμ

word.kjv: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.
word.thailand: เมื่อท่านได้ยินข่าวว่า พระเยซูได้เสด็จมาจากแคว้นยูเดียไปยังแคว้นกาลิลีแล้ว ท่านจึงไปทูลอ้อนวอนพระองค์ให้เสด็จลงไปรักษาบุตรของตน เพราะบุตรจวนจะตายแล้ว
word.spanish1909: Este, como oyó que Jesús venía de Judea á Galilea, fué á él, y rogábale que descendiese, y sanase á su hijo, porque se comenzaba á morir.
word.latinvulgate: Hic cum audisset quia Jesus adveniret a Judæa in Galilæam, abiit ad eum, et rogabat eum ut descenderet, et sanaret filium ejus : incipiebat enim mori.
word.italian1927: Come egli ebbe udito che Gesù era venuto dalla Giudea in Galilea, andò a lui e lo pregò che scendesse e guarisse il suo figliuolo, perché stava per morire.
word.german1912: Und es war ein Königischer, des Sohn lag krank zu Kapernaum. Dieser hörte, daß Jesus kam aus Judäa nach Galiläa, und ging hin zu ihm und bat ihn, daß er hinabkäme und hülfe seinem Sohn; denn er war todkrank.
word.french1910: Ayant appris que Jésus était venu de Judée en Galilée, il alla vers lui, et le pria de descendre et de guérir son fils, qui était près de mourir.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他聽見耶穌從猶太到了加利利，就來見他，求他下去醫治他的兒子，因為他的兒子快要死了。
word.korean: 그가 예수께서 유대로부터 갈릴리에 오심을 듣고 가서 청하되 내려오셔서 내 아들의 병을 고쳐 주소서 하니 저가 거의 죽게 되었음이라
word.tagalog: Nang mabalitaan niya na si Jesus ay dumating sa Galilea na mula sa Judea, ay naparoon siya sa kaniya, at ipinamanhik sa kaniya na siya'y lumusong, at pagalingin ang kaniyang anak na lalake; sapagka't siya'y naghihingalo.
word.maori: A, no ka rongo ia kua tae mai a Ihu i Huria ki Kariri, ka haere ki a ia, ka inoi ki a ia kia haere ia ki te whakaora i tana tama; meake hoki marere.
word.cebuano: Sa iyang pagkadungog nga si Jesus milakat gikan sa Judea ngadto sa Galilea, siya ming-adto kang Jesus ug nagpakilooy nga mokanaug siya ug ayohon niya ang iyang anak, kay siya himalatyon.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי כשמעו כי בא ישוע מיהודה לארץ הגליל וילך אליו וישאל מאתו לרדת ולרפא את בנו כי קרב למות׃
word.textusreceptus: ουτος ακουσας οτι ιησους ηκει εκ της ιουδαιας εις την γαλιλαιαν απηλθεν προς αυτον και ηρωτα αυτον ινα καταβη και ιασηται αυτου τον υιον ημελλεν γαρ αποθνησκειν

word.kjv: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.
word.thailand: พระเยซูจึงตรัสกับเขาว่า "ถ้าพวกท่านไม่เห็นหมายสำคัญและการมหัศจรรย์ ท่านก็จะไม่เชื่อ"
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús le dijo: Si no viereis señales y milagros no creeréis.
word.latinvulgate: Dixit ergo Jesus ad eum : Nisi signa et prodigia videritis, non creditis.
word.italian1927: Perciò Gesù gli disse: Se non vedete segni e miracoli, voi non crederete.
word.german1912: Und Jesus sprach zu ihm: Wenn ihr nicht Zeichen und Wunder seht, so glaubet ihr nicht.
word.french1910: Jésus lui dit: Si vous ne voyez des miracles et des prodiges, vous ne croyez point.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他說：“你們若看不見神蹟奇事，總是不肯信。”
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `너희는 표적과 기사를 보지 못하면 도무지 믿지 아니하리라'
word.tagalog: Sinabi nga sa kaniya ni Jesus, Malibang kayo'y mangakakita ng mga tanda at mga kababalaghan, ay hindi kayo magsisipaniwala sa anomang paraan.
word.maori: Na ko te meatanga a Ihu ki a ia, Ki te kahore koutou e kite i nga tohu, i nga merekara, e kore rawa koutou e whakapono.
word.cebuano: Busa si Jesus miingon kaniya: Gawas kong kamo magpakakita ug mga timaan ug mga katingalahan, kamo dili gayud motoo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע אם לא תראו אתות ומופתים לא תאמינו׃
word.textusreceptus: ειπεν ουν ο ιησους προς αυτον εαν μη σημεια και τερατα ιδητε ου μη πιστευσητε

word.kjv: Jesus saith unto him, Go thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสกับท่านว่า "กลับไปเถิด บุตรชายของท่านจะไม่ตาย" ท่านก็เชื่อพระดำรัสที่พระเยซูตรัสกับท่าน จึงทูลลาไป
word.spanish1909: Dícele Jesús: Ve, tu hijo vive. Y el hombre creyó á la palabra que Jesús le dijo, y se fué.
word.latinvulgate: Dicit ei Jesus : Vade, filius tuus vivit. Credidit homo sermoni quem dixit ei Jesus, et ibat.
word.italian1927: Gesù gli disse: Va’, il tuo figliuolo vive. Quell’uomo credette alla parola che Gesù gli avea detta, e se ne andò.
word.german1912: Jesus spricht zu ihm: Gehe hin, dein Sohn lebt! der Mensch glaubte dem Wort, das Jesus zu ihm sagte, und ging hin.
word.french1910: Va, lui dit Jésus, ton fils vit. Et cet homme crut à la parole que Jésus lui avait dite, et il s'en alla.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌告訴他：“回去吧，你的兒子好了。”那人信耶穌對他說的話，就回去了。
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `가라, 네 아들이 살았다' 하신대 그 사람이 예수의 하신 말씀을 믿고 가더니
word.tagalog: Sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, Yumaon ka ng iyong lakad; buhay ang anak mo. Pinaniwalaan ng lalake ang salitang sinalita sa kaniya ni Jesus, at siya'y yumaon sa kaniyang lakad.
word.maori: Ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, Haere; kua ora tau tama. Na whakapono ana te tangata ki te kupu i korerotia e Ihu ki a ia, a haere ana.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus miingon kaniya: Lumakaw ka, ang imong anak buhi. Ang tawo mitoo sa pulong nga giingon ni Jesus kaniya, ug siya milakaw.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע לך לך בנך חי והאיש האמין לדבר אשר דבר אליו ישוע וילך׃
word.textusreceptus: λεγει αυτω ο ιησους πορευου ο υιος σου ζη και επιστευσεν ο ανθρωπος τω λογω ω ειπεν αυτω ιησους και επορευετο

word.kjv: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.
word.thailand: บิดาจึงรู้ว่าชั่วโมงนั้นเป็นเวลาที่พระเยซูได้ตรัสกับตนว่า "บุตรชายของท่านจะไม่ตาย" และท่านเองก็เชื่อพร้อมทั้งครัวเรือนของท่านด้วย
word.spanish1909: El padre entonces entendió, que aquella hora era cuando Jesús le dijo: Tu hijo vive; y creyó él y toda su casa.
word.latinvulgate: Cognovit ergo pater, quia illa hora erat in qua dixit ei Jesus : Filius tuus vivit ; et credidit ipse et domus ejus tota.
word.italian1927: Così il padre conobbe che ciò era avvenuto nell’ora che Gesù gli avea detto: Il tuo figliuolo vive; e credette lui con tutta la sua casa.
word.german1912: Da merkte der Vater, daß es um die Stunde wäre, in welcher Jesus zu ihm gesagt hatte: Dein Sohn lebt. Und er glaubte mit seinem ganzen Hause.
word.french1910: Le père reconnut que c'était à cette heure-là que Jésus lui avait dit: Ton fils vit. Et il crut, lui et toute sa maison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這父親就知道，那正是耶穌告訴他“你的兒子好了”的時候，他自己和全家就信了。
word.korean: 아비가 예수께서 네 아들이 살았다 말씀하신 그 때인 줄 알고 자기와 그 온 집안이 다 믿으니라
word.tagalog: Naunawa nga ng ama na sa oras na yaon nang sabihin sa kaniya ni Jesus, Buhay ang anak mo: at siya'y sumampalataya, at ang kaniyang buong sangbahayan.
word.maori: Na ka mohio te papa, ko te tino haora ia i mea ai a Ihu ki a ia, Kua ora tau tama: a whakapono ana ia, ratou ko tona whare katoa.
word.cebuano: Busa ang amahan nahibalo nga mao ang takna sa pag-ingon kaniya ni Jesus: Ang imong anak buhi. Ug siya gayud mitoo ug ang tibook niya nga balay.
word.hebrewmodern: וידע אביהו כי היתה השעה אשר דבר לו ישוע בנך חי ויאמן הוא וכל ביתו׃
word.textusreceptus: εγνω ουν ο πατηρ οτι εν εκεινη τη ωρα εν η ειπεν αυτω ο ιησους οτι ο υιος σου ζη και επιστευσεν αυτος και η οικια αυτου ολη

word.kjv: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did, when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee.
word.thailand: นี่เป็นการอัศจรรย์ที่สองซึ่งพระเยซูทรงกระทำ เมื่อพระองค์เสด็จจากแคว้นยูเดียไปยังแคว้นกาลิลี
word.spanish1909: Esta segunda señal volvió Jesús á hacer, cuando vino de Judea á Galilea.
word.latinvulgate: Hoc iterum secundum signum fecit Jesus, cum venisset a Judæa in Galilæam.
word.italian1927: Questo secondo miracolo fece di nuovo Gesù, tornando dalla Giudea in Galilea.
word.german1912: Das ist nun das andere Zeichen, das Jesus tat, da er aus Judäa nach Galiläa kam.
word.french1910: Jésus fit encore ce second miracle lorsqu'il fut venu de Judée en Galilée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這是耶穌從猶太回到加利利以後所行的第二件神蹟。
word.korean: 이것은 예수께서 유대에서 갈릴리로 오신 후 행하신 두 번째 표적이니라
word.tagalog: Ito nga ang muling pangalawang tanda na ginawa ni Jesus, nang siya'y pumaroon sa Galilea na mula sa Judea.
word.maori: Ko te rua ano tenei o nga merekara i meatia e Ihu, i muri i tona haerenga i Huria ki Kariri.
word.cebuano: Kini mao usab ang ikaduha ka katingalahan nga gibuhat ni Jesus, sa nakagula siya sa Judea ngadto sa Galilea.
word.hebrewmodern: זה הוא האות השני אשר עשה ישוע בבאו מיהודה לארץ הגליל׃
word.textusreceptus: τουτο παλιν δευτερον σημειον εποιησεν ο ιησους ελθων εκ της ιουδαιας εις την γαλιλαιαν

word.kjv: After this there was a feast of the Jews; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
word.thailand: หลังจากนั้นก็ถึงเทศกาลเลี้ยงของพวกยิว และพระเยซูก็เสด็จขึ้นไปยังกรุงเยรูซาเล็ม
word.spanish1909: DESPUÉS de estas cosas, era un día de fiesta de los Judíos, y subió Jesús á Jerusalem.
word.latinvulgate: Post hæc erat dies festus Judæorum, et ascendit Jesus Jerosolymam.
word.italian1927: Dopo queste cose ci fu una festa de’ Giudei, e Gesù salì a Gerusalemme.
word.german1912: Darnach war ein Fest der Juden, und Jesus zog hinauf gen Jerusalem.
word.french1910: Après cela, il y eut une fête des Juifs, et Jésus monta à Jérusalem.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 治好病了三十八年的人這些事以後，到了猶太人的一個節期，耶穌就上耶路撒冷去。
word.korean: 그 후에 유대인의 명절이 있어 예수께서 예루살렘에 올라가시니라
word.tagalog: Pagkatapos ng mga bagay na ito'y nagkaroon ng pista ang mga Judio; at umahon si Jesus sa Jerusalem.
word.maori: ¶ Muri iho i enei mea he hakari ta nga Hurai; a haere ana a Ihu ki Hiruharama.
word.cebuano: Sa human niining mga butanga, may usa ka fiesta sa mga Judio, ug si Jesus mitungas sa Jerusalem.
word.hebrewmodern: אחר הדברים האלה היה חג ליהודים ויעל ישוע ירושלים׃
word.textusreceptus: μετα ταυτα ην εορτη των ιουδαιων και ανεβη ο ιησους εις ιεροσολυμα

word.kjv: When Jesus saw him lie, and knew that he had been now a long time in that case, he saith unto him, Wilt thou be made whole?
word.thailand: เมื่อพระเยซูทอดพระเนตรคนนั้นนอนอยู่และทรงทราบว่า เขาป่วยอยู่อย่างนั้นนานแล้ว พระองค์ตรัสกับเขาว่า "เจ้าปรารถนาจะหายโรคหรือ"
word.spanish1909: Como Jesús vió á éste echado, y entendió que ya había mucho tiempo, dícele: ¿Quieres ser sano?
word.latinvulgate: Hunc autem cum vidisset Jesus jacentem, et cognovisset quia jam multum tempus haberet, dicit ei : Vis sanus fieri ?
word.italian1927: Gesù, vedutolo che giaceva e sapendo che già da gran tempo stava così, gli disse: Vuoi esser risanato?
word.german1912: Da Jesus ihn sah liegen und vernahm, daß er so lange gelegen hatte, spricht er zu ihm: Willst du gesund werden?
word.french1910: Jésus, l'ayant vu couché, et sachant qu'il était malade depuis longtemps, lui dit: Veux-tu être guéri?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌看見他躺著，知道他病了很久，就問他：“你要痊愈嗎？”
word.korean: 예수께서 그 누운 것을 보시고 병이 벌써 오랜 줄 아시고 이르시되 네가 낫고자 하느냐 ?
word.tagalog: Nang makita ni Jesus na siya'y nakahandusay, at mapagkilalang siya'y malaon nang panahong maysakit, ay sinabi niya sa kaniya, Ibig mo bagang gumaling?
word.maori: No te kitenga o Ihu i a ia e takoto ana, ka matau kua roa ke te wa ona e mate ana, ka mea ki a ia, E pai ana ranei koe ki whakaorangia?
word.cebuano: Sa nakakita si Jesus kaniya nga nagahay-ad, ug sa nakaila nga siya dugay na niadtong kahimtanga, siya miingon kaniya: Buot ba ikaw nga mamaayo?
word.hebrewmodern: וירא אתו ישוע שכב וידע כי ארכו לו ימי חליו ויאמר אליו התחפץ להרפא׃
word.textusreceptus: τουτον ιδων ο ιησους κατακειμενον και γνους οτι πολυν ηδη χρονον εχει λεγει αυτω θελεις υγιης γενεσθαι

word.kjv: Jesus saith unto him, Rise, take up thy bed, and walk.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสกับเขาว่า "จงลุกขึ้นยกแคร่ของเจ้าและเดินไปเถิด"
word.spanish1909: Dícele Jesús: Levántate, toma tu lecho, y anda.
word.latinvulgate: Dicit ei Jesus : Surge, tolle grabatum tuum et ambula.
word.italian1927: Gesù gli disse: Lèvati, prendi il tuo lettuccio, e cammina.
word.german1912: Jesus spricht zu ihm: Stehe auf, nimm dein Bett und gehe hin!
word.french1910: Lève-toi, lui dit Jésus, prends ton lit, et marche.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌對他說：“起來，拿著你的褥子走吧。”
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `일어나 네 자리를 들고 걸어가라' 하시니
word.tagalog: Sinabi sa kaniya ni Jesus, Magtindig ka, buhatin mo ang iyong higaan, at lumakad ka.
word.maori: Ka mea a Ihu ki a ia, Whakatika, tangohia ake tou moenga, haere.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus miingon kaniya: Tumindog ka, kuhaa ang imong higdaanan, ug lumakaw.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר אליו ישוע קום שא את משכבך והתהלך׃
word.textusreceptus: λεγει αυτω ο ιησους εγειραι αρον τον κραββατον σου και περιπατει

word.kjv: And he that was healed wist not who it was: for Jesus had conveyed himself away, a multitude being in that place.
word.thailand: คนที่ได้รับการรักษาให้หายโรคนั้นไม่รู้ว่าเป็นผู้ใด เพราะพระเยซูเสด็จหลบไปแล้ว เนื่องจากขณะนั้นมีคนอยู่ที่นั่นเป็นอันมาก
word.spanish1909: Y el que había sido sanado, no sabía quién fuese; porque Jesús se había apartado de la gente que estaba en aquel lugar.
word.latinvulgate: Is autem qui sanus fuerat effectus, nesciebat quis esset. Jesus enim declinavit a turba constituta in loco.
word.italian1927: Ma colui ch’era stato guarito non sapeva chi fosse; perché Gesù era scomparso, essendovi in quel luogo molta gente.
word.german1912: Der aber geheilt worden war, wußte nicht, wer es war; denn Jesus war gewichen, da so viel Volks an dem Ort war.
word.french1910: Mais celui qui avait été guéri ne savait pas qui c'était; car Jésus avait disparu de la foule qui était en ce lieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那醫好了的人不知道他是誰，因為那裡人很多，耶穌已經避開了。
word.korean: 고침을 받은 사람이 그가 누구신지 알지 못하니 이는 거기 사람이 많으므로 예수께서 이미 피하셨음이라
word.tagalog: Nguni't hindi nakikilala ng pinagaling kung sino siya; sapagka't si Jesus ay humiwalay, palibhasa'y may isang karamihan sa dakong yaon.
word.maori: Otira kihai taua tangata i whakaorangia ra i mohio ko wai ia: i pahemo atu hoki a Ihu, he tokomaha hoki nga tangata i taua wahi.
word.cebuano: Apan ang giayo wala manghibalo kong kinsa kadto, kay si Jesus mingpahawa didto, sanglit may panon sa katawohan didto niadtong dapita.
word.hebrewmodern: והנרפא לא ידע מי הוא כי סר ישוע וילך בהיות המון רב במקום ההוא׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιαθεις ουκ ηδει τις εστιν ο γαρ ιησους εξενευσεν οχλου οντος εν τω τοπω

word.kjv: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple, and said unto him, Behold, thou art made whole: sin no more, lest a worse thing come unto thee.
word.thailand: ภายหลังพระเยซูได้ทรงพบคนนั้นในพระวิหารและตรัสกับเขาว่า "ดูเถิด เจ้าหายโรคแล้ว อย่าทำบาปอีก มิฉะนั้นเหตุร้ายกว่านั้นจะเกิดกับเจ้า"
word.spanish1909: Después le halló Jesús en el templo, y díjole: He aquí, has sido sanado; no peques más, porque no te venga alguna cosa peor.
word.latinvulgate: Postea invenit eum Jesus in templo, et dixit illi : Ecce sanus factus es ; jam noli peccare, ne deterius tibi aliquid contingat.
word.italian1927: Di poi Gesù lo trovò nel tempio, e gli disse: Ecco, tu sei guarito; non peccar più, che non t’accada di peggio.
word.german1912: Darnach fand ihn Jesus im Tempel und sprach zu ihm: Siehe zu, du bist gesund geworden; sündige hinfort nicht mehr, daß dir nicht etwas Ärgeres widerfahre.
word.french1910: Depuis, Jésus le trouva dans le temple, et lui dit: Voici, tu as été guéri; ne pèche plus, de peur qu'il ne t'arrive quelque chose de pire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 後來，耶穌在殿裡遇見那人，對他說：“你已經痊愈了，不可再犯罪，免得招來更大的禍患。”
word.korean: 그 후에 예수께서 성전에서 그 사람을 만나 이르시되 `보라, 네가 나았으니 더 심한 것이 생기지 않게 다시는 죄를 범치 말라' 하시니
word.tagalog: Pagkatapos ay nasumpungan siya ni Jesus sa templo, at sa kaniya'y sinabi, Narito, ikaw ay gumaling na: huwag ka nang magkasala, baka mangyari pa sa iyo ang lalong masama.
word.maori: Muri iho i enei mea ka kite a Ihu i a ia i roto i te temepara, ka mea ki a ia, Na, ka oti nei koe te whakaora: kati te hara kei kino rawa iho te mea e pa ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Sa tapus niini, siya hingkit-an ni Jesus sa templo, ug miingon kaniya: Ania karon, maayo na ikaw, ayaw na pagpakasala, aron dili mahitabo kanimo ang labi pang mangil-ad nga mga butang.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי אחרי כן וימצאהו ישוע בבית המקדש ויאמר אליו הנה נרפא לך אל תוסיף לחטא פן תאנה אליך רעה גדולה מזאת׃
word.textusreceptus: μετα ταυτα ευρισκει αυτον ο ιησους εν τω ιερω και ειπεν αυτω ιδε υγιης γεγονας μηκετι αμαρτανε ινα μη χειρον τι σοι γενηται

word.kjv: The man departed, and told the Jews that it was Jesus, which had made him whole.
word.thailand: ชายคนนั้นก็ได้ออกไปและบอกพวกยิวว่า ท่านที่ได้รักษาเขาให้หายโรคนั้นคือพระเยซู
word.spanish1909: El se fué, y dió aviso á los Judíos, que Jesús era el que le había sanado.
word.latinvulgate: Abiit ille homo, et nuntiavit Judæis quia Jesus esset, qui fecit eum sanum.
word.italian1927: Quell’uomo se ne andò, e disse ai Giudei che Gesù era quel che l’avea risanato.
word.german1912: Der Mensch ging hin und verkündete es den Juden, es sei Jesus, der ihn gesund gemacht habe.
word.french1910: Cet homme s'en alla, et annonça aux Juifs que c'était Jésus qui l'avait guéri.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那人就去告訴猶太人，使他痊愈的就是耶穌。
word.korean: 그 사람이 유대인들에게 가서 자기를 고친 이는 예수라 하니라
word.tagalog: Umalis ang tao, at sinaysay sa mga Judio na si Jesus ang sa kaniya'y nagpagaling.
word.maori: Haere ana taua tangata, korero ana ki nga Hurai, na Ihu ia i whakaora.
word.cebuano: Ang tawo milakaw ug nagsugilon sa mga Judio nga si Jesus mao ang nag-ayo kaniya.
word.hebrewmodern: וילך האיש ויגד ליהודים כי ישוע הוא אשר רפאו׃
word.textusreceptus: απηλθεν ο ανθρωπος και ανηγγειλεν τοις ιουδαιοις οτι ιησους εστιν ο ποιησας αυτον υγιη

word.kjv: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus, and sought to slay him, because he had done these things on the sabbath day.
word.thailand: เหตุฉะนั้นพวกยิวจึงข่มเหงพระเยซู และแสวงหาโอกาสที่จะฆ่าพระองค์ เพราะพระองค์ทรงกระทำเช่นนั้นในวันสะบาโต
word.spanish1909: Y por esta causa los Judíos perseguían á Jesús, y procuraban matarle, porque hacía estas cosas en sábado.
word.latinvulgate: Propterea persequebantur Judæi Jesum, quia hæc faciebat in sabbato.
word.italian1927: E per questo i Giudei perseguitavano Gesù e cercavan d’ucciderlo; perché facea quelle cose di sabato.
word.german1912: Darum verfolgten die Juden Jesum und suchten ihn zu töten, daß er solches getan hatte am Sabbat.
word.french1910: C'est pourquoi les Juifs poursuivaient Jésus, parce qu'il faisait ces choses le jour du sabbat.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 從此猶太人就迫害耶穌，因為他常常在安息日作這些事。
word.korean: 그러므로 안식일에 이러한 일을 행하신다 하여 유대인들이 예수를 핍박하게 된지라
word.tagalog: At dahil dito'y pinagusig ng mga Judio si Jesus, sapagka't ginagawa niya ang mga bagay na ito sa araw ng sabbath.
word.maori: Koia nga Hurai i whai ai ki te tukino i a Ihu, mona i mea i enei mea i te hapati.
word.cebuano: Ug tungod niini nga hinungdan gilutos sa mga Judio si Jesus, ug gipani-nguha nila ang pagpatay kaniya, kay nagabuhat siya niining mga butanga sa adlaw nga igpapahulay.
word.hebrewmodern: ועל כן רדפו היהודים את ישוע ויבקשו המיתו על כי עשה כזאת בשבת׃
word.textusreceptus: και δια τουτο εδιωκον τον ιησουν οι ιουδαιοι και εζητουν αυτον αποκτειναι οτι ταυτα εποιει εν σαββατω

word.kjv: But Jesus answered them, My Father worketh hitherto, and I work.
word.thailand: แต่พระเยซูตรัสตอบเขาว่า "พระบิดาของเราก็ยังทรงกระทำการอยู่จนถึงบัดนี้ และเราก็ทำด้วย"
word.spanish1909: Y Jesús les respondió: Mi Padre hasta ahora obra, y yo obro.
word.latinvulgate: Jesus autem respondit eis : Pater meus usque modo operatur, et ego operor.
word.italian1927: Gesù rispose loro: Il Padre mio opera fino ad ora, ed anche io opero.
word.german1912: Jesus aber antwortete Ihnen: Mein Vater wirkt bisher, und ich wirke auch.
word.french1910: Mais Jésus leur répondit: Mon Père agit jusqu'à présent; moi aussi, j'agis.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌卻對他們說：“我父作工直到現在，我也作工。”
word.korean: 예수께서 저희에게 이르시되 `내 아버지께서 이제까지 일하시니 나도 일한다' 하시매
word.tagalog: Datapuwa't sinagot sila ni Jesus, Hanggang ngayo'y gumagawa ang aking Ama, at ako'y gumagawa.
word.maori: ¶ Na ka whakahokia e Ihu ki a ratou, E mahi ana toku Matua a taea noatia tenei ra; e mahi ana ano ahau.
word.cebuano: Apan si Jesus mingtubag kanila: Ang akong Amahan nagabuhat bisan hangtud karon, ug ako nagabuhat.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען אתם ישוע אבי פעל עד עתה וגם אנכי פעל׃
word.textusreceptus: ο δε ιησους απεκρινατο αυτοις ο πατηρ μου εως αρτι εργαζεται καγω εργαζομαι

word.kjv: Then answered Jesus and said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, The Son can do nothing of himself, but what he seeth the Father do: for what things soever he doeth, these also doeth the Son likewise.
word.thailand: ดังนั้นพระเยซูตรัสกับเขาว่า "เราบอกความจริงแก่ท่านทั้งหลายว่า พระบุตรจะกระทำสิ่งใดตามใจไม่ได้ นอกจากที่ได้เห็นพระบิดาทรงกระทำ เพราะสิ่งใดที่พระบิดาทรงกระทำ สิ่งนั้นพระบุตรจึงทรงกระทำด้วย
word.spanish1909: Respondió entonces Jesús, y díjoles: De cierto, de cierto os digo: No puede el Hijo hacer nada de sí mismo, sino lo que viere hacer al Padre: porque todo lo que él hace, esto también hace el Hijo juntamente.
word.latinvulgate: Amen, amen dico vobis : non potest Filius a se facere quidquam, nisi quod viderit Patrem facientem : quæcumque enim ille fecerit, hæc et Filius similiter facit.
word.italian1927: Gesù quindi rispose e disse loro: In verità, in verità io vi dico che il Figliuolo non può da se stesso far cosa alcuna, se non la vede fare dal Padre; perché le cose che il Padre fa, anche il Figlio le fa similmente.
word.german1912: Da antwortete Jesus und sprach zu ihnen: Wahrlich, wahrlich, ich sage euch: Der Sohn kann nichts von sich selber tun, sondern was er sieht den Vater tun; denn was dieser tut, das tut gleicherweise auch der Sohn.
word.french1910: Jésus reprit donc la parole, et leur dit: En vérité, en vérité, je vous le dis, le Fils ne peut rien faire de lui-même, il ne fait que ce qu'il voit faire au Père; et tout ce que le Père fait, le Fils aussi le fait pareillement.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 人子的權柄耶穌又對他們說：“我實實在在告訴你們，子靠著自己不能作甚麼，只能作他看見父所作的；因為父所作的事，子也照樣作。
word.korean: 그러므로 예수께서 저희에게 이르시되 `내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 아들이 아버지의 하시는 일을 보지 않고는 아무 것도 스스로 할 수 없나니 아버지께서 행하시는 그것을 아들도 그와 같이 행하느니라
word.tagalog: Sumagot nga si Jesus at sinabi sa kanila, Katotohanan, katotohanang sinasabi ko sa inyo, Hindi makagagawa ang Anak ng anoman sa kaniyang sarili kundi ang makita niyang gawin ng Ama; sapagka't ang lahat ng mga bagay na kaniyang ginagawa, ay ang mga ito rin naman ang ginagawa ng Anak sa gayon ding paraan.
word.maori: Na ka whakahoki a Ihu, ka mea ki a ratou, he pono, he pono taku e mea nei ki a koutou, E kore e taea e te Tama te mea tetahi mea e ia anake, engari nga mea e kite ai ia e meatia ana e te Matua: ko tana hoki e mea ai, e meatia ana hoki e a hoki e mea ai, e tama!
word.cebuano: Busa si Jesus mitubag ug miingon kanila: Sa pagkamatuod, sapagkamatuod, nagaingon ako kaninyo: Ang Anak dili makahimo sa pagbuhat bisan unsa sa iyang kaugalingon, kondili ang nakita niya nga gibuhat sa Amahan; kay ang pagabuhaton niya, kini ginabuhat usab sa Anak sa maong paagi.
word.hebrewmodern: ויען ישוע ויאמר אליהם אמן אמן אני אמר לכם לא יוכל הבן לעשות דבר מנפשו בלתי את אשר יראה את אביו עשה כי את אשר עשה הוא גם הבן יעשה כמהו׃
word.textusreceptus: απεκρινατο ουν ο ιησους και ειπεν αυτοις αμην αμην λεγω υμιν ου δυναται ο υιος ποιειν αφ εαυτου ουδεν εαν μη τι βλεπη τον πατερα ποιουντα α γαρ αν εκεινος ποιη ταυτα και ο υιος ομοιως ποιει

word.kjv: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias.
word.thailand: ภายหลังเหตุการณ์เหล่านี้พระเยซูก็เสด็จไปข้ามทะเลกาลิลี คือทะเลทิเบเรียส
word.spanish1909: PASADAS estas cosas, fuése Jesús de la otra parte de la mar de Galilea, que es de Tiberias.
word.latinvulgate: Post hæc abiit Jesus trans mare Galilææ, quod est Tiberiadis :
word.italian1927: Dopo queste cose, Gesù se ne andò all’altra riva del mar di Galilea, ch’è il mar di Tiberiade.
word.german1912: Darnach fuhr Jesus weg über das Meer an der Stadt Tiberias in Galiläa.
word.french1910: Après cela, Jésus s'en alla de l'autre côté de la mer de Galilée, de Tibériade.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 給五千人吃飽的神蹟（太14:13~21；可6:32~44；路9:10~17）這些事以後，耶穌渡過加利利海，就是提比里亞海。
word.korean: 그 후에 예수께서 갈릴리 바다 곧 디베랴 바다 건너편으로 가시매
word.tagalog: Pagkatapos ng mga bagay na ito ay naparoon si Jesus sa kabilang ibayo ng dagat ng Galilea, na siyang dagat ng Tiberias.
word.maori: ¶ Muri iho i enei mea ka whiti atu a Ihu i te moana o Kariri, ara i te moana o Taipiria.
word.cebuano: Sa human niining mga butanga, si Jesus milakat ngadto sa tabok sa dagat sa Galilea, nga mao ang dagat sa Tiberias.
word.hebrewmodern: ויהי אחרי כן ויצא ישוע אל עבר ים הגליל אשר לטיבריה׃
word.textusreceptus: μετα ταυτα απηλθεν ο ιησους περαν της θαλασσης της γαλιλαιας της τιβεριαδος

word.kjv: And Jesus went up into a mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.
word.thailand: พระเยซูเสด็จขึ้นไปบนภูเขาและประทับกับเหล่าสาวกของพระองค์ที่นั่น
word.spanish1909: Y subió Jesús á un monte, y se sentó allí con sus discípulos.
word.latinvulgate: Subiit ergo in montem Jesus et ibi sedebat cum discipulis suis.
word.italian1927: Ma Gesù salì sul monte e quivi si pose a sedere co’ suoi discepoli.
word.german1912: Jesus aber ging hinauf auf einen Berg und setzte sich daselbst mit seinen Jüngern.
word.french1910: Jésus monta sur la montagne, et là il s'assit avec ses disciples.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌上了山，同門徒坐在那裡。
word.korean: 예수께서 산에 오르사 제자들과 함께 거기 앉으시니
word.tagalog: At umahon si Jesus sa bundok, at doo'y naupo siya na kasama ng kaniyang mga alagad.
word.maori: Na ka haere a Ihu ki runga i te maunga, a noho ana i reira ratou ko ana akonga.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jesus mitungas sa bukid, ug didto milingkod uban sa iyang mga tinon-an.
word.hebrewmodern: ויעל ישוע על ההר וישב שם הוא ותלמידיו׃
word.textusreceptus: ανηλθεν δε εις το ορος ο ιησους και εκει εκαθητο μετα των μαθητων αυτου

word.kjv: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes, and saw a great company come unto him, he saith unto Philip, Whence shall we buy bread, that these may eat?
word.thailand: เมื่อพระเยซูทรงเงยพระพักตร์ทอดพระเนตรและเห็นคนเป็นอันมากพากันมาหาพระองค์ พระองค์จึงตรัสกับฟีลิปว่า "เราจะซื้ออาหารที่ไหนให้คนเหล่านี้กินได้"
word.spanish1909: Y como alzó Jesús los ojos, y vió que había venido á él grande multitud, dice á Felipe: ¿De dónde compraremos pan para que coman éstos?
word.latinvulgate: Cum sublevasset ergo oculos Jesus, et vidisset quia multitudo maxima venit ad eum, dixit ad Philippum : Unde ememus panes, ut manducent hi ?
word.italian1927: Gesù dunque, alzati gli occhi e vedendo che una gran folla veniva a lui, disse a Filippo: Dove comprerem noi del pane perché questa gente abbia da mangiare?
word.german1912: Da hob Jesus seine Augen auf und sieht, daß viel Volks zu ihm kommt, und spricht zu Philippus: Wo kaufen wir Brot, daß diese essen?
word.french1910: Ayant levé les yeux, et voyant qu'une grande foule venait à lui, Jésus dit à Philippe: Où achèterons-nous des pains, pour que ces gens aient à manger?

word.korean: 예수께서 눈을 들어 큰 무리가 자기에게로 오는 것을 보시고 빌립에게 이르시되 `우리가 어디서 떡을 사서 이 사람들로 먹게 하겠느냐 ?' 하시니
word.tagalog: Itinanaw nga ni Jesus ang kaniyang mga mata, at pagkakita na ang lubhang maraming tao'y lumalapit sa kaniya, ay sinabi kay Felipe, Saan tayo magsisibili ng tinapay, upang mangakakain ang mga ito?
word.maori: A, no te marangatanga ake o nga kanohi o Ihu, ka kite i te rahi o te hui e haere mai ana ki a ia; ka mea ia ki a Piripi, Ko hea tatou hoko ai i etahi taro, kia kai ai enei?
word.cebuano: Busa si Jesus, sa giyahat ang iyang mga mata, ug sa nakita nga ang usa ka dakung panon sa katawohan nagapadulong kaniya, miingon kang Felipe: Asa kita magpalit ug tinapay aron kini sila makakaon?
word.hebrewmodern: וישא ישוע את עיניו וירא עם רב בא אליו ויאמר אל פילפוס מאין נקנה להם לחם לאכל׃
word.textusreceptus: επαρας ουν ο ιησους τους οφθαλμους και θεασαμενος οτι πολυς οχλος ερχεται προς αυτον λεγει προς τον φιλιππον ποθεν αγορασομεν αρτους ινα φαγωσιν ουτοι

word.kjv: And Jesus said, Make the men sit down. Now there was much grass in the place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand.
word.thailand: พระเยซูตรัสว่า "ให้คนทั้งปวงนั่งลงเถิด" ที่นั่นมีหญ้ามาก คนเหล่านั้นจึงนั่งลง นับแต่ผู้ชายได้ประมาณห้าพันคน
word.spanish1909: Entonces Jesús dijo: Haced recostar la gente. Y había mucha hierba en aquel lugar: y recostáronse como número de cinco mil varones.

word.german1912: Jesus aber sprach: Schaffet, daß sich das Volk lagert. Es war aber viel Gras an dem Ort. Da lagerten sich bei fünftausend Mann.
word.french1910: Jésus dit: Faites-les asseoir. Il y avait dans ce lieu beaucoup d'herbe. Ils s'assirent donc, au nombre d'environ cinq mille hommes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶穌吩咐他們：“你們叫眾人坐下。”原來那地方的草很多，眾人就坐下，單是男人的數目約有五千。
word.korean: 예수께서 가라사대 `이 사람들로 앉게 하라' 하신대 그 곳에 잔디가 많은지라 사람들이 앉으니 수효가 오천쯤 되더라
word.tagalog: Sinabi ni Jesus, Inyong paupuin ang mga tao. Madamo nga sa dakong yaon. Kaya't nagsiupo ang mga lalake, na may limang libo ang bilang.
word.maori: Na ka mea a Ihu, Meinga nga tangata kia noho. He nui hoki te tarutaru i taua wahi. Na noho ana nga tane ki raro, te tokomaha me te mea e rima mano.
word.cebuano: Si Jesus miingon: Palingkora ang mga tawo. Karon, may daghang balili niadtong dapita. Busa ang mga tawo nanglingkod, sa gidaghanon nga may lima ka libo.
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר ישוע צוו את העם לשבת ארצה וירק דשא לרב היה במקום ההוא וישבו לארץ כחמשת אלפי איש במספר׃
word.textusreceptus: ειπεν δε ο ιησους ποιησατε τους ανθρωπους αναπεσειν ην δε χορτος πολυς εν τω τοπω ανεπεσον ουν οι ανδρες τον αριθμον ωσει πεντακισχιλιοι

word.kjv: And Jesus took the loaves; and when he had given thanks, he distributed to the disciples, and the disciples to them that were set down; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would.
word.thailand: แล้วพระเยซูก็ทรงหยิบขนมปังนั้น และเมื่อขอบพระคุณแล้ว ก็ทรงแจกแก่พวกสาวก และพวกสาวกแจกแก่บรรดาคนที่นั่งอยู่นั้น และให้ปลาด้วยตามที่เขาปรารถนา
word.spanish1909: Y tomó Jesús aquellos panes, y habiendo dado gracias, repartió á los discípulos, y los discípulos á los que estaban recostados: asimismo de los peces, cuanto querían.
